segment.source: What's New in NVDA
segment.target: NVDA ta je novo

segment.source: This release introduces NVDA Remote Access, allowing you to control a remote computer running NVDA from another device running NVDA.
segment.target: Ova verzija donosi NVDA daljinski pristup, koji vam dozvoljava da kontroliete udaljeni raunar na kojem je NVDA pokrenut sa drugog ureaja na kojem je NVDA pokrenut.

segment.source: There are many improvements to speech, particularly responsiveness with SAPI 4, SAPI 5 and OneCore voices.
segment.target: Izvrena su brojna poboljanja u govoru, posebno u brzini SAPI 4, SAPI 5 i OneCore glasova.

segment.source: Rate boost and automatic language switching is now supported in SAPI 5.
segment.target: Poveanje brzine i automatska promena jezika su sada podrani uz SAPI 5.

segment.source: SAPI 4 voices now support audio ducking, leading silence trimming, and keeping the audio device awake.
segment.target: SAPI 4 glasovi sada podravaju stiavanje pozadinskih zvukova, uklanjanje poetnih tiina i odravanje zvunog ureaja budnim.

segment.source: The Add-on Store's automatic update system has been improved, allowing you to select channels for automatic updates, and run automatic updates in the background.
segment.target: Sistem automatskih auriranja prodavnice dodataka je poboljan, dozvoljavajui vam da izaberete kanale za automatska auriranjai pokreete automatska auriranja u pozadini.

segment.source: It's now easier to manually refresh OCR and toggle automatic refresh, with new commands.
segment.target: Sada je lake automatski osveiti rezultat optikog prepoznavanja kao i ukljuiti i iskljuiti automatsko osveavanje, novim komandama.

segment.source: Native selection is now available in Chrome and Edge.
segment.target: Ugraen izbor je sada dostupan u pretraivaima Chrome i Edge.

segment.source: Microsoft Office and LibreOffice support has improved, notably with more shortcuts being announced.
segment.target: Microsoft Office i LibreOffice podrka je poboljana, uz dodatne preice koje se izgovaraju.

segment.source: Default input and output braille tables can now be determined based on the NVDA language.
segment.target: Podrazumevane ulazne i izlazne brajeve tabele se sada mogu odrediti na osnovu NVDA jezika.

segment.source: Native support has been added for the Dot Pad tactile graphics device from Dot Inc as a multiline braille display.
segment.target: Dodata je ugraena podrka za Dot Pad tactile graphics ureaj proizvoaa Dot Inc kao vielijnijski brajev red.

segment.source: There have been other minor fixes for braille displays, particularly around connectivity.
segment.target: Izvrene su druge sitnije ispravke za brajeve redove, posebno vezane za povezivanje.

segment.source: LibLouis braille translator, eSpeak-NG and Unicode CLDR have been updated.
segment.target: LibLouis brajev prevodilac, eSpeak-NG i Unicode CLDR su aurirani.

segment.source: New Coptic, compact Cuneiform, and Portuguese 6 dot Computer Braille tables are available.
segment.target: Dostupne su nove koptske, sumerske kompaktna forma i portugalske estotakaste brajeve tabele.

segment.source: Important notes
segment.target: Vane napomene

segment.source: This release breaks compatibility with existing add-ons.
segment.target: Postojei dodaci nisu kompatibilni uz ovu verziju.

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Bezbednosne ispravke

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues following NVDA's [security policy](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md).
segment.target: Molimo odgovorno prijavite bezbednosne probleme praenjem NVDA [bezbednosne politike](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md).

segment.source: Prevents showing potentially sensitive information on braille displays when the device is locked.
segment.target: Spreeno prikazivanje potencijalno osetljivih informacija na brajevim redovima kada je ureaj zakljuan.

segment.source: ([GHSA-8f8q-2jc3-6rf4](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-8f8q-2jc3-6rf4))
segment.target: ([GHSA-8f8q-2jc3-6rf4](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-8f8q-2jc3-6rf4))

segment.source: Prevents the installer from loading unwanted DLLs from its directory.
segment.target: Spreava uitavanje neeljenih DLL datoteka instalacije iz njenog direktorijuma.

segment.source: ([GHSA-qf5h-qw92-rx2f](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-qf5h-qw92-rx2f))
segment.target: ([GHSA-qf5h-qw92-rx2f](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-qf5h-qw92-rx2f))

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove karakteristike

segment.source: Add-on Store:
segment.target: Prodavnica dodataka:

segment.source: Automatic updates (#3208):
segment.target: Automatska auriranja(#3208):

segment.source: Automatic update channels for add-ons can now be modified.
segment.target: Kanali za automatska auriranja dodataka se sada mogu promeniti.

segment.source: Automatic update channels can be selected for installed add-ons via an "Update channel" submenu.
segment.target: Kanali automatskog auriranja za instalirane dodatke se mogu izabrati iz podmenija "Kanal auriranja".

segment.source: The default automatic update channel can be set from the Add-on Store panel in NVDA's settings.
segment.target: Podrazumevani kanal automatskog auriranja se moe podesiti iz panela prodavnice dodataka u NVDA podeavanjima.

segment.source: Automatic updates can now happen in the background.
segment.target: Automatska auriranja se sada mogu izvriti u pozadini.

segment.source: This can be enabled in the Add-on Store panel in NVDA's settings by changing "Automatic updates" to "Update Automatically".
segment.target: Ovo se moe omoguiti u panelu prodavnice dodataka NVDA podeavanja menjanjem opcije "automatska auriranja" na "auriraj automatski".

segment.source: Automatic updates can now update incompatible add-ons to another, newer, incompatible version.
segment.target: Automatska auriranja sada mogu da auriraju nekompatibilne dodatke na drugu, noviju, nekompatibilnu verziju.

segment.source: This can be enabled in the Add-on Store panel in NVDA's settings.
segment.target: Ovo se moe omoguiti u panelu prodavnice dodataka NVDA podeavanja.

segment.source: Added an action to cancel the install of add-ons. (#15578, @hwf1324)
segment.target: Dodata radnja za otkazivanje instalacije dodatka. (#15578, @hwf1324)

segment.source: Added an action to retry the installation if the download/installation of an add-on fails. (#17090, @hwf1324)
segment.target: Dodata radnja za ponavljanje instalacije ako preuzimanje ili instalacija dodatka ne uspe. (#17090, @hwf1324)

segment.source: The add-ons lists can be sorted by columns, including publication date, in ascending and descending order. (#15277, #16681, @nvdaes)
segment.target: Lista dodataka se sada moe sortirati po kolonama, ukljuujui datum objavljivanja, u rastuem i opadajuem redosledu. (#15277, #16681, @nvdaes)

segment.source: Speech:
segment.target: Govor:

segment.source: Automatic language switching is now supported when using Microsoft Speech API version 5 (SAPI5) and Microsoft Speech Platform voices. (#17146, @gexgd0419)
segment.target: Automatska promena jezika je sada podrana kada se koriste Microsoft Speech API verzija 5 (SAPI5) i Microsoft Speech Platform glasovi. (#17146, @gexgd0419)

segment.source: Rate boost is now supported when using Microsoft Speech API version 5 (SAPI5) and Microsoft Speech Platform voices, which supports up to 6X speed. (#17606, @gexgd0419)
segment.target: Poveanje brzine je sada podrano kada se koriste Microsoft Speech API verzija 5 (SAPI5) i Microsoft Speech Platform glasovi, koje podrava brzinu do 6X. (#17606, @gexgd0419)

segment.source: Web browsers:
segment.target: Web pretraivai:

segment.source: NVDA browse mode's native selection mode (`NVDA+shift+f10`) is now supported in Google Chrome, Edge and other applications based on Chromium 134 or newer. (#17838)
segment.target: Reim ugraenog izbora u NVDA reimu pretraivanja (`NVDA+ift+f10`) je sada podran u pretraivaima Google Chrome, Edge i drugim aplikacijama zasnovanim na Chromiumu 134 ili novijem. (#17838)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox, NVDA will report the highlighted text when a URL containing a text fragment is visited. (#16910, @jcsteh)
segment.target: U Mozilli Firefox, NVDA e prijaviti obeleen tekst kada se poseti adresa koja sadri deo teksta. (#16910, @jcsteh)

segment.source: NVDA can now report when a link destination points to the current page. (#141, @LeonarddeR, @nvdaes)
segment.target: NVDA sada moe da prijavi kada odredite linka vodi ka istoj stranici. (#141, @LeonarddeR, @nvdaes)

segment.source: Microsoft Office:
segment.target: Microsoft Office:

segment.source: When editing in PowerPoint text boxes, you can now move per sentence with `alt+upArrow`/`alt+downArrow`. (#17015, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Kada ureujete tekstualna polja programa PowerPoint, moete se kretati po reenicama preicama `alt+strelicaGore`/`alt+strelicaDole`. (#17015, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: In Word, the selection update is now reported when using Word commands to extend or reduce the selection (`f8` or `shift+f8`). (#3293, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: U Wordu, auriran izbor se sada prijavljuje kada koristite Word komande da produite ili skratite izbor (`f8` ili `ift+f8`). (#3293, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: In Word 16.0.18226 and higher or when using Word object model, NVDA will now report if a heading is collapsed in both speech and braille. (#17499)
segment.target: U Wordu 16.0.18226 i novijim ili kada se koristi objektni model pristupa Wordu, NVDA e sada prijaviti ako je naslov skupljen izgovorom kao i na brajevom redu. (#17499)

segment.source: In Word with UIA, when using the native extended table navigation commands (`alt+home`, `alt+end`, `alt+pageUp`, and `alt+pageDown`), the caret movement will now be reported. (#17867, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: U Wordu uz UIA, kada koristite ugraene komande za proirenu navigaciju kroz tabele (`alt+home`, `alt+end`, `alt+pageUp`, i `alt+pageDown`), pomeranje kursora e biti prijavljeno. (#17867, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: In Word, when using the "report focus" command, the document layout will be announced if this information is available and reporting object descriptions is enabled. (#15088, @nvdaes)
segment.target: U Wordu, kada se koristi komanda za prijavljivanje fokusa, izgled dokumenta e biti izgovoren ako je ova informacija dostupna i ako je prijavljivanje opisa objekata omogueno. (#15088, @nvdaes)

segment.source: The result of more shortcuts is now reported in Word and Outlook:
segment.target: Rezultat vie preica e se prijaviti u Wordu i Outlooku:

segment.source: font formatting shortcuts (#10271, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: preice formatiranja fonta (#10271, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: collapse or expand heading (#17545, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: skupljanje ili proirenje naslova (#17545, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: LibreOffice:
segment.target: LibreOffice:

segment.source: When increasing or decreasing the font size in Writer using the corresponding keyboard shortcuts, NVDA announces the new font size. (#6915, @michaelweghorn)
segment.target: Kada se umanji ili povea veliina fonta u Writeru korienjem odgovarajuih tasterskih preica, NVDA e izgovoriti novu veliinu fonta. (#6915, @michaelweghorn)

segment.source: When applying the "Body Text" or a heading paragraph style using the corresponding keyboard shortcut in Writer 25.2 or newer, NVDA announces the new paragraph style. (#6915, @michaelweghorn)
segment.target: Kada se primeni "telo teksta" ili stil pasusa naslova korienjem odgovarajue tasterske preice u Writeru 25.2 ili novijem, NVDA e izgovoriti novi stil pasusa. (#6915, @michaelweghorn)

segment.source: When toggling double underline in Writer using the corresponding keyboard shortcut, NVDA announces the new state ("double underline on"/"double underline off"). (#6915, @michaelweghorn)
segment.target: Kada ukljuite ili iskljuite dvostruko podvlaenje u Writeru korienjem odgovarajue tasterske preice, NVDA e izgovoriti novo stanje ("ukljueno dvostruko podvlaenje"/"iskljueno dvostruko podvlaenje"). (#6915, @michaelweghorn)

segment.source: NVDA can now report the first line indent in LibreOffice 25.8 and later. (#13052, @michaelweghorn)
segment.target: NVDA sada moe da prijavi uvlaenje prvog reda u paketu LibreOffice 25.8 i novijim. (#13052, @michaelweghorn)

segment.source: OCR:
segment.target: Optiko prepoznavanje znakova:

segment.source: In a recognition result, `NVDA+f5` manually refreshes the recognized content. (#17715, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: U rezultatu prepoznavanja, `NVDA+f5` runo osveava prepoznat sadraj. (#17715, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: Added an unassigned gesture to toggle periodically refreshing the Windows OCR result. (#16897)
segment.target: Dodata komanda bez dodeljene preice za ukljuivanje i iskljuivanje povremeneog osveavanja rezultata Windows optikog prepoznavanja znakova. (#16897)

segment.source: Remote access functionality, based on the NVDA Remote add-on, has been integrated into NVDA. (#4390, @ctoth, @tspivey, @daiverd, NVDA Remote Contributors and funders)
segment.target: Funkcije daljinskog pristupa, zasnovane na NVDA remote dodatku, integrisane su u NVDA. (#4390, @ctoth, @tspivey, @daiverd, NVDA Remote saradnici i finansijeri)

segment.source: It is now possible to specify mirror URLs to use for NVDA updates and the Add-on Store. (#14974, #17151, #17310, @christopherpross)
segment.target: Sada je mogue odrediti alternativne adrese koje e se koristiti za NVDA auriranja i prodavnicu dodataka. (#14974, #17151, #17310, @christopherpross)

segment.source: Support for math in PDFs has been added. (#9288, @NSoiffer)
segment.target: Dodata je podrka za matematike sadraje u PDF datotekama. (#9288, @NSoiffer)

segment.source: This works for formulas with associated MathML, such as some files generated by newer versions of TeX/LaTeX.
segment.target: Ovo radi uz formule koje koriste MathML, kao to su neke datoteke koje generiu novije verzije TeX-a/LaTeX-a.

segment.source: Currently this is only supported in Foxit Reader & Foxit Editor.
segment.target: Ovo je trenutno podrano samo u aplikacijama Foxit Reader i Foxit Editor.

segment.source: NVDA can now be configured to speak the current line or paragraph when navigating with braille navigation keys. (#17053, @nvdaes)
segment.target: NVDA se sada moe podesiti da izgovara trenutni red ili pasus kada se kreete navigacionim tasterima na brajevom redu. (#17053, @nvdaes)

segment.source: NVDA is now able to report caret changes when pressing `alt+upArrow` or `alt+downArrow` gestures, for example in Visual Studio Code. (#17652, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: NVDA sada moe da prijavi promene kursora kada se koriste preice `alt+strelicaGore` ili `alt+strelicaDole`, na primer u programu Visual Studio Code. (#17652, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Added commands to move the review cursor to the first and last character of the selected text, assigned to `NVDA+alt+home` and `NVDA+alt+end`, respectively. (#17299, @nvdaes)
segment.target: Dodate komande za pomeranje preglednog kursora na prvi ili poslednji znak izabranog teksta, uz podeene preice `NVDA+alt+home` i `NVDA+alt+end`,. (#17299, @nvdaes)

segment.source: Added a general setting to prevent the display turning off during say all or reading with braille.
segment.target: Dodato opte podeavanje koje spreava da se ekran iskljui tokom itanja u reimu izgovori sve ili na brajevom redu.

segment.source: This option is enabled by default, but may result in increased battery depletion. (#17649,@LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Ova opcija je podrazumevano omoguena, ali moe izazvati bre troenje baterije. (#17649,@LeonarddeR)

segment.source: NVDA is now translated into Bosnian. (#17953)
segment.target: NVDA je sada preveden na bosanski. (#17953)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promene

segment.source: Component updates:
segment.target: Aurirane komponente:

segment.source: Updated LibLouis Braille translator to [3.33.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.33.0). (#17469, #17768, @LeonarddeR, @codeofdusk)
segment.target: Auriran LibLouis brajev prevodilac na [3.33.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.33.0). (#17469, #17768, @LeonarddeR, @codeofdusk)

segment.source: Added new Coptic, compact Cuneiform, and Portuguese 6 dot Computer Braille tables.
segment.target: Dodate nove koptske, sumerske kompaktne formei portugalske estotakaste brajeve tabele.

segment.source: Updated CLDR to version 46.0. (#17484, @OzancanKaratas)
segment.target: Auriran CLDR na verziju 46.0. (#17484, @OzancanKaratas)

segment.source: Updated eSpeak NG to 1.52.0. (#17056)
segment.target: Auriran eSpeak NG na 1.52.0. (#17056)

segment.source: NVDA interface changes:
segment.target: Promene u NVDA interfejsu:

segment.source: The NVDA installer no longer plays a sound when launched. (#14068)
segment.target: NVDA instalacija vie ne reprodukuje zvuk kada se pokrene. (#14068)

segment.source: The Report link destination, Character formatting information, and Speak selection dialogs, now include "Close" and "Copy" buttons for user convenience. (#17018, @XLTechie)
segment.target: Dijalozi za prijavljivanje odredita linka, informacije o formatiranju znakovai izgovor izbora sada sadre tastere "Zatvori" i "Kopiraj" radi lakeg korienja. (#17018, @XLTechie)

segment.source: The exit dialog now allows you to restart NVDA with add-ons disabled and debug logging enabled simultaneously. (#11538, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Dijalog za izlaz vam sada dozvoljava da ponovo pokrenete NVDA sa onemoguenim dodacima i omoguenim dnevnicima za otklanjanje greke u isto vreme. (#11538, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: The ability to opt out of using WASAPI for audio output has been removed. (#16080)
segment.target: Mogunost da ne koristite WASAPI za zvuni izlaz je uklonjena. (#16080)

segment.source: The Browse Mode setting "Automatically set system focus to focusable elements" has been removed, the behaviour is now disabled. (#17598)
segment.target: Podeavanje reima pretraivanja "Automatski postavi sistemski fokus na elemente koji se mogu fokusirati" je uklonjena, sada je ova opcija onemoguena. (#17598)

segment.source: NVDA will now only warn about add-on incompatibility when updating to a new version which has an incompatible add-on API to the current version. (#17071, #17506)
segment.target: NVDA e sada upozoriti o nekompatibilnosti dodatka samo kada ga aurirate na novu verziju koja ima nekompatibilni API za dodatke u poreenju sa trenutnom verzijom. (#17071, #17506)

segment.source: The "Contributors" file has been removed from the NVDA menu. (#16922)
segment.target: Datoteka sa saradnicima je uklonjena iz NVDA menija. (#16922)

segment.source: The NVDA license is now formatted in HTML to improve readability. (#17600)
segment.target: NVDA licenca je sada formatirana kao HTML dokument kako bi se poboljala itljivost. (#17600)

segment.source: Short versions of the most commonly used command line options have been added: `-d` for `--disable-addons` and `-n` for `--lang`.
segment.target: Krae verzije najee korienih opcija komandne linije su dodate: `-d` za `--disable-addons` i `-n` za `--lang`.

segment.source: Prefix matching on command line flags, e.g. using `--di` for `--disable-addons` is no longer supported. (#11644, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Obraivanje prefiksa za opcije komandne linije, na primer korienje `--di` za `--disable-addons` vie nije podrano. (#11644, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: Changes to the COM Registration Fixing Tool: (#12355, @XLTechie)
segment.target: Promene za alatku ispravljanja COM registracije: (#12355, @XLTechie)

segment.source: It now starts with a more user friendly explanation of its purpose, instead of a warning. (#12351)
segment.target: Sada se pokree uz objanjenje svrhe koje je jasnije za korisnike, umesto upozorenja. (#12351)

segment.source: The initial window can now be exited with `escape` or `alt+f4`. (#10799)
segment.target: Prvi prozor se sada moe zatvoriti preicama `escape` ili `alt+f4`. (#10799)

segment.source: It will now show a message to the user, including the error, in the rare event of a Windows error while attempting COM re-registrations.
segment.target: Prikazae poruku korisniku, ukljuujui greku, u retkoj situaciji u kojoj dolazi do Windows greke prilikom ponovnog pokuaja COM registracije.

segment.source: Speech:
segment.target: Govor:

segment.source: Microsoft Speech API version 5 and Microsoft Speech Platform voices now use WASAPI for audio output, which may improve the responsiveness of those voices. (#13284, @gexgd0419)
segment.target: Microsoft Speech API verzija 5 i Microsoft Speech Platform glasovi sada koriste WASAPI za zvuni izlaz, to e moda poboljati brzinu ovih glasova. (#13284, @gexgd0419)

segment.source: The silence at the beginning of speech will now be trimmed when using OneCore voices, SAPI5 voices, and some third-party voice add-ons to improve their responsiveness. (#17614, @gexgd0419)
segment.target: Tiina na poetku govora e sada biti uklonjena kada se koriste OneCore glasovi, SAPI5 glasovi i neki dodaci za glasove drugih proizvoaa kako bi se poboljala brzina glasova. (#17614, @gexgd0419)

segment.source: Microsoft Speech API version 4 voices now use WASAPI for audio output, so that they can work with features such as audio ducking, leading silence trimming, and keeping audio device awake.
segment.target: Microsoft Speech API verzija 4 glasovi sada koriste WASAPI za zvuni izlaz, kako bi mogli da rade uz funkcije kao to su stiavanje pozadinskih zvukova, uklanjanje poetnih tiina i odravanje zvunog ureaja budnim.

segment.source: If this does not work with your SAPI 4 voice, you can disable WASAPI for SAPI 4 in Advanced settings. (#17718, #17801, @gexgd0419)
segment.target: Ako ovo ne radi uz va SAPI 4 glas, moete onemoguiti WASAPI za SAPI 4 u naprednim podeavanjima. (#17718, #17801, @gexgd0419)

segment.source: Unicode Normalization is now enabled by default for speech output. (#17017, @LeonarddeR).
segment.target: Unikodna standardizacija je sada podrazumevano omoguena za govor. (#17017, @LeonarddeR).

segment.source: You can still disable this functionality in the Speech category of the NVDA Settings dialog.
segment.target: Jo uvek moete onemoguiti ovu funkciju u kategoriji govor dijaloga NVDA podeavanja.

segment.source: The keyboard settings for "Speak typed characters" and "Speak typed words" now have three options: Off, Only in edit controls, and Always. (#17505, @Cary-rowen)
segment.target: Podeavanja tastature za "izgovor upisanih znakova" i "izgovor upisanih rei" sada imaju tri opcije: Iskljueno, samo u poljima za ureivanje i uvek. (#17505, @Cary-rowen)

segment.source: By default, "Speak typed characters" is now set to "Only in edit controls".
segment.target: Po podrazumevanim podeavanjima, "Izgovor upisanih znakova" je sada podeen na "samo u poljima za ureivanje".

segment.source: Default input and output braille tables can now be determined based on the NVDA language. (#17306, #16390, #290, @nvdaes)
segment.target: Podrazumevane ulazne i izlazne brajeve tabele se sada mogu odrediti na osnovu NVDA jezika. (#17306, #16390, #290, @nvdaes)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravljene greke

segment.source: Speech:
segment.target: Govor:

segment.source: Fixed an issue where continuous reading (say all) stopped at the end of the first sentence when using some SAPI5 synthesizers. (#16691, @gexgd0419)
segment.target: Ispravljena greka koja je izazivala da neprekidno itanje (izgovori sve) prestane na kraju prve reenice kada se koriste neki SAPI5 sintetizatori. (#16691, @gexgd0419)

segment.source: Voice parameters, such as rate and volume, will no longer be reset to default when using the synth settings ring to change between voices in the SAPI5 and SAPI4 synthesizer. (#17693, #2320, @gexgd0419)
segment.target: Glasovna podeavanja, kao to su brzina i jaina se vie nee vraati na podrazumevana kada koristite krug govornih podeavanja da menjate glasove SAPI5 i SAPI4 sintetizatora. (#17693, #2320, @gexgd0419)

segment.source: Fixed an issue where some SAPI4 voices (e.g. IBM TTS Chinese) cannot be loaded. (#17726, @gexgd0419)
segment.target: Ispravljena greka zbog koje neki SAPI4 glasovi (na primer kineski IBM TTS) nisu mogli da se uitaju. (#17726, @gexgd0419)

segment.source: Braille:
segment.target: Brajevi redovi:

segment.source: Native support for the Dot Pad tactile graphics device from Dot Inc as a multiline braille display. (#17007)
segment.target: Ugraena podrka za Dot Pad tactile graphics ureaj proizvoaa Dot Inc kao vielinijski brajev red. (#17007)

segment.source: When using the Seika Notetaker, space and space with dots gestures are now displayed correctly in the Input Gestures dialog. (#17047, @school510587)
segment.target: Kada se koristi Seika belenica, preice koje sadre razmak ili razmak sa takicama se sada ispravno prikazuju u dijalogu ulaznih komandi. (#17047, @school510587)

segment.source: NVDA should no longer play error sounds or spam the log file when using the display speech output braille mode while no braille display is connected. (#17092, @Emil-18)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne bi trebao da reprodukuje zvukove za greku ili bespotrebno popunjava datoteku dnevnika kada se koristi reim prikazivanja govora na brajevom redu dok nijedan brajev red nije povezan. (#17092, @Emil-18)

segment.source: When the Standard HID Braille Display driver is explicitly selected as the braille display driver, and the braille display list is opened, NVDA correctly identifies the HID driver as the selected driver instead of showing no driver selected. (#17537, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Kada je izabran standardni HID drajver za brajeve redove kao drajver za brajev red, i lista brajevih redova se otvori, NVDA ispravno prikazuje da je HID drajver izabran umesto da prikae da nijedan drajver nije izabran. (#17537, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: The Humanware Brailliant driver is now more reliable in selecting the right connection endpoint, resulting in better connection stability and less errors. (#17537, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Humanware Brailliant drajver je sada pouzdaniji u izboru ispravnog naina povezivanja, to donosi bolju stabilnost veze i manje greaka. (#17537, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Custom braille tables in the developer scratchpad are now properly ignored when running with add-ons disabled. (#17565, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Prilagoene brajeve tabele u scratchpad folderu za programere se sada ispravno zanemaruju kada je NVDA pokrenut sa onemoguenim dodacima. (#17565, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Microsoft Office:
segment.target: Microsoft Office:

segment.source: The command to "Report the destination URL of a link" now works as expected when using the legacy object model in Word, Outlook, Excel and PowerPoint. (#17292, #17362, #17435, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Komanda za prijavljivanje odredine adrese linka sada radi kako treba kada se koristi stariji objektni model u Wordu, Outlooku, Excelu i PowerPointu. (#17292, #17362, #17435, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: In Excel, the element list dialog (`NVDA+f7`) no longer fails to list comment or formulas on some non-English systems. (#11366, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: U Excelu, dijalog liste elemenata (`NVDA+f7`) sada ispravno prikazuje komentare i formule na nekim sistemima koji nisu na engleskom. (#11366, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: Improvements in PowerPoint:
segment.target: Poboljanja u PowerPointu:

segment.source: Caret reporting no longer breaks when text contains wide characters, such as emoji. (#17006 , @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Prijavljivanje kursora vie nee biti nepouzdano kada tekst sadri sloene znakove, kao to su emodiji. (#17006 , @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Character location reporting is now accurate (e.g. when pressing `NVDA+delete`. (#9941, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Prijavljivanje lokacije znaka je sada precizno (na primer kada se pritisne `NVDA+delete`. (#9941, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: NVDA no longer starts say all when starting a slide show and the browse mode setting "Automatic Say All on page load" is disabled. (#17488, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne zapoinje reim izgovori sve kada zaponete slajdou a podeavanje reima pretraivanja "Automatski Izgovori sve reim kada se uita stranica" je onemogueno. (#17488, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: LibreOffice:
segment.target: LibreOffice:

segment.source: When using the Microsoft Pinyin Input Method for Chinese and enabling the Pinyin compatibility option to use the previous version, typing in Writer (and potentially other applications) while an IME popup is showing no longer triggers an error. (#17198, @michaelweghorn)
segment.target: Kada se koristi Microsoft Pinyin nain unosa za kineski i omogui Pinyin opcija kompatibilnosti za korienje prethodne verzije, pisanje u Writeru (potencijalno i u drugim aplikacijama) dok je IME iskaui prozor prikazan vie ne izaziva greku. (#17198, @michaelweghorn)

segment.source: The current checkbox state (checked/unchecked) of checkboxes in dialogs is now also reported in braille, not just speech. (#17218, @michaelweghorn)
segment.target: Trenutno stanje izbornih polja (oznaeno/nije oznaeno) u dialozima se sada takoe prikazuje na brajevom redu, a ne samo izgovara. (#17218, @michaelweghorn)

segment.source: Math:
segment.target: Matematiki sadraj:

segment.source: Math reading has been fixed for some web elements.
segment.target: itanje matematikog sadraja je ispravljeno za neke Web elemente.

segment.source: Specifically, MathML inside of span and other elements that have the attribute `role="math"`. (#15058)
segment.target: Konkretno, MathML u okviru span i drugih elemenata koji imaju atribut `role="math"`. (#15058)

segment.source: Math equations only represented by an image and alt text with no MathML for rich navigation, are now treated like normal images, rather than math with no content, allowing the user to jump to them with `g` and to be able to arrow through the alt text by character. (#16007)
segment.target: Matematike jednaine koje su predstavljene slikom i alternativnim tekstom bez MathML-a za obogaenu navigaciju se sada tretiraju kao standardne slike, umesto matematikog sadraja bez sadraja, to dozvoljava korisniku da skoi do njih slovima `g` i da moe da se strelicama kree kroz alternativan tekst znak po znak. (#16007)

segment.source: IDEs:
segment.target: Programi za ureivanje koda:

segment.source: NVDA will no longer crash when selecting all text in certain source files in Android Studio or IntelliJ Idea. (#17418, @thgcode)
segment.target: NVDA se vie nee sruiti kada se izabere ceo tekst u odreenim datotekama izvornog koda u programima Android Studio ili IntelliJ Idea. (#17418, @thgcode)

segment.source: In Visual Studio Code, NVDA no longer hijacks the `alt+upArrow` and `alt+downArrow` gestures for sentence navigation. (#17082, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: U programu Visual Studio Code, NVDA vie ne preuzima preice `alt+strelicaGore` i `alt+strelicaDole` za kretanje po reenicama. (#17082, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Certain section elements are now correctly recognized as editable controls in Visual Studio Code. (#17573, @Cary-rowen)
segment.target: Odreeni elementi odeljka se sada ispravno prepoznaju kao polja za ureivanje u programu Visual Studio Code. (#17573, @Cary-rowen)

segment.source: In Notepad and other UIA documents, and Notepad++ documents on Windows 11, if the last line is empty, the "braille next line command" will move the cursor to the last line.
segment.target: U programu Notepad i drugim UIA dokumentima, kao i Notepad++ dokumentima na Windowsu 11, ako je poslednji red prazan, komanda za pomeranje brajevog reda na sledei red e pomeriti kursor na poslednji red.

segment.source: In any document, if the cursor is on the last line, it will be moved to the end when using this command. (#17251, #17430, @nvdaes)
segment.target: U bilo kom dokumentu, ako je kursor u poslednjem redu, bie pomeren na kraj kada se koristi ova komanda. (#17251, #17430, @nvdaes)

segment.source: Configuration profiles:
segment.target: Profili podeavanja:

segment.source: Braille is no longer dysfunctional when activating "say all" with an associated configuration profile. (#17163, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Brajevi redovi ispravno rade kada se aktivira reim "izgovori sve" profilom podeavanja. (#17163, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Fixed an issue where certain settings were explicitly saved to the active configuration profile even when the value of that setting was equal to the value in the base configuration. (#17157, @leonarddeR)
segment.target: Ispravljena greka zbog koje su se odreena podeavanja uvala u aktivnom profilu podeavanja ak i kada je vrednost tih podeavanja jednaka vrednosti standardnih podeavanja. (#17157, @leonarddeR)

segment.source: When spelling, unicode normalization now works more appropriately:
segment.target: Pri sricanju, unikodna standardizacija sada radi ispravnije:

segment.source: After reporting a normalized character, NVDA no longer incorrectly reports subsequent characters as normalized. (#17286, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Nakon to se prijavi standardizovan znak, NVDA vie nee neispravno prijaviti sve naredne znakove kao standardizovane. (#17286, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Composite characters (such as e) are now reported correctly. (#17295, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Sloeni znakovi (kao to su e) se sada ispravno prijavljuju. (#17295, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: NVDA is able to read the popup submenu items on Thunderbird search results page. (#4708, @thgcode)
segment.target: NVDA moe da ita stavke iskaueg podmenija na Thunderbird stranici rezultata pretrage. (#4708, @thgcode)

segment.source: The COM Registration Fixing Tool no longer reports success on failure. (#12355, @XLTechie)
segment.target: Alatka za ispravljanje COM registracije vie ne prijavljuje da je uspena ak i kada je dolo do greke. (#12355, @XLTechie)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer announce Windows 11 clipboard history entries when closing the window while items are present. (#17308, @josephsl)
segment.target: NVDA vie nee izgovarati stavke Windows 11 istorije privremene memorije kada se zatvori prozor dok su stavke prikazane. (#17308, @josephsl)

segment.source: If the plugins are reloaded while a browseable message is opened, NVDA will no longer fail to report subsequent focus moves. (#17323, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Ako se dodaci ponovo uitaju dok je otvorena poruka koja se moe istraiti, NVDA e ponovo prijavljivati naredne promene fokusa. (#17323, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: When using applications such as Skype, Discord, Signal and Phone Link for audio communication, NVDA speech and sounds no longer decrease in volume. (#17349, @jcsteh)
segment.target: Kada se koriste aplikacije kao to su Skype, Discord, Signal i Phone Link za audio komunikaciju, jaina NVDA govora i zvukova se vie nee smanjiti. (#17349, @jcsteh)

segment.source: Opening the NVDA Python Console will no longer fail in case an error occurs while retrieving snapshot variables. (#17391, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Otvaranje NVDA Python konzole vie nee biti neuspeno ako doe do greke pri pribavljanju varijabli. (#17391, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: In web browsers, changes to text selection no longer sometimes fail to be reported in editable text controls. (#17501, @jcsteh)
segment.target: U Web pretraivaima, promene izbora teksta vie nee ponekad prestati da se prijavljuju u tekstualnim kontrolama koje se mogu ureivati. (#17501, @jcsteh)

segment.source: When anchor links point to the same object as the virtual caret is placed, NVDA no longer fails to scroll to the link destination. (#17669, @nvdaes)
segment.target: Kada linkovi dovode do istog objekta na kom se virtuelni kursor ve nalazi, NVDA e se ispravno prebaciti na odredite linka. (#17669, @nvdaes)

segment.source: The NVDA Highlighter Window icon is no longer fixed in the taskbar after restarting Explorer. (#17696, @hwf1324)
segment.target: Ikona prozora NVDA obeleivaa vie ne ostaje fiksna na programskoj traci ako se istraiva ponovo pokrene. (#17696, @hwf1324)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Changes for Developers

segment.source: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.
segment.target: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.

segment.source: Note: this is an Add-on API compatibility breaking release.
segment.target: Note: this is an Add-on API compatibility breaking release.

segment.source: Add-ons will need to be re-tested and have their manifest updated.
segment.target: Add-ons will need to be re-tested and have their manifest updated.

segment.target: Updated SCons to 4.8.1. (#17254)

segment.target: Updated Robot Framework to 7.1.1. (#17329, @josephsl)

segment.target: Updated configobj to 5.1.0 commit `8be5462`. (#17328)

segment.target: Updated licensecheck to 2024.3. (#17440, @josephsl)

segment.target: Updated markdown to 3.7. (#17459, @josephsl)

segment.target: Updated nh3 0.2.19. (#17465, @josephsl)

segment.target: Updated nuitka to 2.5.4. (#17458, @josephsl)

segment.source: Updated schedule to 1.2.2. (#17455, @josephsl)
segment.target: Updated schedule to 1.2.2. (#17455, @josephsl)

segment.source: Updated requests to 2.32.3. (#17456, @josephsl)
segment.target: Updated requests to 2.32.3. (#17456, @josephsl)

segment.source: `ui.browseableMessage` may now be called with options to present a button for copying to clipboard, and/or a button for closing the window. (#17018, @XLTechie)
segment.target: `ui.browseableMessage` may now be called with options to present a button for copying to clipboard, and/or a button for closing the window. (#17018, @XLTechie)

segment.source: Several additions to identify link types (#16994, @LeonarddeR, @nvdaes)
segment.target: Several additions to identify link types (#16994, @LeonarddeR, @nvdaes)

segment.source: A new `utils.urlUtils` module with different functions to determine link types
segment.target: A new `utils.urlUtils` module with different functions to determine link types

segment.source: A new `INTERNAL_LINK` state has been added to `controlTypes.states.State`
segment.target: A new `INTERNAL_LINK` state has been added to `controlTypes.states.State`

segment.source: A new `linkType` property has been added on `NVDAObject`.
segment.target: A new `linkType` property has been added on `NVDAObject`.

segment.source: It queries the `treeInterceptor` by default, if any.
segment.target: It queries the `treeInterceptor` by default, if any.

segment.source: `BrowseModeTreeInterceptor` object has a new `documentUrl` property
segment.target: `BrowseModeTreeInterceptor` object has a new `documentUrl` property

segment.source: `BrowseModeTreeInterceptor` object has a new `getLinkTypeInDocument` method which accepts an URL to check the link type of the object
segment.target: `BrowseModeTreeInterceptor` object has a new `getLinkTypeInDocument` method which accepts an URL to check the link type of the object

segment.source: A `toggleBooleanValue` helper function has been added to `globalCommands`.
segment.target: A `toggleBooleanValue` helper function has been added to `globalCommands`.

segment.source: It can be used in scripts to report the result when a boolean is toggled in `config.conf`
segment.target: It can be used in scripts to report the result when a boolean is toggled in `config.conf`

segment.source: Removed the requirement to indent function parameter lists by two tabs from NVDA's Coding Standards, to be compatible with modern automatic linting. (#17126, @XLTechie)
segment.target: Removed the requirement to indent function parameter lists by two tabs from NVDA's Coding Standards, to be compatible with modern automatic linting. (#17126, @XLTechie)

segment.source: Added the [VS Code workspace configuration for NVDA](https://nvaccess.org/nvaccess/vscode-nvda) as a git submodule. (#17003)
segment.target: Added the [VS Code workspace configuration for NVDA](https://nvaccess.org/nvaccess/vscode-nvda) as a git submodule. (#17003)

segment.source: A new function, `gui.guiHelper.wxCallOnMain`, has been added, which allows safely and synchronously calling wx functions from non-GUI threads, and getting their return value. (#17304)
segment.target: A new function, `gui.guiHelper.wxCallOnMain`, has been added, which allows safely and synchronously calling wx functions from non-GUI threads, and getting their return value. (#17304)

segment.source: A new message dialog API has been added to `gui.message`. (#13007)
segment.target: A new message dialog API has been added to `gui.message`. (#13007)

segment.source: Added classes: `ReturnCode`, `EscapeCode`, `DialogType`, `Button`, `DefaultButton`, `DefaultButtonSet`, `MessageDialog`.
segment.target: Added classes: `ReturnCode`, `EscapeCode`, `DialogType`, `Button`, `DefaultButton`, `DefaultButtonSet`, `MessageDialog`.

segment.source: In the `brailleTables` module, a `getDefaultTableForCurrentLang` function has been added (#17222, @nvdaes)
segment.target: In the `brailleTables` module, a `getDefaultTableForCurrentLang` function has been added (#17222, @nvdaes)

segment.source: Added an `updateCheck.UpdateInfo` data class, which encapsulates metadata about NVDA updates. (#17310, @christopherpross)
segment.target: Added an `updateCheck.UpdateInfo` data class, which encapsulates metadata about NVDA updates. (#17310, @christopherpross)

segment.source: Retrieving the `labeledBy` property now works for:
segment.target: Retrieving the `labeledBy` property now works for:

segment.source: objects in applications implementing the `labelled-by` IAccessible2 relation. (#17436, @michaelweghorn)
segment.target: objects in applications implementing the `labelled-by` IAccessible2 relation. (#17436, @michaelweghorn)

segment.source: UIA elements supporting the corresponding `LabeledBy` UIA property. (#17442, @michaelweghorn)
segment.target: UIA elements supporting the corresponding `LabeledBy` UIA property. (#17442, @michaelweghorn)

segment.source: Added the ability to associate `wx.ComboBox` and a label `wx.StaticText` using `gui.guiHelper.associateElements`. (#17476)
segment.target: Added the ability to associate `wx.ComboBox` and a label `wx.StaticText` using `gui.guiHelper.associateElements`. (#17476)

segment.source: Added the following extension points (#17428, @ctoth):
segment.target: Added the following extension points (#17428, @ctoth):

segment.source: `inputCore.decide_handleRawKey`: called on each keypress
segment.target: `inputCore.decide_handleRawKey`: called on each keypress

segment.source: `speech.extensions.post_speechPaused`: called when speech is paused or unpaused
segment.target: `speech.extensions.post_speechPaused`: called when speech is paused or unpaused

segment.source: Changes to braille display auto detection registration in `bdDetect.DriverRegistrar`: (#17521, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Changes to braille display auto detection registration in `bdDetect.DriverRegistrar`: (#17521, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Added the `addUsbDevice` method to register one USB device at a time.
segment.target: Added the `addUsbDevice` method to register one USB device at a time.

segment.source: Added the `matchFunc` parameter to `addUsbDevices` which is also available on `addUsbDevice`.
segment.target: Added the `matchFunc` parameter to `addUsbDevices` which is also available on `addUsbDevice`.

segment.source: This way device detection can be constrained further in cases where a VID/PID-combination is shared by multiple devices across multiple drivers, or when a HID device offers multiple endpoints, for example.
segment.target: This way device detection can be constrained further in cases where a VID/PID-combination is shared by multiple devices across multiple drivers, or when a HID device offers multiple endpoints, for example.

segment.source: See the method documentation as well as examples in the albatross and brailliantB drivers for more information.
segment.target: See the method documentation as well as examples in the albatross and brailliantB drivers for more information.

segment.source: Added a new function, `utils.mmdevice.getOutputDevices`, to enumerate audio output devices. (#17678)
segment.target: Added a new function, `utils.mmdevice.getOutputDevices`, to enumerate audio output devices. (#17678)

segment.source: Added a new extension point `pre_synthSpeak` in `synthDriverHandler`, which will be called before the speech manager calls `speak` of the current synthesizer. (#17648)
segment.target: Added a new extension point `pre_synthSpeak` in `synthDriverHandler`, which will be called before the speech manager calls `speak` of the current synthesizer. (#17648)

segment.source: NVDA supports the `text-indent` IAccessible2 object attribute. (#13052, @michaelweghorn)
segment.target: NVDA supports the `text-indent` IAccessible2 object attribute. (#13052, @michaelweghorn)

segment.source: When a script using `gesture.send` is triggered with a gesture that includes `numLock` as a modifier, Num Lock is no longer turned off. (#10827, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: When a script using `gesture.send` is triggered with a gesture that includes `numLock` as a modifier, Num Lock is no longer turned off. (#10827, @CyrilleB79)

segment.target: API Breaking Changes

segment.target: These are breaking API changes.

segment.target: Please open a GitHub issue if your add-on has an issue with updating to the new API.

segment.target: The `addonStore.network.BASE_URL` constant has been removed.

segment.target: As the Add-on Store base URL is now configurable directly within NVDA, no replacement is planned. (#17099)

segment.target: The following symbols in `appModules.soffice` have been renamed (#6915, @michaelweghorn):

segment.target: `SymphonyDocument.announceToolbarButtonToggle` to `SymphonyDocument.announceFormattingGestureChange`

segment.target: The `space` keyword argument for `brailleDisplayDrivers.seikantk.InputGesture` now expects an `int` rather than a `bool`. (#17047, @school510587)

segment.target: The `[upgrade]` configuration section including `[upgrade][newLaptopKeyboardLayout]` has been removed. (#17191)

segment.source: `updateCheck.checkForUpdate` now returns an `UpdateInfo` object instead of a dictionary. (#17310, @christopherpross)
segment.target: `updateCheck.checkForUpdate` now returns an `UpdateInfo` object instead of a dictionary. (#17310, @christopherpross)

segment.source: Due to the retirement of NVDA's winmm support (#17496, #17532, #17678):
segment.target: Due to the retirement of NVDA's winmm support (#17496, #17532, #17678):

segment.source: The following symbols have been removed from `nvwave` without replacements: `CALLBACK_EVENT`, `CALLBACK_FUNCTION`, `CALLBACK_NULL`, `HWAVEOUT`, `LPHWAVEOUT`, `LPWAVEFORMATEX`, `LPWAVEHDR`, `MAXPNAMELEN`, `MMSYSERR_NOERROR`, `usingWasapiWavePlayer`, `WAVEHDR`, `WAVEOUTCAPS`, `waveOutProc`, `WAVE_MAPPER`, `WHDR_DONE`, `WinmmWavePlayer`, and `winmm`.
segment.target: The following symbols have been removed from `nvwave` without replacements: `CALLBACK_EVENT`, `CALLBACK_FUNCTION`, `CALLBACK_NULL`, `HWAVEOUT`, `LPHWAVEOUT`, `LPWAVEFORMATEX`, `LPWAVEHDR`, `MAXPNAMELEN`, `MMSYSERR_NOERROR`, `usingWasapiWavePlayer`, `WAVEHDR`, `WAVEOUTCAPS`, `waveOutProc`, `WAVE_MAPPER`, `WHDR_DONE`, `WinmmWavePlayer`, and `winmm`.

segment.source: The following symbols have been removed from `nvwave`: `getOutputDeviceNames`, `outputDeviceIDToName`, `outputDeviceNameToID`.
segment.target: The following symbols have been removed from `nvwave`: `getOutputDeviceNames`, `outputDeviceIDToName`, `outputDeviceNameToID`.

segment.source: Use `utils.mmdevice.getOutputDevices` instead.
segment.target: Use `utils.mmdevice.getOutputDevices` instead.

segment.source: `nvwave.WasapiWavePlayer` has been renamed to `WavePlayer`.
segment.target: `nvwave.WasapiWavePlayer` has been renamed to `WavePlayer`.

segment.source: `gui.settingsDialogs.AdvancedPanelControls.wasapiComboBox` has been removed.
segment.target: `gui.settingsDialogs.AdvancedPanelControls.wasapiComboBox` has been removed.

segment.source: The `WASAPI` key has been removed from the `audio` section of the config spec.
segment.target: The `WASAPI` key has been removed from the `audio` section of the config spec.

segment.source: The output from `nvwave.outputDeviceNameToID`, and input to `nvwave.outputDeviceIDToName` are now string identifiers.
segment.target: The output from `nvwave.outputDeviceNameToID`, and input to `nvwave.outputDeviceIDToName` are now string identifiers.

segment.source: The configuration key `config.conf["speech"]["outputDevice"]` has been removed.
segment.target: The configuration key `config.conf["speech"]["outputDevice"]` has been removed.

segment.source: It has been replaced by `config.conf["audio"]["outputDevice"]`, which stores a Windows core audio endpoint device ID. (#17547)
segment.target: It has been replaced by `config.conf["audio"]["outputDevice"]`, which stores a Windows core audio endpoint device ID. (#17547)

segment.source: The `outputDevice` parameter to `WasapiWavePlayer.__init__` should now only be passed string arguments.
segment.target: The `outputDevice` parameter to `WasapiWavePlayer.__init__` should now only be passed string arguments.

segment.source: The deprecated `closeWhenIdle` and `buffered` parameters to `WasapiWavePlayer.__init__` have been removed.
segment.target: The deprecated `closeWhenIdle` and `buffered` parameters to `WasapiWavePlayer.__init__` have been removed.

segment.source: In `NVDAObjects.window.scintilla.ScintillaTextInfo`, if no text is selected, the `collapse` method is overriden to expand to line if the `end` parameter is set to `True` (#17431, @nvdaes)
segment.target: In `NVDAObjects.window.scintilla.ScintillaTextInfo`, if no text is selected, the `collapse` method is overriden to expand to line if the `end` parameter is set to `True` (#17431, @nvdaes)

segment.source: The following symbols have been removed with no replacement: `languageHandler.getLanguageCliArgs`, `__main__.quitGroup` and `__main__.installGroup` . (#17486, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: The following symbols have been removed with no replacement: `languageHandler.getLanguageCliArgs`, `__main__.quitGroup` and `__main__.installGroup` . (#17486, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: Prefix matching on command line flags, e.g. using `--di` for `--disable-addons` is no longer supported. (#11644, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Prefix matching on command line flags, e.g. using `--di` for `--disable-addons` is no longer supported. (#11644, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: The `useAsFallBack` keyword argument of `bdDetect.DriverRegistrar` has been renamed to `useAsFallback`. (#17521, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: The `useAsFallBack` keyword argument of `bdDetect.DriverRegistrar` has been renamed to `useAsFallback`. (#17521, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: The `[addonStore][showWarning]` configuration setting has been removed.
segment.target: The `[addonStore][showWarning]` configuration setting has been removed.

segment.source: Instead use `addonStore.dataManager.addonDataManager.storeSettings.showWarning`. (#17597)
segment.target: Instead use `addonStore.dataManager.addonDataManager.storeSettings.showWarning`. (#17597)

segment.source: `ui.browseableMessage` now takes a parameter `sanitizeHtmlFunc`.
segment.target: `ui.browseableMessage` now takes a parameter `sanitizeHtmlFunc`.

segment.source: This defaults to `nh3.clean` with default arguments.
segment.target: This defaults to `nh3.clean` with default arguments.

segment.source: This means any HTML passed into `ui.browseableMessage` using `isHtml=True` is now sanitized by default.
segment.target: This means any HTML passed into `ui.browseableMessage` using `isHtml=True` is now sanitized by default.

segment.source: To change sanitization rules, such as whitelisting tags or attributes, create a function that calls `nh3.clean` with the desired parameters. (#16985)
segment.target: To change sanitization rules, such as whitelisting tags or attributes, create a function that calls `nh3.clean` with the desired parameters. (#16985)

segment.source: `updateCheck.UpdateAskInstallDialog` no longer automatically performs an action when the update or postpone buttons are pressed.
segment.target: `updateCheck.UpdateAskInstallDialog` no longer automatically performs an action when the update or postpone buttons are pressed.

segment.source: Instead, a `callback` property has been added, which returns a function that performs the appropriate action when called with the return value from the dialog. (#17582)
segment.target: Instead, a `callback` property has been added, which returns a function that performs the appropriate action when called with the return value from the dialog. (#17582)

segment.source: Dialogs opened with `gui.runScriptModalDialog` are now recognised as modal by NVDA. (#17582)
segment.target: Dialogs opened with `gui.runScriptModalDialog` are now recognised as modal by NVDA. (#17582)

segment.source: The following API symbols related to the setting "Automatically set system focus to focusable elements" have been removed with no replacement: (#17598)
segment.target: The following API symbols related to the setting "Automatically set system focus to focusable elements" have been removed with no replacement: (#17598)

segment.source: `globalCommands.GlobalCommands.script_toggleAutoFocusFocusableElements`
segment.target: `globalCommands.GlobalCommands.script_toggleAutoFocusFocusableElements`

segment.source: `config.conf["virtualBuffers"]["autoFocusFocusableElements"]`
segment.target: `config.conf["virtualBuffers"]["autoFocusFocusableElements"]`

segment.source: `gui.settingsDialogs.BrowseModePanel.autoFocusFocusableElementsCheckBox`
segment.target: `gui.settingsDialogs.BrowseModePanel.autoFocusFocusableElementsCheckBox`

segment.source: Because SAPI5 voices now use `nvwave.WavePlayer` to output audio: (#17592, @gexgd0419)
segment.target: Because SAPI5 voices now use `nvwave.WavePlayer` to output audio: (#17592, @gexgd0419)

segment.source: `synthDrivers.sapi5.SPAudioState` has been removed.
segment.target: `synthDrivers.sapi5.SPAudioState` has been removed.

segment.source: `synthDrivers.sapi5.SynthDriver.ttsAudioStream` has been removed.
segment.target: `synthDrivers.sapi5.SynthDriver.ttsAudioStream` has been removed.

segment.source: Instances of `autoSettingsUtils.driverSetting.DriverSetting` with an `id` that starts with an underscore (_) are no longer shown in NVDA's settings. (#17599)
segment.target: Instances of `autoSettingsUtils.driverSetting.DriverSetting` with an `id` that starts with an underscore (_) are no longer shown in NVDA's settings. (#17599)

segment.source: Changed keyboard typing echo configuration from boolean to integer values. (#17505, @Cary-rowen)
segment.target: Changed keyboard typing echo configuration from boolean to integer values. (#17505, @Cary-rowen)

segment.source: `config.conf["keyboard"]["speakTypedCharacters"]` and `config.conf["keyboard"]["speakTypedWords"]` now use integer values.
segment.target: `config.conf["keyboard"]["speakTypedCharacters"]` and `config.conf["keyboard"]["speakTypedWords"]` now use integer values.

segment.source: Added `TypingEcho` enum in `config.configFlags` to represent these modes, 0=Off, 1=Only in edit controls, 2=Always.
segment.target: Added `TypingEcho` enum in `config.configFlags` to represent these modes, 0=Off, 1=Only in edit controls, 2=Always.

segment.source: `gui.settingsDialogs.KeyboardSettingsPanel.wordsCheckBox` and `gui.settingsDialogs.KeyboardSettingsPanel.charsCheckBox` has been removed.
segment.target: `gui.settingsDialogs.KeyboardSettingsPanel.wordsCheckBox` and `gui.settingsDialogs.KeyboardSettingsPanel.charsCheckBox` has been removed.

segment.source: The `winUser.paint` has been renamed from `painStruct` to `paintStruct`, fixing a bug where passing in a `PAINTSTRUCT` would raise an exception. (#17744)
segment.target: The `winUser.paint` has been renamed from `painStruct` to `paintStruct`, fixing a bug where passing in a `PAINTSTRUCT` would raise an exception. (#17744)

segment.source: `documentationUtils.getDocFilePath` and `installer.getDocFilePath` no longer look for `.txt` files in locale documentation folders. (#17911, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: `documentationUtils.getDocFilePath` and `installer.getDocFilePath` no longer look for `.txt` files in locale documentation folders. (#17911, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Deprecations

segment.source: The `braille.filter_displaySize` extension point is deprecated.
segment.target: The `braille.filter_displaySize` extension point is deprecated.

segment.source: Please use `braille.filter_displayDimensions` instead. (#17011)
segment.target: Please use `braille.filter_displayDimensions` instead. (#17011)

segment.source: The `gui.message.messageBox` and `gui.runScriptModalDialog` functions, and `gui.nvdaControls.MessageDialog` class are deprecated.
segment.target: The `gui.message.messageBox` and `gui.runScriptModalDialog` functions, and `gui.nvdaControls.MessageDialog` class are deprecated.

segment.source: Use `gui.message.MessageDialog` instead. (#17582)
segment.target: Use `gui.message.MessageDialog` instead. (#17582)

segment.source: The following symbols are deprecated (#17486, @CyrilleB79):
segment.target: The following symbols are deprecated (#17486, @CyrilleB79):

segment.source: `NoConsoleOptionParser`, `stringToBool`, `stringToLang` in `__main__`; use the same symbols in `argsParsing` instead.
segment.target: `NoConsoleOptionParser`, `stringToBool`, `stringToLang` in `__main__`; use the same symbols in `argsParsing` instead.

segment.source: `__main__.parser`; use `argsParsing.getParser()` instead.
segment.target: `__main__.parser`; use `argsParsing.getParser()` instead.

segment.source: `bdDetect.DeviceType` is deprecated in favour of `bdDetect.ProtocolType` and `bdDetect.CommunicationType` to take into account the fact that both HID and Serial communication can take place over USB and Bluetooth. (#17537 , @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: `bdDetect.DeviceType` is deprecated in favour of `bdDetect.ProtocolType` and `bdDetect.CommunicationType` to take into account the fact that both HID and Serial communication can take place over USB and Bluetooth. (#17537 , @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix bugs with braille devices and reading math in Chromium.
segment.target: Ovo je manje auriranje kako bi se ispravile greke sa brajevim ureaima i itanjem matematikog sadraja u Chromiumu.

segment.source: Bug fixes
segment.target: Ispravljene greke

segment.source: Fixed bug with with reading math in Chromium Browsers (Chrome, Edge). (#17421, @NSoiffer)
segment.target: Ispravljena greka sa itanjem matematikog sadraja sa Chromium pretraivaima (Chrome, Edge). (#17421, @NSoiffer)

segment.source: Humanware Brailliant BI 40X devices running firmware version 2.4 now work as expected. (#17518, @bramd)
segment.target: Humanware Brailliant BI 40X ureaji sa verzijom softvera 2.4 sada rade ispravno. (#17518, @bramd)

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix a bug when saving speech symbol dictionaries.
segment.target: Ovo je manje auriranje kako bi se ispravila greka sa uvanjem renika izgovora simbola.

segment.source: Bug fixes
segment.target: Ispravljene greke

segment.source: Fixed bug where speech symbols dictionaries were not saved and the dialog would not be closed. (#17344)
segment.target: Ispravljena greka zbog koje se renici izgovora simbola nisu sauvali i dijalog se nije zatvorio. (#17344)

segment.source: This release includes a number of improvements in Microsoft Office, braille, and document formatting.
segment.target: Ova verzija ukljuuje brojna poboljanja za Microsoft Office, brajeve redove i formatiranje dokumenata.

segment.source: In Word or Excel, it is now possible to double-press the comment gesture to read the comment or note in a browsable dialog.
segment.target: U programima Word i Excel, sada je mogue dva puta pritisnuti komandu za itanje komentara kako biste proitali komentar ili napomenu u dijalogu koji se moe istraiti.

segment.source: You can now use the review cursor selection command to select text in PowerPoint.
segment.target: Sada moete koristiti komandu izbora preglednim kursorom kako biste izabrali tekst u programu PowerPoint.

segment.source: NVDA also no longer brailles garbage characters when showing row or column header text in tables in Word when using the object model.
segment.target: NVDA takoe vie ne prikazuje besmislene znakove na brajevom redu kada se prikazuje tekst zaglavlja reda ili kolone u tabelama u Wordu kada se koristi objektni model.

segment.source: NVDA can now be configured to report font attributes in speech and braille separately.
segment.target: NVDA se sada moe podesiti da odvojeno izgovori ili prikae atribute fonta na brajevom redu.

segment.source: A new setting has been added to configure the timeout to perform a multiple press gesture, such as the report time/date command.
segment.target: Dodato je novo podeavanje za odreivanje vremena isteka za izvravanje komande koja zahteva vie uzastopnih pritiskanja, kao to je komanda za prijavljivanje vremena i datuma.

segment.source: You can now configure how NVDA shows text formatting in braille, and set NVDA to show the start of paragraphs in braille.
segment.target: Sada moete da podesite kako e NVDA prikazivati formatiranje teksta na brajevom redu, ili podesiti NVDA da prikazuje poetak pasusa na brajevom redu.

segment.source: NVDA can now speak the character at the cursor when performing a braille cursor routing action.
segment.target: NVDA sada moe da izgovori znak na poziciji kursora kada se izvrava radnja pomeranja brajevog kursora.

segment.source: Cursor routing reliability has been improved, and support for routing keys in PowerPoint has been added.
segment.target: Poboljana je pouzdanost pomeranja brajevog kursora, i dodata je podrka za tastere za pomeranje kursora u programu PowerPoint.

segment.source: All lines of cells will now be used when using a multi-line braille display via HID braille.
segment.target: Svi redovi elija e se sada koristiti kada se koristi vielinijski brajev red uz HID brajev protokol.

segment.source: NVDA is no longer unstable after restarting NVDA during an automatic Braille Bluetooth scan.
segment.target: NVDA vie nije nestabilan nakon to se ponovo pokrene u toku automatskog Bluetooth skeniranja brajevih redova.

segment.source: The minimum required version of Poedit that works with NVDA is now version 3.5.
segment.target: Najmanja neophodna verzija programa Poedit koja radi uz NVDA je sada verzija 3.5.

segment.source: eSpeak NG has been updated, adding support for the Faroese and Xextan languages.
segment.target: eSpeak NG je auriran, dodajui podrku za jezike farski i Xextan.

segment.source: LibLouis has been updated, adding new Braille tables for Thai and Greek international braille with single-cell accented letters.
segment.target: LibLouis je auriran, dodajui nove brajeve tabele za tajlandski i grki meunarodni brajev kod sa akcentovanim slovima na jednoj eliji.

segment.source: There have also been a number of fixes, including to mouse tracking in Firefox, and the on-demand speech mode.
segment.target: Takoe su ispravljene brojne greke, ukljuujui za praenje mia u Firefoxu i reim govora na zahtev.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove karakteristike

segment.source: New braille features:
segment.target: Nove brajeve karakteristike:

segment.source: It is now possible to change the way NVDA displays certain text formatting attributes in braille.
segment.target: Sada je mogue promeniti nain na koji NVDA prikazuje odreene atribute formatiranja teksta na brajevom redu.

segment.source: The available options are:
segment.target: Dostupne opcije su:

segment.source: Liblouis (default): Uses formatting markers defined in the selected braille table.
segment.target: Liblouis (podrazumevano): Koristi oznake formatiranja koje su definisane u izabranoj brajevoj tabeli.

segment.source: Tags: Uses start and end tags to denote where certain font attributes begin and end. (#16864)
segment.target: Oznake: Koristi oznake poetka i kraja kako bi se oznailo gde odreeni atributi poinju a gde se zavravaju. (#16864)

segment.source: When the "Read by paragraph" option is enabled, NVDA can now be configured to indicate the start of paragraphs in braille. (#16895, @nvdaes)
segment.target: Kada se omogui opcija "itaj po pasusima", NVDA se sada moe podesiti da oznai poetak pasusa na brajevom redu. (#16895, @nvdaes)

segment.source: When performing a braille cursor routing action, NVDA can now automatically speak the character at the cursor. (#8072, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Kada se izvrava radnja pomeranja brajevog kursora, NVDA sada moe automatski da izgovara znak na poziciji kursora. (#8072, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: This option is disabled by default.
segment.target: Ova opcija je podrazumevano onemoguena.

segment.source: You can enable "Speak character when routing cursor in text" in NVDA's braille settings.
segment.target: Moete da omoguite "Izgovori znak kada se kursor pomera po tekstu" u NVDA brajevim podeavanjima.

segment.source: The comment command in Microsoft Word and notes command in Microsoft Excel can now be pressed twice to show the comment or note in a browsable message. (#16800, #16878, @Cary-Rowen)
segment.target: Komande za itanje komentara u Microsoft Wordu i napomena u Microsoft Excelu se sada mogu pritisnuti dva puta kako bi prikazale komentar ili napomenu u poruci koja se moe istraiti. (#16800, #16878, @Cary-Rowen)

segment.source: NVDA can now be configured to report font attributes in speech and braille separately. (#16755)
segment.target: NVDA sada moe biti podeen da odvojeno izgovara ili prijavljuje atribute fonta na brajevom redu. (#16755)

segment.source: The timeout to perform a multiple keypress is now configurable; this may be especially useful for people with dexterity impairment. (#11929, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Vreme isteka pre izvravanja komande koja zahteva vie uzastopnih pritiskanja se sada moe podesiti; ovo moe biti posebno od pomoi ljudima sa motorikim potekoama. (#11929, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promene

segment.source: The `-c`/`--config-path` and `--disable-addons` command line options are now respected when launching an update from within NVDA. (#16937)
segment.target: Opcije komandne linije `-c`/`--config-path` i `--disable-addons` se sada uzimaju u obzir kada se auriranje pokrene iz programa NVDA. (#16937)

segment.source: Component updates:
segment.target: Aurirane komponente:

segment.source: Updated LibLouis Braille translator to [3.31.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.31.0). (#17080, @LeonarddeR, @codeofdusk)
segment.target: Auriran LibLouis brajev prevodilac na [3.31.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.31.0). (#17080, @LeonarddeR, @codeofdusk)

segment.source: Fixed translation of numbers in Spanish Braille.
segment.target: Ispravljeno prikazivanje brojeva na panskom brajevom pismu.

segment.source: New Braille tables:
segment.target: Nove brajeve tabele:

segment.source: Thai grade 1
segment.target: Tajlandski stepen 1

segment.source: Greek international Braille (single-cell accented letters)
segment.target: Grki meunarodni brajev kod (akcentovana slova na jednoj eliji)

segment.source: Renamed tables:
segment.target: Preimenovane tabele:

segment.source: "Thai 6 dot" was renamed to "Thai grade 0" for consistency reasons.
segment.target: "Tajlandski esotakasti brajev kod" je preimenovan u "Tajlandski stepen 0" kako bi se odrala doslednost.

segment.source: The existing "Greek international braille" table was renamed to "Greek international braille (2-cell accented letters)" to clarify the distinction between the two Greek systems.
segment.target: Postojea tabela "grki meunarodni brajev kod" je preimenovana u "grki meunarodni brajev kod(dve elije za akcentovana slova)" kako bi se pojasnila razlika izmeu dva grka brajeva sistema.

segment.source: eSpeak NG has been updated to 1.52-dev commit `961454ff`. (#16775)
segment.target: eSpeak NG je auriran na 1.52-dev commit `961454ff`. (#16775)

segment.source: Added new languages Faroese and Xextan.
segment.target: Dodati novi jezici farski i xextan.

segment.source: When using a multi-line braille display via the standard HID braille driver, all lines of cells will be used. (#16993, @alexmoon)
segment.target: Kada se koristi vielinijski brajev red uz standardni HID brajev drajver, koristie se svi redovi brajevih elija. (#16993, @alexmoon)

segment.source: The stability of NVDA's Poedit support has been improved with the side effect that the minimum required version of Poedit is now version 3.5. (#16889, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Poboljana je stabilnost NVDA podrke za Poedit uz neeljeni efekat da je najmanja neophodna verzija Poedita sada verzija 3.5. (#16889, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravljene greke

segment.source: Braille fixes:
segment.target: Ispravke za brajeve redove:

segment.source: It is now possible to use braille display routing keys to move the text cursor in Microsoft PowerPoint. (#9101)
segment.target: Sada je mogue koristiti tastere za pomeranje brajevog reda da biste pomerali kursor teksta u Microsoft PowerPointu. (#9101)

segment.source: When accessing Microsoft Word without UI Automation, NVDA no longer outputs garbage characters in table headers defined with the set row and column header commands. (#7212)
segment.target: Kada pristupate Microsoft Wordu bez UI Automation, NVDA vie ne prikazuje besmislene znakove u zaglavljima tabele koji su definisani komandama za postavljanje zaglavlja kolona i redova. (#7212)

segment.source: The Seika Notetaker driver now correctly generates braille input for space, backspace and dots with space/backspace gestures. (#16642, @school510587)
segment.target: Seika Notetaker drajver sada uspeno generie brajev unos za komande koje ukljuuju razmak, backspace i take sa razmakom ili tasterom backspace. (#16642, @school510587)

segment.source: Cursor routing is now much more reliable when a line contains one or more Unicode variation selectors or decomposed characters. (#10960, @mltony, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Pomeranje kursora je sada dosta pouzdanije kada red sadri jedan ili vie izbora unikodne varijacije ili razloenih znakova. (#10960, @mltony, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: NVDA no longer throws an error when panning the braille display forward in some empty edit controls. (#12885)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne prikazuje greku kada se brajev red pomera napred u nekim praznim kontrolama za ureivanje. (#12885)

segment.source: NVDA is no longer unstable after restarting NVDA during an automatic Braille Bluetooth scan. (#16933)
segment.target: NVDA vie nije nestabilan nakon to se ponovo pokrene tokom automatskog Bluetooth skeniranja brajevih redova. (#16933)

segment.source: It is now possible to use the review cursor selection commands to select text in Microsoft PowerPoint. (#17004)
segment.target: Sada je mogue koristiti komande izbora preglednim kursorom da biste izabrali tekst u Microsoft PowerPointu. (#17004)

segment.source: In on-demand speech mode, NVDA does not talk any more when a message is opened in Outlook, when a new page is loaded in a browser, or when displaying a new slide in a PowerPoint slideshow. (#16825, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: U reimu govora na zahtev, NVDA vie nee priati kada se poruka otvori u Outlooku, kada se nova stranica uita u pretraivau, ili kada se prikazuje novi slajd u PowerPoint prikazu slajdova. (#16825, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox, moving the mouse over text before or after a link now reliably reports the text. (#15990, @jcsteh)
segment.target: U Mozilli Firefox, pomeranje mia po tekstu pre ili posle linka sada pouzdano prijavljuje tekst. (#15990, @jcsteh)

segment.source: NVDA no longer occasionally fails to open browsable messages (such as pressing `NVDA+f` twice). (#16806, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: NVDA vie nee ponekad imati problema sa otvaranjem poruke koja se moe istraiti (kao to je pritiskanje `NVDA+f` dva puta). (#16806, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Updating NVDA while add-on updates are pending no longer results in the add-on being removed. (#16837)
segment.target: Auriranje programa NVDA dok se eka na auriranje nekog dodatka vie nee izazvati da se taj dodatak ukloni. (#16837)

segment.source: It is now possible to interact with Data validation dropdown lists in Microsoft Excel 365. (#15138)
segment.target: Sada je mogue vriti interakciju sa padajuim listama provere podataka u Microsoft Excelu 365. (#15138)

segment.source: NVDA is no longer as sluggish when arrowing up and down through large files in VS Code. (#17039)
segment.target: NVDA vie nije toliko spor kada se strelicama gore i dole kreete kroz velike datoteke u programu VS Code. (#17039)

segment.source: NVDA no longer becomes unresponsive after holding down an arrow key for a long time while in browse mode, particularly in Microsoft Word and Microsoft Outlook. (#16812)
segment.target: NVDA vie nee prestajati da se odaziva nakon to se dri strelica dole tokom dueg perioda u reimu pretraivanja, posebno u Microsoft Wordu i Microsoft Outlooku. (#16812)

segment.source: NVDA no longer reads the last line when the cursor is on the second-last line of a multiline edit control in Java applications. (#17027)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne ita poslednji red kada je kursor u pretposlednjem redu vielinijske kontrole za ureivanje u Java aplikacijama. (#17027)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promene za programere (engleski)

segment.source: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.
segment.target: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.

segment.source: Component updates:
segment.target: Component updates:

segment.source: Updated py2exe to 0.13.0.2 (#16907, @dpy013)
segment.target: Updated py2exe to 0.13.0.2 (#16907, @dpy013)

segment.source: Updated setuptools to 72.0 (#16907, @dpy013)
segment.target: Updated setuptools to 72.0 (#16907, @dpy013)

segment.source: Updated Ruff to 0.5.6. (#16868, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Updated Ruff to 0.5.6. (#16868, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Updated nh3 to 0.2.18 (#17020, @dpy013)
segment.target: Updated nh3 to 0.2.18 (#17020, @dpy013)

segment.source: Added a `.editorconfig` file to NVDA's repository in order for several IDEs to pick up basic NVDA code style rules by default. (#16795, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Added a `.editorconfig` file to NVDA's repository in order for several IDEs to pick up basic NVDA code style rules by default. (#16795, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Added support for custom speech symbol dictionaries. (#16739, #16823, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Added support for custom speech symbol dictionaries. (#16739, #16823, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Dictionaries can be provided in locale specific folders in an add-on package, e.g. `locale\en`.
segment.target: Dictionaries can be provided in locale specific folders in an add-on package, e.g. `locale\en`.

segment.source: Dictionary metadata can be added to an optional `symbolDictionaries` section in the add-on manifest.
segment.target: Dictionary metadata can be added to an optional `symbolDictionaries` section in the add-on manifest.

segment.source: Please consult the [Custom speech symbol dictionaries section in the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#AddonSymbolDictionaries) for more details.
segment.target: Please consult the [Custom speech symbol dictionaries section in the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#AddonSymbolDictionaries) for more details.

segment.source: It is now possible to redirect objects retrieved from on-screen coordinates, by using the `NVDAObject.objectFromPointRedirect` method. (#16788, @Emil-18)
segment.target: It is now possible to redirect objects retrieved from on-screen coordinates, by using the `NVDAObject.objectFromPointRedirect` method. (#16788, @Emil-18)

segment.source: Running SCons with the parameter `--all-cores` will automatically pick the maximum number of available CPU cores. (#16943, #16868, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Running SCons with the parameter `--all-cores` will automatically pick the maximum number of available CPU cores. (#16943, #16868, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Developer info now includes information on app architecture (such as AMD64) for the navigator object. (#16488, @josephsl)
segment.target: Developer info now includes information on app architecture (such as AMD64) for the navigator object. (#16488, @josephsl)

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Deprecations

segment.source: The `bool` configuration key `[documentFormatting][reportFontAttributes]` is deprecated for removal in 2025.1, instead use `[fontAttributeReporting]`. (#16748)
segment.target: The `bool` configuration key `[documentFormatting][reportFontAttributes]` is deprecated for removal in 2025.1, instead use `[fontAttributeReporting]`. (#16748)

segment.source: The new key has an `int` value matching an `OutputMode` `enum` with options for speech, braille, speech and braille and off.
segment.target: The new key has an `int` value matching an `OutputMode` `enum` with options for speech, braille, speech and braille and off.

segment.source: API consumers can use the `bool` value as previously, or check the `OutputMode` if handling speech or braille specifically.
segment.target: API consumers can use the `bool` value as previously, or check the `OutputMode` if handling speech or braille specifically.

segment.source: These keys are currently synchronized until 2025.1.
segment.target: These keys are currently synchronized until 2025.1.

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.UIA.InaccurateTextChangeEventEmittingEditableText` is deprecated with no replacement. (#16817, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: `NVDAObjects.UIA.InaccurateTextChangeEventEmittingEditableText` is deprecated with no replacement. (#16817, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix a bug with the automatic add-on update notification.
segment.target: Ovo je manje auriranje kako bi se ispravila greka sa obavetenjem o automatskim auriranjima dodataka.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravljene greke

segment.source: When automatically checking for add-on updates, NVDA no longer freezes on poor connections. (#17036)
segment.target: Kada se vre automatske provere auriranja dodataka, NVDA se vie nee smrzavati sa slabijim Internet vezama. (#17036)

segment.source: The Add-on Store will now notify you if any add-on updates are available on NVDA startup.
segment.target: Prodavnica dodataka e vas sada obavestiti ako postoje auriranja za vae dodatke kada se NVDA pokrene.

segment.source: There are now options to apply Unicode normalization to speech and braille output.
