segment.source: An NVDA script is no longer treated as being repeated if an unrelated key press happens in between the two executions of the script. (#11388)
segment.target: NVDA skripta se vie nee ponaati kao da je ponovljena ako se neki drugi taster nevezan za tu skriptu pritisne pre pokretanja skripte. (#11388)

segment.source: Strong and emphasis tags in Internet Explorer can again be suppressed from being reported by turning off Report Emphasis in NVDA's Document Formatting settings. (#11808)
segment.target: Oznake naglaenog teksta se ponovo mogu onemoguiti u programu Internet explorer kada se onemogui opcija naglaavanja u dijalogu formatiranja dokumenta NVDA podeavanja. (#11808)

segment.source: A freeze of several seconds experienced by a small amount of users when arrowing between cells in Excel should no longer occur. (#11818)
segment.target: Prestanak rada od nekoliko sekundi za neke korisnike vie nebi trebalo da se deava kada se kreete strelicama kroz elije u programu Excel. (#11818)

segment.source: In Microsoft Teams builds with version numbers like 1.3.00.28xxx, NVDA no longer fails reading messages in chats or Teams channels due to an incorrectly focused menu. (#11821)
segment.target: U aplikaciji Microsoft Teams sa verzijama kao to su 1.3.00.28xxx, NVDA vie nee biti onemoguen da ita poruke askanja zbog neispravno fokusiranog menija. (#11821)

segment.source: Text marked both as being a spelling and grammar error at the same time in Google Chrome will be appropriately announced as both a spelling and grammar error by NVDA. (#11787)
segment.target: Tekst koji je u isto vreme oznaen i kao pravopisna i kao gramatika greka u programu Google Chrome e ispravno biti prijavljen od strane programa NVDA kao pravopisna i gramatika greka. (#11787)

segment.source: When using Outlook (French locale), the shortcut for 'Reply all' (control+shift+R) works again. (#11196)
segment.target: Kada koristite Outlook (Francuski jezik), preica za opciju "Odgovori svima" (control+ift+R) ponovo radi. (#11196)

segment.source: In Visual Studio, IntelliSense tool tips that provide additional details about the currently selected IntelliSense item are now only reported once. (#11611)
segment.target: U aplikaciji Visual Studio, IntelliSense opisi alata koji pruaju dodatne detalje o trenutno izabranoj IntelliSense stavci se sada prijavljuju samo jednom. (#11611)

segment.source: In Windows 10 Calculator, NVDA will not announce progress of calculations if speak typed characters is disabled. (#9428)
segment.target: U aplikaciji Windows 10 Kalkulator, NVDA nee izgovarati napredak raunanja ako je opcija izgovori ukucane znakove onemoguena. (#9428)

segment.source: NVDA no longer crashes when using English US grade 2 and expand to computer Braille at the cursor is on, when displaying certain content such as a URL in Braille. (#11754)
segment.target: NVDA se vie ne rui kada se koristi tabela Engleski ameriki stepen 2 i opcija Proiri na kompjuterski brajev kod za re na poziciji kursora je ukljuena, kada se prikazuje odreen sadraj kao to je Internet adresa. (#11754)

segment.source: It is again possible to report formatting information for the focused Excel cell using NVDA+F. (#11914)
segment.target: Ponovo je mogue prijaviti informacije o formatiranju za fokusiranu Excel eliju komandom NVDA+F. (#11914)

segment.source: QWERTY input on Papenmeier braille displays that support it again works and no longer causes NVDA to randomly freeze. (#11944)
segment.target: QWERTY unos na Papenmeier brajevim redovima koji ga podravaju ponovo radi i vie ne izaziva nasumina smrzavanja programa NVDA. (#11944)

segment.source: In Chromium based browsers, several cases were solved where table navigation didn't work and NVDA didn't report the number of rows/columns of the table. (#12359)
segment.target: U pretraivaima zasnovanim na Chromiumu, reeno je nekoliko sluajeva u kojima navigacija po tabelama nije radila i NVDA nije prijavljivao broj redova i kolona tabele. (#12359)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promene za programere (engleski)

segment.source: System tests can now send keys using spy.emulateKeyPress, which takes a key identifier that conforms to NVDA's own key names, and by default also blocks until the action is executed. (#11581)
segment.target: System tests can now send keys using spy.emulateKeyPress, which takes a key identifier that conforms to NVDA's own key names, and by default also blocks until the action is executed. (#11581)

segment.source: NVDA no longer requires the current directory to be the NVDA application directory in order to function. (#6491)
segment.target: NVDA no longer requires the current directory to be the NVDA application directory in order to function. (#6491)

segment.source: The aria live politeness setting for live regions can now be found on NVDA Objects using the liveRegionPoliteness property. (#11596)
segment.target: The aria live politeness setting for live regions can now be found on NVDA Objects using the liveRegionPoliteness property. (#11596)

segment.source: It is now possible to define separate gestures for Outlook and Word document. (#11196)
segment.target: It is now possible to define separate gestures for Outlook and Word document. (#11196)

segment.source: This release includes several large improvements to stability and performance particularly in Microsoft Office applications. There are new settings to toggle touchscreen support and graphics reporting.
segment.target: Ova verzija ukljuuje znaajna poboljanja u stabilnosti i brzini posebno u Microsoft Office aplikacijama. Takoe su dodata nova podeavanja za podrku ekrana osetljivog na dodir i prijavljivanje slika.

segment.source: The existence of marked (highlighted) content can be reported in browsers, and there are new German braille tables.
segment.target: Postojanje obeleenog (markiranog) sadraja se moe prijaviti u pretraivaima, i takoe su dodate nove Nemake brajeve tabele.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove karakteristike

segment.source: You can now toggle reporting of graphics from NVDA's document formatting settings. Note that disabling this option will still read the alternative texts of graphics. (#4837)
segment.target: Sada moete da omoguite ili onemoguite prijavljivanje slika u panelu podeavanja formatiranja dokumenta. Napomena da ak i kada je ova opcija onemoguena, alternativni tekstovi za slike e se itati. (#4837)

segment.source: You can now toggle NVDA's touchscreen support. An option has been added to the Touch Interaction panel of NVDA's settings. The default gesture is NVDA+control+alt+t. (#9682)
segment.target: Sada moete da omoguite ili onemoguite NVDA podrku za ekrane osetljive na dodir. Dodata je opcija u panel za interakciju sa ekranima osetljivim na dodir u NVDA podeavanjima. Podrazumevana komanda je NVDA+control+alt+t. (#9682)

segment.source: Added new German braille tables. (#11268)
segment.target: Dodate nove Nemake brajeve tabele. (#11268)

segment.source: NVDA now detects read-only text UIA controls. (#10494)
segment.target: NVDA sada prepoznaje tekstualne UIA kontrole koje se samo mogu itati. (#10494)

segment.source: The existence of marked (highlighted) content is reported in both speech and braille in all web browsers. (#11436)
segment.target: Postojanje markiranog (obeleenog) sadraja se sada izgovara i prijavljuje na brajevom redu u svim Web pretraivaima. (#11436)

segment.source: This can be toggled on and off by a new NVDA Document Formatting option for Highlighting.
segment.target: This can be toggled on and off by a new NVDA Document Formatting option for Highlighting.

segment.source: New emulated system keyboard keys can be added from NVDA's Input gestures dialog. (#6060)
segment.target: Novi emulirani sistemski tasteri se mogu dodati u NVDA dijalogu za ulazne komande. (#6060)

segment.source: To do this, press the add button after you selected the Emulated system keyboard keys category.
segment.target: Da biste ovo uradili, pritisnite dugme dodaj nakon to ste izabrali kategoriju emulirani tasteri sistemske tastature.

segment.source: Handy Tech Active Braille with joystick is now supported. (#11655)
segment.target: Brajev red Handy Tech Active Braille sa dojstikom je sada podran. (#11655)

segment.source: "Automatic focus mode for caret movement" setting is now compatible with disabling "Automatically set focus to focusable elements". (#11663)
segment.target: Opcija "Automatski reim fokusiranja za pomeranje kursora" sada se moe koristiti kada je onemoguena opcija "Automatski postavi sistemski fokus na elemente koji se mogu fokusirati". (#11663)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promene

segment.source: The Report formatting script (NVDA+f) has now been changed to report the formatting at the system caret rather than at the review cursor position. To report formatting at the review cursor position now use NVDA+shift+f. (#9505)
segment.target: Skripta za prijavljivanje formatiranja (NVDA+f) je sada promenjena kako bi prijavljivala formatiranje na poziciji sistemskog kursora umesto preglednog kursora programa NVDA. Da biste dobili formatiranje za poziciju preglednog kursora sada koristite NVDA+ift+f. (#9505)

segment.source: NVDA no longer automatically sets the system focus to focusable elements by default in browse mode, improving performance and stability. (#11190)
segment.target: NVDA sada po podrazumevanim podeavanjima ne pomera sistemski fokus na elemente koji se mogu fokusirati u reimu pretraivanja, to poboljava brzinu i stabilnost. (#11190)

segment.source: CLDR updated from version 36.1 to version 37. (#11303)
segment.target: CLDR auriran sa verzije 36.1 na verziju 37. (#11303)

segment.source: Updated eSpeak-NG to 1.51-dev, commit 1fb68ffffea4
segment.target: Auriran eSpeak-NG na 1.51-dev, commit 1fb68ffffea4

segment.source: You can now utilize table navigation in list boxes with checkable list items when the particular list has multiple columns. (#8857)
segment.target: Sada moete da koristite navigaciju kroz tabele u listama sa elementima koji se mogu ekirati ako lista ima vie kolona. (#8857)

segment.source: In the Add-ons manager, when prompted to confirm removal of an add-on, "No" is now the default. (#10015)
segment.target: U dijalogu za upravljanje dodacima, kada je neophodno da potvrdite uklanjanje dodatka, "ne" je sada podrazumevano dugme. (#10015)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, the Elements List dialog now presents formulas in their localized form. (#9144)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Excel, lista elemenata sada prikazuje ispravno lokalizovane formule. (#9144)

segment.source: NVDA now reports the correct terminology for notes in MS Excel. (#11311)
segment.target: NVDA sada prijavljuje ispravne termine za napomene u programu Excel. (#11311)

segment.source: When using the "move review cursor to focus" command in browse mode, the review cursor is now set at the position of the virtual caret. (#9622)
segment.target: Kada koristite komandu "Prebaci pregledni kursor na fokus " u reimu pretraivanja, pregledni kursor se sada postavlja na poziciju virtuelnog kursora. (#9622)

segment.source: Information reported in browse mode, such as the formatting info with NVDA+F, are now displayed in a slightly bigger window centered on screen. (#9910)
segment.target: Informacije koje se prijavljuju u reimu pretraivanja, kao to su informacije o formatiranju komandom NVDA+F, sada su prikazane u malo veem prozoru i centrirane su na ekranu. (#9910)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravljene greke

segment.source: NVDA now always speaks when navigating by word and landing on any single symbol followed by white space, whatever the verbosity settings. (#5133)
segment.target: NVDA sada uvek govori kada se kreete re po re i doete do simbola koji je odvojen razmakom bez obzira na podeavanja. (#5133)

segment.source: In applications using QT 5.11 or newer, object descriptions are again reported. (#8604)
segment.target: U aplikacijama koje koriste QT 5.11 ili noviji, opisi objekata se ponovo prijavljuju. (#8604)

segment.source: When deleting a word with control+delete, NVDA no longer remains silent. (#3298, #11029)
segment.target: Kada briete re preicom control+delete, NVDA vie nee biti bez izgovora. (#3298, #11029)

segment.source: Now the word to the right of the deleted word is announced.
segment.target: Sada se re desno od obrisane rei izgovara.

segment.source: In general settings panel, the language list is now sorted correctly. (#10348)
segment.target: U panelu optih podeavanja, lista jezika se sada ispravno sortira. (#10348)

segment.source: In the Input Gestures dialog, significantly improved performance while filtering. (#10307)
segment.target: U dijalogu za ulazne komande, bitno poboljana brzina kada se komande filtriraju. (#10307)

segment.source: You can now send Unicode characters beyond U+FFFF from a braille display. (#10796)
segment.target: Sada moete slati unikodne znakove vee od U+FFFF sa brajevog reda. (#10796)

segment.source: NVDA will announce Open With dialog content in Windows 10 May 2020 Update. (#11335)
segment.target: NVDA e ispravno izgovarati dijaloge za otvaranje datoteka u Windows 10 May 2020 auriranju. (#11335)

segment.source: A new experimental option in Advanced settings (Enable selective registration for UI Automation events and property changes) can provide major performance improvements in Microsoft Visual Studio and other UIAutomation based applications if enabled. (#11077, #11209)
segment.target: Nova eksperimentalna opcija u naprednim podeavanjima (Omogui selektivno registrovanje za UI Automation dogaaje i promene svojstava) moe da prui ogromna poboljanja u brzini programa Microsoft Visual Studio i drugim UIAutomation aplikacijama ako je omoguena. (#11077, #11209)

segment.source: For checkable list items, the selected state is no longer announced redundantly, and if applicable, the unselected state is announced instead. (#8554)
segment.target: Za stavke u listama koje se mogu ekirati, status opcije koja je izabrana se vie ne izgovara bespotrebno, i ako je to sluaj, umesto toga izgovorie se kada stavka nije izabrana. (#8554)

segment.source: On Windows 10 May 2020 Update, NVDA now shows the Microsoft Sound Mapper when viewing output devices from synthesizer dialog. (#11349)
segment.target: Na Windows 10 May 2020 auriranju, NVDA sada prikazuje Microsoft Sound Mapper kada se prikazuju izlazni ureaji u dijalogu za izbor sintetizatora. (#11349)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer, numbers are now announced correctly for ordered lists if the list does not start with 1. (#8438)
segment.target: U programu Internet Explorer, brojevi se ispravno izgovaraju za liste sa nabrajanjem ako lista ne poinje brojem 1. (#8438)

segment.source: In Google chrome, NVDA will now report not checked for all checkable controls (not just check boxes) that are currently not checked. (#11377)
segment.target: U programu Google chrome, NVDA e sada prijaviti nije oznaeno za sve kontrole koje se mogu oznaiti (ne samo izborna polja) koje trenutno nisu oznaene. (#11377)

segment.source: It is once again possible to navigate in various controls when NVDA's language is set to Aragonese. (#11384)
segment.target: Ponovo je mogue kretanje kroz razliite kontrole kada je NVDA jezik podeen na Aragonski. (#11384)

segment.source: NVDA should no longer sometimes freeze in Microsoft Word when rapidly arrowing up and down or typing characters with Braille enabled. (#11431, #11425, #11414)
segment.target: NVDA vie nee ponekad prestajati sa radom u programu Microsoft Word kada se brzo kreete strelicama ili piete znakove uz brajev red. (#11431, #11425, #11414)

segment.source: NVDA no longer appends nonexistent trailing space when copying the current navigator object to the clipboard. (#11438)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne dodaje nepostojee razmake kada se navigacioni objekat kopira. (#11438)

segment.source: NVDA no longer activates the Say All profile if there is nothing to read. (#10899, #9947)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne aktivira profil izgovori sve ako nema ta da se proita. (#10899, #9947)

segment.source: NVDA is no longer unable to read the features list in Internet Information Services (IIS) Manager. (#11468)
segment.target: NVDA sada moe da ita listu opcija u Internet Information Services (IIS) menaderu. (#11468)

segment.source: NVDA now keeps the audio device open improving performance on some sound cards (#5172, #10721)
segment.target: NVDA sada ne zatvara izlazni zvuni ureaj to e poboljati brzinu na odreenim zvunim kartama (#5172, #10721)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer freeze or exit when holding down control+shift+downArrow in Microsoft Word. (#9463)
segment.target: NVDA vie nee izlaziti ili prestajati sa radom kada drite control+ift+strelicu dole u programu Microsoft Word. (#9463)

segment.source: The expanded / collapsed state of directories in the navigation treeview on drive.google.com is now always reported by NVDA. (#11520)
segment.target: Proireno ili skupljeno stanje foldera u prikazu stabla navigacije na sajtu drive.google.com se sada uvek prijavljuje od strane NVDA. (#11520)

segment.source: NVDA will auto detect the NLS eReader Humanware braille display via Bluetooth as its Bluetooth name is now "NLS eReader Humanware". (#11561)
segment.target: NVDA e automatski prepoznati NLS eReader Humanware brajev red putem Bluetooth veze budui da je njegovo Bluetooth ime sada "NLS eReader Humanware". (#11561)

segment.source: Major performance improvements in Visual Studio Code. (#11533)
segment.target: Znaajno poboljana brzina korienja aplikacije Visual Studio Code. (#11533)

segment.source: Changes For Developers
segment.target: Promene za programere (engleski)

segment.source: The GUI Helper's BoxSizerHelper.addDialogDismissButtons supports a new "separated" keyword argument, for adding a standard horizontal separator to dialogs (other than messages and single input dialogs). (#6468)
segment.target: The GUI Helper's BoxSizerHelper.addDialogDismissButtons supports a new "separated" keyword argument, for adding a standard horizontal separator to dialogs (other than messages and single input dialogs). (#6468)

segment.source: Additional properties were added to app modules, including path for the executable (appPath), is a Windows Store app (isWindowsStoreApp), and machine architecture for the app (appArchitecture). (#7894)
segment.target: Additional properties were added to app modules, including path for the executable (appPath), is a Windows Store app (isWindowsStoreApp), and machine architecture for the app (appArchitecture). (#7894)

segment.source: It is now possible to create app modules for apps hosted inside wwahost.exe on Windows 8 and later. (#4569)
segment.target: It is now possible to create app modules for apps hosted inside wwahost.exe on Windows 8 and later. (#4569)

segment.source: A fragment of the log can now be delimited and then copied to clipboard using NVDA+control+shift+F1. (#9280)
segment.target: A fragment of the log can now be delimited and then copied to clipboard using NVDA+control+shift+F1. (#9280)

segment.source: NVDA-specific objects that are found by Python's cyclic garbage collector are now logged when being deleted by the collector to aide in removing reference cycles from NVDA. (#11499)
segment.target: NVDA-specific objects that are found by Python's cyclic garbage collector are now logged when being deleted by the collector to aide in removing reference cycles from NVDA. (#11499)

segment.source: The majority of NVDA's classes are tracked including NVDAObjects, appModules, GlobalPlugins, SynthDrivers, and TreeInterceptors.
segment.target: The majority of NVDA's classes are tracked including NVDAObjects, appModules, GlobalPlugins, SynthDrivers, and TreeInterceptors.

segment.source: A class that needs to be tracked should inherit from garbageHandler.TrackedObject.
segment.target: A class that needs to be tracked should inherit from garbageHandler.TrackedObject.

segment.source: Significant debug logging for MSAA events can be now enabled in NVDA's Advanced settings. (#11521)
segment.target: Significant debug logging for MSAA events can be now enabled in NVDA's Advanced settings. (#11521)

segment.source: MSAA winEvents for the currently focused object are no longer filtered out along with other events if the event count for a given thread is exceeded. (#11520)
segment.target: MSAA winEvents for the currently focused object are no longer filtered out along with other events if the event count for a given thread is exceeded. (#11520)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include support for a new braille display from Nattiq, better support for ESET antivirus GUI and Windows Terminal, performance improvements in 1Password, and with Windows OneCore synthesizer. Plus many other important bug fixes and improvements.
segment.target: Glavne karakteristike ove verzije ukljuuju podrku za novi brajev red kompanije Nattiq, bolju podrku za ESET antivirus interfejs i Windows Terminal, poboljanja u brzini korienja aplikacije 1Password, kao i uz Windows OneCore sintetizator. Uz puno dodatnih ispravljenih greaka i poboljanja.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove karakteristike

segment.source: Support for new braille displays:
segment.target: Podrka za nove brajeve redove:

segment.source: Nattiq nBraille (#10778)
segment.target: Nattiq nBraille (#10778)

segment.source: Added script to open NVDA configuration directory (no default gesture). (#2214)
segment.target: Dodata skripta za otvaranje NVDA foldera sa podeavanjima (bez podrazumevane komande). (#2214)

segment.source: Better support for ESET antivirus GUI. (#10894)
segment.target: Bolja podrka za interfejs programa ESET antivirus. (#10894)

segment.source: Added support for Windows Terminal. (#10305)
segment.target: Dodata podrka za Windows Terminal. (#10305)

segment.source: Added a command to report the active configuration profile (no default gesture). (#9325)
segment.target: Dodata skripta za prijavljivanje aktivnog profila podeavanja (bez podrazumevane komande). (#9325)

segment.source: Added a command to toggle reporting of subscripts and superscripts (no default gesture). (#10985)
segment.target: Dodata skripta za menjanje statusa prijavljivanja indeksa i eksponenata (bez podrazumevane komande). (#10985)

segment.source: Web applications (E.G. Gmail) no longer speak outdated information when moving focus rapidly. (#10885)
segment.target: Web aplikacije (na primer Gmail) vie ne izgovaraju nevaee informacije kada se fokus menja brzo. (#10885)

segment.source: This experimental fix must be manually enabled via the 'Attempt to cancel speech for expired focus events' option in the advanced settings panel.
segment.target: Ovo eksperimentalno podeavanje se mora runo omoguiti korienjem opcije "Pokuavanje otkazivanja govora za kontrole koje vie nisu fokusirane " u panelu sa naprednim podeavanjima.

segment.source: Many more symbols have been added to the default symbols dictionary. (#11105)
segment.target: Puno novih simbola je dodato u renik sa simbolima. (#11105)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promene

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator from 3.12 to [3.14.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.14.0). (#10832, #11221)
segment.target: Auriran liblouis brajev prevodilac sa 3.12 na [3.14.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.14.0). (#10832, #11221)

segment.source: The reporting of superscripts and subscripts is now controlled separately to the reporting of font attributes. (#10919)
segment.target: Prijavljivanje indeksa i eksponenata se sada moe podesiti posebno od ostalih atributa fonta. (#10919)

segment.source: Due to changes made in VS Code, NVDA no longer disables browse mode in Code by default. (#10888)
segment.target: Zbog promena u aplikaciji VS Code, NVDA vie nee onemoguiti reim pretraivanja u Code po podrazumevanim podeavanjima. (#10888)

segment.source: NVDA no longer reports "top" and "bottom" messages when moving the review cursor directly to the first or last line of the current navigator object with the move to top and move to bottom review cursor scripts respectively. (#9551)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne izgovara "Vrh" i "Dno" kada se pregledni kursor direktno pomera na poetak ili kraj reda navigacionog objekta. (#9551)

segment.source: NVDA no longer reports "left" and "right" messages when directly moving the review cursor to the first or last character of the line for the current navigator object with the move to beginning of line and move to end of line review cursor scripts respectively. (#9551)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne izgovara "Levo" i "Desno" kada se pregledni kursor direktno pomera na prvi ili poslednji znak reda navigacionog objekta. (#9551)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravljene greke

segment.source: NVDA now starts correctly when the log file cannot be created. (#6330)
segment.target: NVDA se sada ispravno pokree kada datoteka sa dnevnikom ne moe da se kreira. (#6330)

segment.source: In recent releases of Microsoft Word 365, NVDA will no longer announce "delete back word" when Control+Backspace is pressed while editing a document. (#10851)
segment.target: U novijim verzijama aplikacije Microsoft Word 365, NVDA vie nee izgovarati "obrisana re u nazad" kada se pritisne ctrl plus backspace u toku ureivanja dokumenta. (#10851)

segment.source: In Winamp, NVDA will once again announce toggle status of shuffle and repeat. (#10945)
segment.target: U programu Winamp, NVDA e ponovo izgovarati menjanje statusa funkcija nasumine reprodukcije i ponavljanja. (#10945)

segment.source: NVDA is no longer extremely sluggish when moving within the list of items in 1Password. (#10508)
segment.target: NVDA vie nije veoma spor kada se pomerate u listi stavki programa 1Password. (#10508)

segment.source: The Windows OneCore speech synthesizer no longer lags between utterances. (#10721)
segment.target: Windows OneCore sintetizator govora vie nema due pauze izmeu izgovorenih reenica. (#10721)

segment.source: NVDA no longer freezes when you open the context menu for 1Password in the system notification area. (#11017)
segment.target: NVDA vie nee prestati sa radom kada otvorite kontekstni meni za 1Password u sistemskoj traci za obavetenja. (#11017)

segment.source: In Office 2013 and older:
segment.target: U Office paketu 2013 i starijim verzijama:

segment.source: Ribbons are announced when focus moves to them for the first time. (#4207)
segment.target: Trake menija se izgovaraju kada se prvi put fokusirate na njih. (#4207)

segment.source: Context menu items are once again reported properly. (#9252)
segment.target: Stavke kontekstnog menija se ponovo ispravno prijavljuju. (#9252)

segment.source: Ribbon sections are consistently announced when navigating with Control+arrows. (#7067)
segment.target: Sekcije traka menija se ispravno prijavljuju kada se kreete kroz njih korienjem kombinacije ctrl plus strelice. (#7067)

segment.source: In browse mode in Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome, text no longer incorrectly appears on a separate line when web content uses CSS display: inline-flex. (#11075)
segment.target: U reimu pretraivanja aplikacija Mozilla Firefox i Google Chrome, sadraj se nee neispravno prikazivati na posebnim redovima kada web autori koriste CSS display: inline-flex. (#11075)

segment.source: In browse mode with Automatically set system focus to focusable elements disabled, it is now possible to activate elements that aren't focusable.
segment.target: U reimu pretraivanja sa onemoguenom opcijom automatsko postavljanje fokusa na elemente koji se mogu fokusirati, mogue je aktivirati elemente koji se ne mogu fokusirati.

segment.source: In browse mode with Automatically set system focus to focusable elements disabled, it is now possible to activate elements reached by pressing the tab key. (#8528)
segment.target: U reimu pretraivanja sa onemoguenom opcijom automatsko postavljanje fokusa na elemente koji se mogu fokusirati, mogue je aktivirati elemente do kojih se dolazi tasterom tab. (#8528)

segment.source: In browse mode with Automatically set system focus to focusable elements disabled, activating certain elements no longer clicks in an incorrect location. (#9886)
segment.target: U reimu pretraivanja sa onemoguenom opcijom automatsko postavljanje fokusa na elemente koji se mogu fokusirati, aktiviranje odreenih elemenata vie nee izazivati klik na neispravnoj lokaciji. (#9886)

segment.source: NVDA error sounds are no longer heard when accessing DevExpress text controls. (#10918)
segment.target: NVDA nee vie reprodukovati zvukove za greku kada se pristupa tekstualnim DevExpress kontrolama. (#10918)

segment.source: The tool-tips of the icons in the system tray are no longer reported upon keyboard navigation if their text is equal to the name of the icons, to avoid double announcing. (#6656)
segment.target: Opisi alata za ikonice na sistemskoj traci se vie ne izgovaraju u toku navigacije ako je njihovo ime jednako imenu ikonice, kako bi se izbeglo dvostruko izgovaranje. (#6656)

segment.source: In browse mode with 'Automatically set system focus to focusable elements' disabled, switching to focus mode with NVDA+space now focuses the element under the caret. (#11206)
segment.target: U reimu pretraivanja sa onemoguenom opcijom "Automatsko postavljanje fokusa na elemente koji se mogu fokusirati", prebacivanje u reim fokusiranja komandom NVDA plus razmak fokusira element na poziciji kursora. (#11206)

segment.source: It is once again possible to check for NVDA updates on certain systems; e.g. clean Windows installs. (#11253)
segment.target: Ponovo je mogue da proverite nova NVDA auriranja na nekim sistemima gde ovo nije ispravno radilo; na primer nove Windows instalacije. (#11253)

segment.source: Focus is not moved in Java application when the selection is changed in an unfocused tree, table or list. (#5989)
segment.target: Fokus u Java aplikacijama se nee menjati kada se izbor promeni u tabelama, listama ili prikazima stabla koji nisu fokusirani. (#5989)

segment.source: Changes For Developers
segment.target: Promene za programere (engleski)

segment.source: execElevated and hasUiAccess have moved from config module to systemUtils module. Usage via config module is deprecated. (#10493)
segment.target: execElevated and hasUiAccess have moved from config module to systemUtils module. Usage via config module is deprecated. (#10493)

segment.source: Updated configobj to 5.1.0dev commit f9a265c4. (#10939)
segment.target: Updated configobj to 5.1.0dev commit f9a265c4. (#10939)

segment.source: Automated testing of NVDA with Chrome and a HTML sample is now possible. (#10553)
segment.target: Automated testing of NVDA with Chrome and a HTML sample is now possible. (#10553)

segment.source: IAccessibleHandler has been converted into a package, OrderedWinEventLimiter has been extracted to a module and unit tests added (#10934)
segment.target: IAccessibleHandler has been converted into a package, OrderedWinEventLimiter has been extracted to a module and unit tests added (#10934)

segment.source: Updated BrlApi to version 0.8 (BRLTTY 6.1). (#11065)
segment.target: Updated BrlApi to version 0.8 (BRLTTY 6.1). (#11065)

segment.source: Status bar retrieval may now be customized by an AppModule. (#2125, #4640)
segment.target: Status bar retrieval may now be customized by an AppModule. (#2125, #4640)

segment.source: NVDA no longer listens for IAccessible EVENT_OBJECT_REORDER. (#11076)
segment.target: NVDA no longer listens for IAccessible EVENT_OBJECT_REORDER. (#11076)

segment.source: A broken ScriptableObject (such as a GlobalPlugin missing a call to its base class' init method) no longer breaks NVDA's script handling. (#5446)
segment.target: A broken ScriptableObject (such as a GlobalPlugin missing a call to its base class' init method) no longer breaks NVDA's script handling. (#5446)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include support for several new braille displays from HumanWare and APH, plus many other important bug fixes such as the ability to again read math in Microsoft Word using MathPlayer / MathType.
segment.target: Glavne karakteristike ove verzije ukljuuju podrku za nove brajeve redove proizvoaa HumanWare i APH, kao i puno drugih vanih ispravljenih greaka kao to su mogunost itanja matematikih izraza u programu Microsoft Word korienjem programa MathPlayer / MathType.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove karakteristike

segment.source: The currently selected item in listboxes is again presented in browse mode in Chrome, similar to NVDA 2019.1. (#10713)
segment.target: Trenutno izabrana stavka liste se ponovo izgovara u reimu pretraivanja programa Chrome, slino kao u verziji NVDA 2019.1. (#10713)

segment.source: You can now perform right mouse clicks on touch devices by doing a one finger tap and hold. (#3886)
segment.target: Sada moete da izvrite desni klik mia ekranom osetljivim na dodir tako to jednim prstom dodirnete i zadrite. (#3886)

segment.source: Support for New braille displays: APH Chameleon 20, APH Mantis Q40, HumanWare BrailleOne, BrailleNote Touch v2, and NLS eReader. (#10830)
segment.target: Podrka za nove brajeve redove: APH Chameleon 20, APH Mantis Q40, HumanWare BrailleOne, BrailleNote Touch v2, i NLS eReader. (#10830)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promene

segment.source: NVDA will prevent the system from locking or going to sleep when in say all. (#10643)
segment.target: NVDA e spreiti sistem da se zakljua ili ode u stanje spavanja u reimu izgovori sve. (#10643)

segment.source: Support for out-of-process iframes in Mozilla Firefox. (#10707)
segment.target: Podrka za okvire van procesa u programu Mozilla Firefox. (#10707)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to version 3.12. (#10161)
segment.target: Auriran liblouis brajev prevodilac na verziju 3.12. (#10161)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravljene greke

segment.source: Fixed NVDA not announcing Unicode minus symbol (U+2212). (#10633)
segment.target: Unikodni simbol za minus se sada ponovo izgovara (U+2212) (#10633)

segment.source: When installing add-on from add-ons manager, names of files and folders in the browse window are no longer reported twice. (#10620, #2395)
segment.target: Kada se instalira dodatak iz menadera dodataka, imena datoteka i foldera u prozoru za pretragu se vie ne izgovaraju dva puta. (#10620, #2395)

segment.source: In Firefox, when loading Mastodon with the advanced web interface enabled, all timelines now render correctly in browse mode. (#10776)
segment.target: U programu Firefox, kada se uitava sajt Mastodon sa omoguenim naprednim Web interfejsom, sve vremenske linije se ispravno uitavaju u reimu pretraivanja. (#10776)

segment.source: In browse mode, NVDA now reports "not checked" for unchecked check boxes where it sometimes didn't previously. (#10781)
segment.target: U reimu pretraivanja, NVDA sada ispravno prijavljuje "Nije oznaeno" za izborna polja koja nisu oznaena u situacijama u kojima se ovo nije izgovaralo. (#10781)

segment.source: ARIA switch controls no longer report confusing information such as "not pressed checked" or "pressed checked". (#9187)
segment.target: ARIA kontrole za prekidae Eng. Switch vie ne prijavljuju zbunjujue informacije kao to su "nije pritisnuto oznaeno" ili "pritisnuto oznaeno". (#9187)

segment.source: SAPI4 voices should no longer refuse to speak certain text. (#10792)
segment.target: SAPI4 glasovi vie nebi trebalo da odbijaju da izgovaraju odreene tekstove. (#10792)

segment.source: NVDA can again read and interact with math equations in Microsoft Word. (#10803)
segment.target: NVDA ponovo moe da ita i vri interakciju sa matematikim izrazima u programu Microsoft Word. (#10803)

segment.source: NVDA will again announce text being unselected in browse mode if pressing an arrow key while text is selected. (#10731).
segment.target: NVDA e ponovo izgovoriti tekst koji vie nije oznaen u reimu pretraivanja ako se pritisne neka od strelica nakon to se tekst oznai. (#10731).

segment.source: NVDA no longer exits if there is an error initializing eSpeak. (#10607)
segment.target: NVDA se vie nee zatvarati ako je dolo do greke u inicijalizaciji sintetizatora eSpeak. (#10607)

segment.source: Errors caused by unicode in translations for shortcuts no longer stop the installer, mitigated by falling back to the English text. (#5166, #6326)
segment.target: Greke u preicama koje su izazvane unikodnim prevodima vie ne zaustavljaju instalaciju, ovo se reava tako to se tekst preica vraa na Engleski. (#5166, #6326)

segment.source: Arrowing out and away from lists and tables in sayAll with skim reading enabled no longer continuously announces exiting the list or table. (#10706)
segment.target: Izlazak ili pomeranje iz liste i tabele u reimu pretraivanja uz opciju izgovori sve i povrno itanje vie nee neprekidno izgovarati izlazak iz tabele i liste. (#10706)

segment.source: Fix mouse tracking for some MSHTML elements in Internet Explorer. (#10736)
segment.target: Ispravljeno praenje mia za neke MSHTML elemente u programu Internet Explorer. (#10736)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promene za programere (engleski)

segment.source: Developer documentation is now build using sphinx. (#9840)
segment.target: Developer documentation is now build using sphinx. (#9840)

segment.source: Several speech functions have been split into two. (#10593)
segment.target: Several speech functions have been split into two. (#10593)

segment.source: The speakX version remains, but now depends on a getXSpeech function which returns a speech sequence.
segment.target: The speakX version remains, but now depends on a getXSpeech function which returns a speech sequence.

segment.source: speakObjectProperties now relies on getObjectPropertiesSpeech
segment.target: speakObjectProperties now relies on getObjectPropertiesSpeech

segment.source: speakObject now relies on getObjectSpeech
segment.target: speakObject now relies on getObjectSpeech

segment.source: speakTextInfo now relies on getTextInfoSpeech
segment.target: speakTextInfo now relies on getTextInfoSpeech

segment.source: speakWithoutPauses has been converted into a class, and refactored, but should not break compatibility.
segment.target: speakWithoutPauses has been converted into a class, and refactored, but should not break compatibility.

segment.source: getSpeechForSpelling is deprecated (though still available) use getSpellingSpeech instead.
segment.target: getSpeechForSpelling is deprecated (though still available) use getSpellingSpeech instead.

segment.source: Private changes that should not affect addon developers:
segment.target: Private changes that should not affect addon developers:

segment.source: _speakPlaceholderIfEmpty is now _getPlaceholderSpeechIfTextEmpty
segment.target: _speakPlaceholderIfEmpty is now _getPlaceholderSpeechIfTextEmpty

segment.source: _speakTextInfo_addMath is now _extendSpeechSequence_addMathForTextInfo
segment.target: _speakTextInfo_addMath is now _extendSpeechSequence_addMathForTextInfo

segment.source: Speech 'reason' has been converted to an Enum, see controlTypes.OutputReason class. (#10703)
segment.target: Speech 'reason' has been converted to an Enum, see controlTypes.OutputReason class. (#10703)

segment.source: Module level 'REASON_*' constants are deprecated.
segment.target: Module level 'REASON_*' constants are deprecated.

segment.source: Compiling NVDA dependencies now requires Visual Studio 2019 (16.2 or newer). (#10169)
segment.target: Compiling NVDA dependencies now requires Visual Studio 2019 (16.2 or newer). (#10169)

segment.source: Updated SCons to version 3.1.1. (#10169)
segment.target: Updated SCons to version 3.1.1. (#10169)

segment.source: Again allow behaviors._FakeTableCell to have no location defined (#10864)
segment.target: Again allow behaviors._FakeTableCell to have no location defined (#10864)

segment.source: NVDA 2019.3 is a very significant release containing many under-the-hood changes including the upgrade of Python 2 to Python 3, and a major re-write of NVDA's speech subsystem.
segment.target: NVDA 2019.3 je veoma znaajno auriranje koje ukljuuje puno promena u strukturi kao to su prelazak sa Python 2 na Python 3, kao i nove mogunosti u kodu za govor programa NVDA.

segment.source: Although these changes do break compatibility with older NVDA add-ons, the upgrade to Python 3 is necessary for security, and the changes to speech allow for some exciting innovations in the near future.
segment.target: Iako ove promene izazivaju nekompatibilnosti starijih NVDA dodataka, auriranje na Python 3 je neophodno zbog bolje bezbednosti, a promene u govoru dozvoljavaju vrlo uzbudljive inovacije u bliskoj budunosti.

segment.source: Other highlights in this release include 64 bit support for Java VMs, Screen Curtain and Focus Highlight functionality, support for more braille displays and a new Braille viewer, and many many other bug fixes.
segment.target: Druge prednosti ove verzije ukljuuju podrku za 64 bitne Java aplikacije, funkcije zatamnjivanja ekrana i oznaavanja fokusa, podrku za nove brajeve redove i novi preglednik brajevog reda, i puno drugih ispravljenih greaka.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove karakteristike

segment.source: The accuracy of the move mouse to navigator object command has been improved in text fields in Java applications. (#10157)
segment.target: Preciznost komande postavi mi na navigacioni objekat je znaajno poboljana u tekstualnim poljima u Java aplikacijama. (#10157)

segment.source: Added support for the following Handy Tech Braille displays (#8955):
segment.target: Dodata podrka za sledee Handy Tech brajeve redove (#8955):

segment.source: Basic Braille Plus 40
segment.target: Basic Braille Plus 40

segment.source: Basic Braille Plus 32
segment.target: Basic Braille Plus 32

segment.source: Connect Braille
segment.target: Connect Braille

segment.source: All user-defined gestures can now be removed via a new "Reset to factory defaults" button in the Input Gestures dialog. (#10293)
segment.target: Sve korisniki definisane komande se sada mogu ukloniti korienjem novog dugmeta "vrati na fabrike vrednosti" u dijalogu ulazne komande. (#10293)

segment.source: Font reporting in Microsoft Word now includes if text is marked as hidden. (#8713)
segment.target: Prijavljivanje fonta u aplikaciji Microsoft Word sada ukljuuje da li je tekst oznaen kao skriven. (#8713)

segment.source: Added a command to move the review cursor to the position previously set as start marker for selection or copy: NVDA+shift+F9. (#1969)
segment.target: Dodata komanda za premetanje preglednog kursora na poziciju koja je prethodno oznaena za izbor ili kopiranje: NVDA+ift+F9. (#1969)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer, Microsoft Edge and recent versions of Firefox and Chrome, landmarks are now reported in focus mode and object navigation. (#10101)
segment.target: U programima Internet Explorer, Microsoft Edge i novijim verzijama pretraivaa Firefox i Chrome, orjentiri se sada prijavljuju u reimu fokusiranja i objektnoj navigaciji. (#10101)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer, Google Chrome and Mozilla Firefox, You can now navigate by article and grouping using quick navigation scripts. These scripts are unbound by default and can be assigned in the Input Gestures dialog when the dialog is opened from a browse mode document. (#9485, #9227)
segment.target: U programima Internet Explorer, Google Chrome i Mozilla Firefox, moete se kretati kroz lanke ili grupisanja korienjem komandi brze navigacije. Ove komande su podrazumevano nedodeljene i moe im se dodeliti preica ako se dijalog ulazne komande otvori kada ste u dokumentu reima pretraivanja. (#9485, #9227)

segment.source: Figures are also reported. They are considered objects and therefore navigable with the o quick navigation key.
segment.target: Figures are also reported. They are considered objects and therefore navigable with the o quick navigation key.

segment.source: In Internet Explorer, Google Chrome and Mozilla Firefox, article elements are now reported with object navigation, and optionally in browse mode if turned on in Document Formatting settings. (#10424)
segment.target: U programima Internet Explorer, Google Chrome i Mozilla Firefox, elementi oznaeni kao lanak se sada prijavljuju u objektnoj navigaciji i reimu fokusiranja, i u reimu pretraivanja ako su ukljueni u podeavanjima formatiranja dokumenta. (#10424)

segment.source: Added screen curtain, which when enabled, makes the whole screen black on Windows 8 and later. (#7857)
segment.target: Dodato zatamnjivanje ekrana, koje kada je omogueno, ini da ceo ekran bude crn na Windowsu 8 i novijim. (#7857)

segment.source: Added a script to enable screen curtain (until next restart with one press, or always while NVDA is running with two presses), no default gesture is assigned.
segment.target: Added a script to enable screen curtain (until next restart with one press, or always while NVDA is running with two presses), no default gesture is assigned.

segment.source: Can be enabled and configured via the 'vision' category in NVDA's settings dialog.
segment.target: Can be enabled and configured via the 'vision' category in NVDA's settings dialog.

segment.source: Added screen highlight functionality to NVDA. (#971, #9064)
segment.target: Dodata funkcija oznake ekrana u program NVDA. (#971, #9064)

segment.source: Highlighting of the focus, navigator object, and browse mode caret position can be enabled and configured via the 'vision' category in NVDA's settings dialog.
segment.target: Highlighting of the focus, navigator object, and browse mode caret position can be enabled and configured via the 'vision' category in NVDA's settings dialog.

segment.source: Note: This feature is incompatible with the focus highlight add-on, however, the add-on can still be used while the built-in highlighter is disabled.
segment.target: Note: This feature is incompatible with the focus highlight add-on, however, the add-on can still be used while the built-in highlighter is disabled.

segment.source: Added Braille Viewer tool, allows viewing braille output via an on-screen window. (#7788)
segment.target: Dodat alat za pregled brajevog reda, dozvoljava pregled teksta brajevog reda putem prozora na ekranu. (#7788)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promene

segment.source: The user guide now describes how to use NVDA in the Windows Console. (#9957)
segment.target: Korisniko uputstvo sada opisuje kako da koristite NVDA u Windows konzoli. (#9957)

segment.source: Running nvda.exe now defaults to replacing an already running copy of NVDA. The -r|--replace command line parameter is still accepted, but ignored. (#8320)
segment.target: Pokretanje nvda.exe sada podrazumevano menja ve pokrenutu kopiju programa NVDA. -r|--replace parametar komandne linije se i dalje prihvata, ali se ignorie. (#8320)

segment.source: On Windows 8 and later, NVDA will now report product name and version information for hosted apps such as apps downloaded from Microsoft Store using information provided by the app. (#4259, #10108)
segment.target: Na Windowsu 8 i novijim, NVDA e prijaviti ime proizvoda i verziju za aplikacije iz Microsoft prodavnice korienjem informacija koje prua aplikacija. (#4259, #10108)

segment.source: When toggling track changes on and off with the keyboard in Microsoft Word, NVDA will announce the state of the setting. (#942)
segment.target: Kada se ukljuuje ili iskljuuje praenje izmena u programu Microsoft Word, NVDA e izgovoriti stanje podeavanja. (#942)

segment.source: The NVDA version number is now logged as the first message in the log. This occurs even if logging has been disabled from the GUI. (#9803)
segment.target: Broj NVDA verzije se sada evidentira kao prva poruka u dnevniku. Ovo se deava ak iako je evidentiranje onemogueno u interfejsu. (#9803)

segment.source: The settings dialog no longer allows for changing the configured log level if it has been overridden from the command line. (#10209)
segment.target: Dijalog za podeavanja vie ne dozvoljava menjanje nivoa evidentiranja u dnevniku ako je promenjen iz komandne linije. (#10209)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, NVDA now announces the display state of non printable characters when pressing the toggle shortcut Ctrl+Shift+8 . (#10241)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Word, NVDA sada izgovara stanje prikaza znakova koji se tampaju kada koristite preicu za menjanje statusa Ctrl+ift+8 . (#10241)

segment.source: Updated Liblouis braille translator to commit 58d67e63. (#10094)
segment.target: Auriran Liblouis brajev prevodilac na commit 58d67e63. (#10094)

segment.source: When CLDR characters (including emojis) reporting is enabled, they are announced at all punctuation levels. (#8826)
segment.target: Kada je omogueno prijavljivanje CLDR znakova (to ukljuuje emoji), izgovaraju se u svim nivoima izgovora interpunkcije. (#8826)

segment.source: Third party python packages included in NVDA, such as comtypes, now log their warnings and errors to the NVDA log. (#10393)
segment.target: Paketi drugih proizvoaa koji su ukljueni u NVDA, kao to su comtypes, sada evidentiraju svoja upozorenja i greke u NVDA dnevniku. (#10393)

segment.source: Updated Unicode Common Locale Data Repository emoji annotations to version 36.0. (#10426)
segment.target: Aurirana baza Unicode znakova i emoji znakova na verziju 36.0. (#10426)

segment.source: When focussing a grouping in browse mode, the description is now also read. (#10095)
segment.target: Kada se fokusira grupisanje u reimu pretraivanja, opis se sada takoe ita. (#10095)

segment.source: The Java Access Bridge is now included with NVDA to enable access to Java applications, including for 64 bit Java VMs. (#7724)
segment.target: Java Access Bridge se sada ukljuuje uz NVDA kako bi se omoguio pristup Java aplikacijama, ukljuujui 64 bitne java aplikacije. (#7724)

segment.source: If the Java Access Bridge is not enabled for the user, NVDA automatically enables it at NVDA startup. (#7952)
segment.target: Ako Java Access Bridge nije omoguen za korisnika, NVDA e ga automatski omoguiti pri pokretanju. (#7952)

segment.source: Updated eSpeak-NG to 1.51-dev, commit ca65812ac6019926f2fbd7f12c92d7edd3701e0c. (#10581)
segment.target: Auriran eSpeak-NG na 1.51-dev, commit ca65812ac6019926f2fbd7f12c92d7edd3701e0c. (#10581)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravljene greke

segment.source: Emoji and other 32 bit unicode characters now take less space on a braille display when they are shown as hexadecimal values. (#6695)
segment.target: Emoji i drugi 32 bit unicode znakovi sada zauzimaju manje mesta na brajevom redu kada se prikazuju kao heksadecimalne vrednosti. (#6695)

segment.source: In Windows 10, NVDA will announce tooltips from universal apps if NVDA is configured to report tooltips in object presentation dialog. (#8118)
segment.target: U Windowsu 10, NVDA e izgovarati opise alata u univerzalnim aplikacijama ako je podeen da prijavi opise alata u dijalogu predstavljanje objekata. (#8118)

segment.source: On Windows 10 Anniversary Update and later, typed text is now reported in Mintty. (#1348)
segment.target: U Windowsu 10 Anniversary auriranju i novijim, ukucan tekst se sada prijavljuje u aplikaciji Mintty. (#1348)

segment.source: On Windows 10 Anniversary Update and later, output in the Windows Console that appears close to the caret is no longer spelled out. (#513)
segment.target: Na Windowsu 10 Anniversary auriranje i novijim, izlazni tekst iz konzole koji se pojavljuje blizu kursora se vie nee sricati. (#513)

segment.source: Controls in Audacitys compressor dialog are now announced when navigating the dialog. (#10103)
segment.target: Kontrole u Audacity dijalogu za kompresovanje se sada izgovaraju u toku navigacije. (#10103)

segment.source: NVDA no longer treats spaces as words in object review in Scintilla based editors such as Notepad++. (#8295)
segment.target: NVDA vie nee smatrati razmake novim reima u Scintilla ureivaima kao to je Notepad++. (#8295)

segment.source: NVDA will prevent the system from entering sleep mode when scrolling through text with braille display gestures. (#9175)
segment.target: NVDA e spreiti sistem da ue u reim spavanja kada se tekst pomera komandama na brajevom redu. (#9175)

segment.source: On Windows 10, braille will now follow when editing cell contents in Microsoft Excel and in other UIA text controls where it was lagging behind. (#9749)
segment.target: Na Windowsu 10, brajev red e sada ispravno pratiti ureivanje elija u programu Microsoft Excel i drugim UIA tekstualnim kontrolama gde je esto kasnio. (#9749)

segment.source: NVDA will once again report suggestions in the Microsoft Edge address bar. (#7554)
segment.target: NVDA e ponovo prijavljivati predloge u adresnoj traci programa Microsoft Edge. (#7554)

segment.source: NVDA is no longer silent when focusing an HTML tab control header in Internet Explorer. (#8898)
segment.target: NVDA vie nee prestati sa govorom kada se fokusira HTML zaglavlje kontrola kartica u programu Internet explorer. (#8898)

segment.source: In Microsoft Edge based on EdgeHTML, NVDA will no longer play search suggestion sound when the window becomes maximized. (#9110, #10002)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Edge baziranom na tehnologiji EdgeHTML, NVDA vie nee reprodukovati zvuk predloga za pretraivanje kada se prozor uvea. (#9110, #10002)

segment.source: ARIA 1.1 combo boxes are now supported in Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome. (#9616)
segment.target: ARIA 1.1 izborni okviri su sada podrani u pretraivaima Mozilla Firefox i Google Chrome. (#9616)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer report content of visually hidden columns for list items in SysListView32 controls. (#8268)
segment.target: NVDA vie nee prijavljivati vizuelno skriven sadraj u kolonama za stavke liste u kontrolama SysListView32. (#8268)

segment.source: The settings dialog no longer shows "info" as the current log level when in secure mode. (#10209)
segment.target: Dijalog za podeavanja vie ne prikazuje "info" kao trenutni nivo evidentiranja u dnevniku kada ste na sigurnim ekranima. (#10209)

segment.source: In Start menu for Windows 10 Anniversary Update and later, NVDA will announce details of search results. (#10340)
segment.target: U start meniju Windowsa 10 Anniversary auriranje i novijim, NVDA e izgovarati detalje rezultata pretrage. (#10340)

segment.source: In browse mode, if moving the cursor or using quick navigation causes the document to change, NVDA no longer speaks incorrect content in some cases. (#8831, #10343)
segment.target: U reimu pretraivanja, ako pomeranje kursora ili korienje brze navigacije izaziva promenu sadraja, NVDA nee vie neispravno izgovarati sadraj u nekim sluajevima. (#8831, #10343)

segment.source: Some bullet names in Microsoft Word have been corrected. (#10399)
segment.target: Neka imena nabrajanja u programu Microsoft Word su ispravljena. (#10399)

segment.source: In Windows 10 May 2019 Update and later, NVDA will once again announce first selected emoji or clipboard item when emoji panel and clipboard history opens, respectively. (#9204)
segment.target: U Windowsu 10 auriranje iz maja 2019 i novijim, NVDA e ponovo izgovarati prvu stavku istorije privremene memorije ili emoji panela kada se otvore. (#9204)

segment.source: In Poedit, it is once again possible to view some translations for right to left languages. (#9931)
segment.target: U programu Poedit, ponovo je mogue videti neke prevode za jezike koji se piu s desna na levo. (#9931)

segment.source: In the Settings app in Windows 10 April 2018 Update and later, NVDA will no longer announce progress bar information for volume meters found in the System/Sound page. (#10412)
segment.target: U aplikaciji za podeavanja Windowsa 10 auriranje iz aprila 2018 i novijim, NVDA vie nee prijavljivati informacije o traci napredovanja za metar jaine u delu sistem/zvuk. (#10412)

segment.source: Invalid regular expressions in speech dictionaries no longer completely break speech in NVDA. (#10334)
segment.target: Neispravni regularni izrazi u govornim renicima nee vie potpuno eliminisati NVDA govor. (#10334)

segment.source: When reading bulleted items in Microsoft Word with UIA enabled, the bullet from the next list item is no longer inappropriately announced. (#9613)
segment.target: Kada se itaju stavke nabrajanja u programu Microsoft Word sa omoguenim UIA, nabrajanje iz sledee liste se nee vie neispravno izgovarati. (#9613)

segment.source: Some rare braille translation issues and errors with liblouis have been resolved. (#9982)
segment.target: Neke retke greke u prevoenju brajevog pisma sa alatom liblouis su ispravljene. (#9982)

segment.source: Java applications started before NVDA are now accessible without the need to restart the Java app. (#10296)
segment.target: Java aplikacije koje su pokrenute pre programa NVDA sada su pristupane bez potrebe da ponovo pokreete Java aplikaciju. (#10296)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox, when the focused element becomes marked as current (aria-current), this change is no longer spoken multiple times. (#8960)
segment.target: U programu Mozilla Firefox, kada fokusirani element postane oznaen kao trenutni (aria-current), ova promena se vie ne izgovara vie puta. (#8960)

segment.source: NVDA will now treat certain composit unicode characters such as e-acute as one single character when moving through text. (#10550)
segment.target: NVDA e sada smatrati odreene unikodne znakove kao to su e-acute kao jedan znak kada se kreete kroz tekst. (#10550)

segment.source: Spring Tool Suite Version 4 is now supported. (#10001)
segment.target: Spring Tool Suite verzija 4 je sada podrana. (#10001)

segment.source: Don't double speak name when aria-labelledby relation target is an inner element. (#10552)
segment.target: Sada se vie nee dva puta izgovarati kada je aria-labelledby relation target inner element. (#10552)

segment.source: On Windows 10 version 1607 and later, typed characters from Braille keyboards are spoken in more situations. (#10569)
segment.target: Na Windowsu 10 verziji 1607 i novijim, ukucani znakovi sa brajeve tastature se izgovaraju u vie situacija. (#10569)

segment.source: When changing the audio output device, tones played by NVDA will now play through the newly selected device. (#2167)
segment.target: Kada se menja zvuni izlazni ureaj, tonovi koje NVDA reprodukuje e se reprodukovati na ureaju koji je izabran. (#2167)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox, moving focus in browse mode is faster. This makes moving the cursor in browse mode more responsive in many cases. (#10584)
segment.target: U programu Mozilla Firefox, pomeranje fokusa u reimu pretraivanja je bre. Ovo ini pomeranje kursora u reimu pretraivanja bre u vie sluajeva. (#10584)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promene za programere (engleski)

segment.source: Updated Python to 3.7. (#7105)
segment.target: Updated Python to 3.7. (#7105)

segment.source: Updated pySerial to version 3.4. (#8815)
segment.target: Updated pySerial to version 3.4. (#8815)

segment.source: Updated wxPython to 4.0.3 to support Python 3.5 and later. (#9630)
segment.target: Updated wxPython to 4.0.3 to support Python 3.5 and later. (#9630)

segment.source: Updated six to version 1.12.0. (#9630)
segment.target: Updated six to version 1.12.0. (#9630)

segment.source: Updated py2exe to version 0.9.3.2 (in development, commit b372a8e from albertosottile/py2exe#13). (#9856)
segment.target: Updated py2exe to version 0.9.3.2 (in development, commit b372a8e from albertosottile/py2exe#13). (#9856)

segment.source: Updated UIAutomationCore.dll comtypes module to version 10.0.18362. (#9829)
segment.target: Updated UIAutomationCore.dll comtypes module to version 10.0.18362. (#9829)

segment.source: The tab-completion in the Python console only suggests attributes starting with an underscore if the underscore is first typed. (#9918)
segment.target: The tab-completion in the Python console only suggests attributes starting with an underscore if the underscore is first typed. (#9918)

segment.source: Flake8 linting tool has been integrated with SCons reflecting code requirements for Pull Requests. (#5918)
segment.target: Flake8 linting tool has been integrated with SCons reflecting code requirements for Pull Requests. (#5918)

segment.source: As NVDA no longer depends on pyWin32, modules such as win32api and win32con are no longer available to add-ons. (#9639)
segment.target: As NVDA no longer depends on pyWin32, modules such as win32api and win32con are no longer available to add-ons. (#9639)

segment.source: win32api calls can be replaced with direct calls to win32 dll functions via ctypes.
segment.target: win32api calls can be replaced with direct calls to win32 dll functions via ctypes.

segment.source: win32con constants should be defined in your files.
segment.target: win32con constants should be defined in your files.

segment.source: The "async" argument in nvwave.playWaveFile has been renamed to "asynchronous". (#8607)
segment.target: The "async" argument in nvwave.playWaveFile has been renamed to "asynchronous". (#8607)

segment.source: speakText and speakCharacter methods on synthDriver objects are no longer supported.
segment.target: speakText and speakCharacter methods on synthDriver objects are no longer supported.

segment.source: This functionality is handled by SynthDriver.speak.
segment.target: This functionality is handled by SynthDriver.speak.

segment.source: SynthSetting classes in synthDriverHandler have been removed. Now use driverHandler.DriverSetting classes instead.
segment.target: SynthSetting classes in synthDriverHandler have been removed. Now use driverHandler.DriverSetting classes instead.

segment.source: SynthDriver classes should no longer expose index via the lastIndex property.
segment.target: SynthDriver classes should no longer expose index via the lastIndex property.

segment.source: Instead, they should notify the synthDriverHandler.synthIndexReached action with the index, once all previous audio has finished playing before that index.
segment.target: Instead, they should notify the synthDriverHandler.synthIndexReached action with the index, once all previous audio has finished playing before that index.

segment.source: SynthDriver classes must now notify the synthDriverHandler.synthDoneSpeaking action, once all audio from a SynthDriver.speak call has completed playing.
segment.target: SynthDriver classes must now notify the synthDriverHandler.synthDoneSpeaking action, once all audio from a SynthDriver.speak call has completed playing.

segment.source: SynthDriver classes must support the speech.PitchCommand in their speak method, as changes in pitch for speak spelling now depends on this functionality.
segment.target: SynthDriver classes must support the speech.PitchCommand in their speak method, as changes in pitch for speak spelling now depends on this functionality.

segment.source: The speech function getSpeechTextForProperties has been renamed to getPropertiesSpeech. (#10098)
segment.target: The speech function getSpeechTextForProperties has been renamed to getPropertiesSpeech. (#10098)

segment.source: The braille function getBrailleTextForProperties has been renamed to getPropertiesBraille. (#10469)
segment.target: The braille function getBrailleTextForProperties has been renamed to getPropertiesBraille. (#10469)

segment.source: Several speech functions have been changed to return speech sequences. (#10098)
segment.target: Several speech functions have been changed to return speech sequences. (#10098)

segment.source: getControlFieldSpeech
segment.target: getControlFieldSpeech

segment.source: getFormatFieldSpeech
segment.target: getFormatFieldSpeech

segment.source: getSpeechTextForProperties now called getPropertiesSpeech
segment.target: getSpeechTextForProperties now called getPropertiesSpeech

segment.source: getIndentationSpeech
segment.target: getIndentationSpeech

segment.source: getTableInfoSpeech
segment.target: getTableInfoSpeech

segment.source: Added a textUtils module to simplify string differences between Python 3 strings and Windows unicode strings. (#9545)
segment.target: Added a textUtils module to simplify string differences between Python 3 strings and Windows unicode strings. (#9545)

segment.source: See the module documentation and textInfos.offsets module for example implementations.
segment.target: See the module documentation and textInfos.offsets module for example implementations.

segment.source: Deprecated functionality now removed. (#9548)
segment.target: Deprecated functionality now removed. (#9548)

segment.source: AppModules removed:
segment.target: AppModules removed:

segment.source: Windows XP sound recorder.
segment.target: Windows XP sound recorder.

segment.source: Klango Player, which is abandoned software.
segment.target: Klango Player, which is abandoned software.

segment.source: configobj.validate wrapper removed.
segment.target: configobj.validate wrapper removed.

segment.source: New code should use from configobj import validate instead of import validate
segment.target: New code should use from configobj import validate instead of import validate

segment.source: textInfos.Point and textInfos.Rect replaced by locationHelper.Point and locationHelper.RectLTRB respectively.
segment.target: textInfos.Point and textInfos.Rect replaced by locationHelper.Point and locationHelper.RectLTRB respectively.

segment.source: braille.BrailleHandler._get_tether and braille.BrailleHandler.set_tether have been removed.
segment.target: braille.BrailleHandler._get_tether and braille.BrailleHandler.set_tether have been removed.

segment.source: config.getConfigDirs has been removed.
segment.target: config.getConfigDirs has been removed.

segment.source: config.ConfigManager.getConfigValidationParameter has been replaced by getConfigValidation
segment.target: config.ConfigManager.getConfigValidationParameter has been replaced by getConfigValidation

segment.source: inputCore.InputGesture.logIdentifier property has been removed.
segment.target: inputCore.InputGesture.logIdentifier property has been removed.

segment.source: Use _get_identifiers in inputCore.InputGesture instead.
segment.target: Use _get_identifiers in inputCore.InputGesture instead.

segment.source: synthDriverHandler.SynthDriver.speakText/speakCharacter have been removed.
segment.target: synthDriverHandler.SynthDriver.speakText/speakCharacter have been removed.

segment.source: Removed several synthDriverHandler.SynthSetting classes.
segment.target: Removed several synthDriverHandler.SynthSetting classes.

segment.source: Previously kept for backwards compatibility (#8214), now considered obsolete.
segment.target: Previously kept for backwards compatibility (#8214), now considered obsolete.

segment.source: Drivers that used the SynthSetting classes should be updated to use the DriverSetting classes.
segment.target: Drivers that used the SynthSetting classes should be updated to use the DriverSetting classes.

segment.source: Some legacy code has been removed, particularly:
segment.target: Some legacy code has been removed, particularly:

segment.source: Support for the Outlook pre 2003 message list.
segment.target: Support for the Outlook pre 2003 message list.

segment.source: An overlay class for the classic start menu, only found in Windows Vista and earlier.
segment.target: An overlay class for the classic start menu, only found in Windows Vista and earlier.

segment.source: Dropped support for Skype 7, as it is definitely not working any more.
segment.target: Dropped support for Skype 7, as it is definitely not working any more.

segment.source: Added a framework to create vision enhancement providers; modules that can change screen contents, optionally based on input from NVDA about object locations. (#9064)
segment.target: Added a framework to create vision enhancement providers; modules that can change screen contents, optionally based on input from NVDA about object locations. (#9064)

segment.source: Add-ons can bundle their own providers in a visionEnhancementProviders folder.
segment.target: Add-ons can bundle their own providers in a visionEnhancementProviders folder.

segment.source: See the vision and visionEnhancementProviders modules for the implementation of the framework and examples, respectively.
segment.target: See the vision and visionEnhancementProviders modules for the implementation of the framework and examples, respectively.

segment.source: Vision enhancement providers are enabled and configured via the 'vision' category in NVDA's settings dialog.
segment.target: Vision enhancement providers are enabled and configured via the 'vision' category in NVDA's settings dialog.

segment.source: Abstract class properties are now supported on objects that inherit from baseObject.AutoPropertyObject (e.g. NVDAObjects and TextInfos). (#10102)
segment.target: Abstract class properties are now supported on objects that inherit from baseObject.AutoPropertyObject (e.g. NVDAObjects and TextInfos). (#10102)

segment.source: Introduced displayModel.UNIT_DISPLAYCHUNK as a textInfos unit constant specific to DisplayModelTextInfo. (#10165)
segment.target: Introduced displayModel.UNIT_DISPLAYCHUNK as a textInfos unit constant specific to DisplayModelTextInfo. (#10165)

segment.source: This new constant allows walking over the text in a DisplayModelTextInfo in a way that more closely resembles how the text chunks are saved in the underlying model.
segment.target: This new constant allows walking over the text in a DisplayModelTextInfo in a way that more closely resembles how the text chunks are saved in the underlying model.

segment.source: displayModel.getCaretRect now returns an instance of locationHelper.RectLTRB. (#10233)
segment.target: displayModel.getCaretRect now returns an instance of locationHelper.RectLTRB. (#10233)

segment.source: The UNIT_CONTROLFIELD and UNIT_FORMATFIELD constants have been moved from virtualBuffers.VirtualBufferTextInfo to the textInfos package. (#10396)
segment.target: The UNIT_CONTROLFIELD and UNIT_FORMATFIELD constants have been moved from virtualBuffers.VirtualBufferTextInfo to the textInfos package. (#10396)

segment.source: For every entry in the NVDA log, information about the originating thread is now included. (#10259)
segment.target: For every entry in the NVDA log, information about the originating thread is now included. (#10259)

segment.source: UIA TextInfo objects can now be moved/expanded by the page, story and formatField text units. (#10396)
segment.target: UIA TextInfo objects can now be moved/expanded by the page, story and formatField text units. (#10396)

segment.source: External modules (appModules and globalPlugins) are now less likely to be able to break the creation of NVDAObjects.
segment.target: External modules (appModules and globalPlugins) are now less likely to be able to break the creation of NVDAObjects.

segment.source: Exceptions caused by the "chooseNVDAObjectOverlayClasses" and "event_NVDAObject_init" methods are now properly caught and logged.
segment.target: Exceptions caused by the "chooseNVDAObjectOverlayClasses" and "event_NVDAObject_init" methods are now properly caught and logged.

segment.source: The aria.htmlNodeNameToAriaLandmarkRoles dictionary has been renamed to aria.htmlNodeNameToAriaRoles. It now also contains roles that aren't landmarks.
segment.target: The aria.htmlNodeNameToAriaLandmarkRoles dictionary has been renamed to aria.htmlNodeNameToAriaRoles. It now also contains roles that aren't landmarks.

segment.source: scriptHandler.isCurrentScript has been removed due to lack of use. There is no replacement. (#8677)
segment.target: scriptHandler.isCurrentScript has been removed due to lack of use. There is no replacement. (#8677)

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix several crashes present in 2019.2. Fixes include:
segment.target: Ovo je manje auriranje kako bi se ispravile neke nestabilnosti u verziji 2019.2. Ispravke ukljuuju:

segment.source: Addressed several crashes in Gmail seen in both Firefox and Chrome when interacting with particular popup menus such as when creating filters or changing certain Gmail settings. (#10175, #9402, #8924)
segment.target: Ispravljeno nekoliko greaka u Gmailu u pretraivaima Firefox i Chrome prilikom interakcije sa odreenim iskaujuim menijima, na primer menjanje filtera ili nekih Gmail podeavanja. (#10175, #9402, #8924)

segment.source: In Windows 7, NVDA no longer causes Windows Explorer to crash when the mouse is used in the start menu. (#9435)
segment.target: U Windowsu 7, NVDA vie nee izazvati ruenje Windows Explorera kada se mi koristi u start meniju. (#9435)

segment.source: Windows Explorer on Windows 7 no longer crashes when accessing metadata edit fields. (#5337)
segment.target: Windows Explorer na Windowsu 7 se vie ne rui kada se pristupa poljima sa detaljima o podacima. (#5337)

segment.source: NVDA no longer freezes when interacting with images with a base64 URI in Mozilla Firefox or Google Chrome. (#10227)
segment.target: NVDA vie nee prestajati sa radom kada pristupate slikama sa base64 URI u aplikaciji Mozilla Firefox ili Google Chrome. (#10227)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include auto detection of Freedom Scientific braille displays, an experimental setting in the Advanced panel to stop browse mode from automatically moving focus (which may provide performance improvements), a rate boost option for the Windows OneCore synthesizer to achieve very fast rates, and many other bug fixes.
segment.target: Glavne karakteristike ove verzije ukljuuju automatsko prepoznavanje brajevih redova kompanije Freedom Scientific , eksperimentalno podeavanje u naprednim podeavanjima koje zaustavlja pomeranje sistemskog fokusa u reimu pretraivanja (to moe doneti ubrzanja u radu ), opcija poveanja brzine za Windows OneCore sintetizator kako bi se dostigao veoma brz govor, i puno drugih ispravljenih greaka.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove karakteristike

segment.source: NVDA's Miranda NG support works with newer versions of the client. (#9053)
segment.target: Podrka za program Miranda NG radi sa novijim verzijama klijenta. (#9053)

segment.source: You can now disable browse mode by default by disabling the new "Enable browse mode on page load" option in NVDA's browse mode settings. (#8716)
segment.target: Sada moete onemoguiti reim pretraivanja onemoguavanjem nove opcije "Omogui reim pretraivanja kada se stranica uita" u podeavanjima reima pretraivanja programa NVDA. (#8716)

segment.source: Note that when this option is disabled, you can still enable browse mode manually by pressing NVDA+space.
segment.target: Note that when this option is disabled, you can still enable browse mode manually by pressing NVDA+space.

segment.source: You can now filter symbols in the punctuation/symbol pronunciation dialog, similar to how filtering works in the elements list and input gestures dialog. (#5761)
segment.target: Sada moete filtrirati simbole u dijalogu za izgovor znakova interpunkcije i simbola, to radi slino filtriranju u dijalozima za listu elemenata ili ulazne komande. (#5761)

segment.source: A command has been added to change the mouse text unit resolution (how much text will be spoken when the mouse moves), it has not been assigned a default gesture. (#9056)
segment.target: Nova komanda je dodata za menjanje jedinice rezolucije teksta (koliko teksta e biti proitano kada se mi pomera), ona nema podrazumevanu preicu. (#9056)

segment.source: The windows OneCore synthesizer now has a rate boost option, which allows for significantly faster speech. (#7498)
segment.target: Windows OneCore sintetizator govora sada ima opciju poveanja brzine, koja dozvoljava znatno bri govor. (#7498)

segment.source: The Rate Boost option is now configurable from the Synth Settings Ring for supported speech synthesizers. (Currently eSpeak-NG and Windows OneCore). (#8934)
segment.target: Opcija poveanja brzine se sada moe podesiti iz kruga menjanja podeavanja sintetizatora za sve podrane sintetizatore. (Trenutno eSpeak-NG i Windows OneCore). (#8934)

segment.source: Configuration profiles can now be manually activated with gestures. (#4209)
segment.target: Profili podeavanja se sada mogu runo aktivirati preicama. (#4209)

segment.source: The gesture must be configured in the "Input gestures" dialog.
segment.target: The gesture must be configured in the "Input gestures" dialog.

segment.source: In Eclipse, added support for autocompletion in code editor. (#5667)
segment.target: U programu Eclipse, dodata podrka za automatsko dopunjavanje u ureivau koda. (#5667)

segment.source: Additionally, Javadoc information can be read from the editor when it is present by using NVDA+d.
segment.target: Additionally, Javadoc information can be read from the editor when it is present by using NVDA+d.

segment.source: Added an experimental option to the Advanced Settings panel that allows you to stop the system focus from following the browse mode cursor (Automatically set system focus to focusable elements). (#2039) Although this may not be suitable to turn off for all websites, this may fix:
segment.target: Dodata eksperimentalna opcija u panel naprednih podeavanja koja spreava da sistemski fokus prati kursor u reimu pretraivanja (automatski postavi sistemski fokus na elemente koji se mogu fokusirati). (#2039) Iako moda ovo nije odgovarajua opcija za sve sajtove, ovo moe popraviti sledee probleme:

segment.source: Rubber band effect: NVDA sporadically undoes the last browse mode keystroke by jumping to the previous location.
segment.target: Rubber band effect: NVDA sporadically undoes the last browse mode keystroke by jumping to the previous location.

segment.source: Edit boxes steal system focus when arrowing down through them on some websites.
segment.target: Edit boxes steal system focus when arrowing down through them on some websites.

segment.source: Browse mode keystrokes are slow to respond.
segment.target: Browse mode keystrokes are slow to respond.

segment.source: For braille display drivers that support it, driver settings can now be changed from the braille settings category in NVDA's settings dialog. (#7452)
segment.target: Za podrane brajeve redove, podeavanja drajvera se mogu promeniti iz kategorije brajevih podeavanja dijaloga NVDA podeavanja. (#7452)

segment.source: Freedom Scientific braille displays are now supported by braille display auto detection. (#7727)
segment.target: Brajevi redovi kompanije Freedom Scientific su sada podrani od strane automatskog prepoznavanja brajevih redova. (#7727)

segment.source: Added a command to show the replacement for the symbol under the review cursor. (#9286)
segment.target: Dodata komanda za prikazivanje izgovorene zamene za simbol na trenutnoj poziciji preglednog kursora. (#9286)

segment.source: Added an experimental option to the Advanced Settings panel that allows you to try out a new, work-in-progress rewrite of NVDA's Windows Console support using the Microsoft UI Automation API. (#9614)
segment.target: Dodata eksperimentalna opcija u panel sa naprednim podeavanjima koja vam dozvoljava da probate novu, napisanu iz poetka NVDA podrku za Windows konzole korienjem Microsoft UI Automation API-a. (#9614)

segment.source: In the Python Console, the input field now supports pasting multiple lines from the clipboard. (#9776)
segment.target: U Python konzoli, polje za unos sada podrava lepljenje vie redova iz privremene memorije. (#9776)

segment.source: Changes
