segment.source: Support for Eurobraille Esys, Esytime and Iris braille displays. (#7488)
segment.target: Podrka za Eurobraille Esys, Esytime i Iris brajeve redove. (#7488)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promene

segment.source: The HIMS Braille Sense/Braille EDGE/Smart Beetle and Hims Sync Braille display drivers have been replaced by one driver. The new driver will automatically be activated for former syncBraille driver users. (#7459)
segment.target: Drajveri za HIMS Braille Sense/Braille EDGE/Smart Beetle i Hims Sync su zamenjeni jednim drajverom. Novi drajver e automatski biti korien za bive syncBraille korisnike. (#7459)

segment.source: Some keys , notably scroll keys, have been reassigned to follow the conventions used by Hims products. Consult the user guide for more details.
segment.target: Some keys , notably scroll keys, have been reassigned to follow the conventions used by Hims products. Consult the user guide for more details.

segment.source: When typing with the on-screen keyboard via touch interaction, by default you now need to double tap each key the same way you would activate any other control. (#7309)
segment.target: Kada piete na tastaturi na ekranu korienjem ekrana osetljivog na dodir, po podrazumevanim podeavanjima morate pritisnuti svaki taster dva puta kao to biste aktivirali svaku drugu kontrolu na ekranu (#7309).

segment.source: To use the existing "touch typing" mode where simply lifting your finger off the key is enough to activate it, Enable this option in the new Touch Interaction settings dialog found in the Preferences menu.
segment.target: To use the existing "touch typing" mode where simply lifting your finger off the key is enough to activate it, Enable this option in the new Touch Interaction settings dialog found in the Preferences menu.

segment.source: It is no longer necessary to explicitly tether braille to focus or review, as this will happen automatically by default. (#2385)
segment.target: Nije vie neophodno vezivati brajev red za fokus ili pregled, budui da e se ovo deavati automatski po podrazumevanim podeavanjima. (#2385)

segment.source: Note that automatic tethering to review will only occur when using a review cursor or object navigation command. Scrolling will not activate this new behavior.
segment.target: Note that automatic tethering to review will only occur when using a review cursor or object navigation command. Scrolling will not activate this new behavior.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravljene greke

segment.source: Browseable messages such as showing current formatting when pressing NVDA+f twice quickly no longer fails when NVDA is installed on a path with non-ASCII characters. (#7474)
segment.target: Poruke reima pretraivanja kao to su korienje komande NVDA+f dva puta za prikazivanje formatiranja vie ne prikazuju greku kada je NVDA instaliran u folderu koji sadri znakove koji nisu ASCII. (#7474)

segment.source: Focus is now once again restored correctly when returning to Spotify from another application. (#7689)
segment.target: Fokus se sada ponovo ispravno vraa kada se vratite u aplikaciju Spotify iz neke druge aplikacije. (#7689)

segment.source: In Windows 10 Fall Creaters Update, NVDA no longer fails to update when Controlled Folder Access is enabled from Windows Defender Security Center. (#7696)
segment.target: Na Windows 10 jesenjem creators auriranju, NVDA vie nema greaka pri auriranju gde je omoguen kontrolisan pristup folderima iz sigurnosnog centra Windows defendera. (#7696)

segment.source: Detection of scroll keys on Hims Smart Beetle displays is no longer unreliable. (#6086)
segment.target: Prepoznavanje komandi za pomeranje Hims Smart Beetle brajevih redova vie nije nestabilno. (#6086)

segment.source: A slight performance improvement when rendering large amounts of content in Mozilla Firefox 58 and later. (#7719)
segment.target: Odreena poboljanja brzine pri uitavanju sadraja u programu Mozilla Firefox 58 i novijim. (#7719)

segment.source: In Microsoft Outlook, reading emails containing tables no longer causes errors. (#6827)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Outlook, itanje Email poruka koje sadre tabele vie ne izaziva greke. (#6827)

segment.source: Braille display gestures that emulate system keyboard key modifiers can now also be combined with other emulated system keyboard keys if one or more of the involved gestures are model specific. (#7783)
segment.target: Komande brajevih redova koje simuliraju sistemske tastere se sada mogu kombinovati sa drugim simuliranim sistemskim tasterima ako je jedna ili vie komandi specifina za model. (#7783)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox, browse mode now works correctly in pop-ups created by extensions such as LastPass and bitwarden. (#7809)
segment.target: U programu Mozilla Firefox, reim pretraivanja sada ispravno radi u iskauim prozorima koje otvaraju dodaci kao to su LastPass i bitwarden. (#7809)

segment.source: NVDA no longer sometimes freezes on every focus change if Firefox or Chrome have stopped responding such as due to a freeze or crash. (#7818)
segment.target: NVDA se vie ne zaustavlja pri svakoj promeni fokusa ako su Firefox ili Chrome prestali da reaguju na primer zbog greke. (#7818)

segment.source: In twitter clients such as Chicken Nugget, NVDA will no longer ignore the last 20 characters of 280 character tweets when reading them. (#7828)
segment.target: U Twitter programima kao to su Chicken Nugget, NVDA vie nee zanemariti poslednjih 20 znakova u tvitovima koji imaju 280 znakova pri itanju. (#7828)

segment.source: NVDA now uses the correct language when announcing symbols when text is selected. (#7687)
segment.target: NVDA sada koristi ispravan jezik pri izgovoru simbola u izboru teksta. (#7687)

segment.source: In recent versions of Office 365, it is again possible to navigate Excel charts using the arrow keys. (#7046)
segment.target: U novijim verzijama usluge Office 365, ponovo je mogua navigacija kroz Excel grafikone korienjem strelica. (#7046)

segment.source: In speech and braille output, control states will now always be reported in the same order, regardless whether they are positive or negative. (#7076)
segment.target: Kada se koristi govor ili brajev red, stanja kontrola e se uvek prijavljivati u istom redosledu, bez obzira da li su pozitivna ili negativna. (#7076)

segment.source: In apps such as Windows 10 Mail, NVDA will no longer fail to announce deleted characters when pressing backspace. (#7456)
segment.target: U aplikacijama kao to je Windows 10 Mail, NVDA e uvek izgovarati obrisane znakove kada se pritisne Backspace. (#7456)

segment.source: All keys on the Hims Braille Sense Polaris displays are now working as expected. (#7865)
segment.target: Svi tasteri na Hims Braille Sense Polaris redovima sada rade kako je predvieno. (#7865)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to start on Windows 7 complaining about an internal api-ms dll, when a particular version of the Visual Studio 2017 redistributables have been installed by another application. (#7975)
segment.target: NVDA vie nema problema sa pokretanjem na Windowsu 7 uz greku o internoj api-ms dll datoteci, kada je odreena verzija Visual Studio 2017 redistributables instalirana od strane neke druge aplikacije. (#7975)

segment.source: Changes for developers
segment.target: Promene za programere (engleski)

segment.source: Added a hidden boolean flag to the braille section in the configuration: "outputPass1Only". (#7301, #7693, #7702)
segment.target: Added a hidden boolean flag to the braille section in the configuration: "outputPass1Only". (#7301, #7693, #7702)

segment.source: This flag defaults to true. If false, liblouis multi pass rules will be used for braille output.
segment.target: This flag defaults to true. If false, liblouis multi pass rules will be used for braille output.

segment.source: A new dictionary (braille.RENAMED_DRIVERS) has been added to allow for smooth transition for users using drivers that have been superseded by others. (#7459)
segment.target: A new dictionary (braille.RENAMED_DRIVERS) has been added to allow for smooth transition for users using drivers that have been superseded by others. (#7459)

segment.source: Updated comtypes package to 1.1.3. (#7831)
segment.target: Updated comtypes package to 1.1.3. (#7831)

segment.source: Implemented a generic system in braille.BrailleDisplayDriver to deal with displays which send confirmation/acknowledgement packets. See the handyTech braille display driver as an example. (#7590, #7721)
segment.target: Implemented a generic system in braille.BrailleDisplayDriver to deal with displays which send confirmation/acknowledgement packets. See the handyTech braille display driver as an example. (#7590, #7721)

segment.source: A new "isAppX" variable in the config module can be used to detect if NVDA is running as a Windows Desktop Bridge Store app. (#7851)
segment.target: A new "isAppX" variable in the config module can be used to detect if NVDA is running as a Windows Desktop Bridge Store app. (#7851)

segment.source: For document implementations such as NVDAObjects or browseMode that have a textInfo, there is now a new documentBase.documentWithTableNavigation class that can be inherited from to gain standard table navigation scripts. Please refer to this class to see which helper methods must be provided by your implementation for table navigation to work. (#7849)
segment.target: For document implementations such as NVDAObjects or browseMode that have a textInfo, there is now a new documentBase.documentWithTableNavigation class that can be inherited from to gain standard table navigation scripts. Please refer to this class to see which helper methods must be provided by your implementation for table navigation to work. (#7849)

segment.source: The scons batch file now better handles when Python 3 is also installed, making use of the launcher to specifically launch python 2.7 32 bit. (#7541)
segment.target: The scons batch file now better handles when Python 3 is also installed, making use of the launcher to specifically launch python 2.7 32 bit. (#7541)

segment.source: hwIo.Hid now takes an additional parameter exclusive, which defaults to True. If set to False, other applications are allowed to communicate with a device while it is connected to NVDA. (#7859)
segment.target: hwIo.Hid now takes an additional parameter exclusive, which defaults to True. If set to False, other applications are allowed to communicate with a device while it is connected to NVDA. (#7859)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include many fixes and enhancements to web support including browse mode for web dialogs by default, better reporting of field group labels in browse mode, support for new Windows 10 technologies such as Windows Defender Application Guard and Windows 10 on ARM64, and automatic reporting of screen orientation and battery status.
segment.target: Glavne karakteristike ove verzije ukljuuju puno ispravki za web podrku ukljuujui automatsko aktiviranje reima pretraivanja za Web dijaloge, bolje prijavljivanje oznaka grupa za polja na Webu, Podrka za nove Windows 10 tehnologije kao to su Windows Defender zatitnik aplikacija i Windows 10 na ARM64, i automatsko prijavljivanje orijentacije ekrana i statusa baterije.

segment.source: Please note that this version of NVDA no longer supports Windows XP or Windows Vista. The minimum requirement for NVDA is now windows 7 with Service Pack 1.
segment.target: Molimo imajte na umu da ova verzija programa NVDA vie ne podrava Windows XP ili Windows Vista. Najmanja zahtevana verzija Windowsa za NVDA je sada windows 7 sa Service Packom 1.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove karakteristike

segment.source: In browse mode, it is now possible to skip past/to the start of landmarks using the skip to end/beginning of container commands (comma/shift+comma). (#5482)
segment.target: U reimu pretraivanja, sada je mogue doi do kraja ili poetka orjentira komandama za prelazak na poetak ili kraj sadrivaa (zarez/ift+zarez). (#5482)

segment.source: In Firefox, Chrome and Internet Explorer, quick navigation to edit fields and form fields now includes editable rich text content (I.e. contentEditable). (#5534)
segment.target: U programima Firefox, Internet explorer i Chrome, brza navigacija po poljima za ureivanje ili unos teksta sada ukljuuje obogaena tekstualna polja oznaena kao contentEditable. (#5534)

segment.source: In web browsers, the Elements List can now list form fields and buttons. (#588)
segment.target: U web pretraivaima, lista elemenata sada moe prikazati polja za ureivanje i dugmie. (#588)

segment.source: Initial support for Windows 10 on ARM64. (#7508)
segment.target: Poetna podrka za Windows 10 na ARM64 procesorima. (#7508)

segment.source: Early support for reading and interactive navigation of mathematical content for Kindle books with accessible math. (#7536)
segment.target: Rana podrka za itanje i interakciju sa matematikim sadrajem u programu Kindle books sa accessible math. (#7536)

segment.source: Added support for Azardi e-book reader. (#5848)
segment.target: Dodata podrka za Azardi ita elektronskih knjiga. (#5848)

segment.source: Version information for add-ons is now reported when being updated. (#5324)
segment.target: Informacije o verziji dodatka se sada prikazuju kada aurirate dodatak. (#5324)

segment.source: Added new command line parameters to create a portable copy of NVDA. (#6329)
segment.target: Dodata podrka za nove parametre za pravljenje prenosne kopije programa NVDA iz komandne linije. (#6329)

segment.source: Support for Microsoft Edge running within Windows Defender Application Guard in Windows 10 Fall Creators Update. (#7600)
segment.target: Podrka za Microsoft Edge kada se pokrene iz Windows Defender zatitnika aplikacija na jesenjem auriranju Windowsa 10. (#7600)

segment.source: If running on a laptop or tablet, NVDA will now report when a charger is connected/disconnected, and when the screen orientation changes. (#4574, #4612)
segment.target: Ako je pokrenut na laptop ili tablet raunaru, NVDA e sada prijaviti kada se punja ukljui ili iskljui, i kada se orijentacija ekrana promeni . (#4574, #4612)

segment.source: New language: Macedonian.
segment.target: Novi jezik: Makedonski.

segment.source: New braille translation tables: Croatian grade 1, Vietnamese grade 1. (#7518, #7565)
segment.target: Nove tablice za brajev prevod: Hrvatski stepen 1, Vietnamski stepen 1. (#7518, #7565)

segment.source: Support for the Actilino braille display from Handy Tech has been added. (#7590)
segment.target: Podrka za Actilino brajev red kompanije Handy Tech je dodata. (#7590)

segment.source: Braille input for Handy Tech braille displays is now supported. (#7590)
segment.target: Brajev unos za Handy Tech brajeve redove je sada podran. (#7590)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promene

segment.source: The minimum supported Operating System for NVDA is now Windows 7 Service Pack 1, or Windows Server 2008 R2 Service Pack 1. (#7546)
segment.target: Minimalni zahtevan operativni sistem za NVDA je sada Windows 7 sa Service Packom 1, ili Windows Server 2008 R2 sa Service Packom 1. (#7546)

segment.source: Web dialogs in Firefox and Chrome web browsers now automatically use browse Mode, unless inside of a web application. (#4493)
segment.target: Web dijalozi u pretraivaima Firefox i Chrome sada automatski koriste reim pretraivanja, osim ako se radi u Web aplikaciji. (#4493)

segment.source: In browse mode, tabbing and moving with quick navigation commands no longer announces jumping out of containers such as lists and tables, which makes navigating more efficient. (#2591)
segment.target: U reimu pretraivanja, korienje tastera tab ili brze navigacije vie ne izgovara poetak i kraj sadrivaa na primer liste, to ini navigaciju jednostavnijom. (#2591)

segment.source: In Browse mode for Firefox and Chrome, the name of form field groups are now announced when moving into them with quick navigation or when tabbing. (#3321)
segment.target: U reimu pretraivanja programa Firefox i Chrome, imena grupa polja za ureivanje se sada izgovaraju kada koristite brzu navigaciju ili taster tab. (#3321)

segment.source: In browse mode, the quick navigation command for embedded objects (o and shift+o) now includes audio and video elements as well as elements with the aria roles application and dialog. (#7239)
segment.target: U reimu pretraivanja, komanda brze navigacije za umetnute objekte (o i ift+o) sada ukljuuje elemente za zvuk i video kao i elemente sa ARIA vrednostima aplikacije i dijaloga. (#7239)

segment.source: Espeak-ng has been updated to 1.49.2, resolving some issues with producing release builds. (#7385, #7583)
segment.target: Espeak-ng je auriran na verziju 1.49.2, ova verzija ispravlja odreene probleme sa objavljivanjem novih verzija. (#7385, #7583)

segment.source: On the third activation of the 'read status bar' command, its contents is copied to the clipboard. (#1785)
segment.target: Nakon to tri puta koristite komandu "proitaj statusnu traku", njen sadraj se kopira u privremenu memoriju. (#1785)

segment.source: When assigning gestures to keys on a Baum display, you can limit them to the model of the braille display in use (e.g. VarioUltra or Pronto). (#7517)
segment.target: Kada podeavate preice za korienje na Baum brajevom redu, moete ih ograniiti na model koji koristite (na primer VarioUltra ili Pronto). (#7517)

segment.source: The hotkey for the filter field in the elements list in browse mode has changed from alt+f to alt+e. (#7569)
segment.target: Preica za polje izdvajanja u listi elemenata u reimu pretraivanja je promenjena iz alt+f u alt+i. (#7569)

segment.source: An unbound command has been added for browse mode to toggle the inclusion of layout tables on the fly. You can find this command in the Browse mode category of the Input Gestures dialog. (#7634)
segment.target: Nedodeljena preica je dodata za reim pretraivanja koja vam omoguava da brzo ukljuite i iskljuite tabele za izgled. Moete je pronai u kategoriji reim pretraivanja ulaznih komandi. (#7634)

segment.source: Upgraded liblouis braille translator to 3.3.0. (#7565)
segment.target: Auriran liblouis brajev prevodilac na verziju 3.3.0. (#7565)

segment.source: The hotkey for the regular expression radio button in the dictionary dialog has changed from alt+r to alt+e. (#6782)
segment.target: Brajevi redovi Braillino, Bookworm i Modular (sa starijim softverom) kompanije Handy Tech vie nisu podrani. Instalirajte Handy Tech univerzalni driver i NVDA dodatak kako biste ih koristili. (#7590)

segment.source: Voice dictionary files are now versioned and have been moved to the 'speechDicts/voiceDicts.v1' directory. (#7592)
segment.target: Renici glasova sada imaju svoju verziju i prebaeni su u folder "speechDicts/voiceDicts.v1". (#7592)

segment.source: Versioned files (user configuration, voice dictionaries) modifications are no longer saved when NVDA is run from the launcher. (#7688)
segment.target: Datoteke koje imaju verziju (korisnika podeavanja, glasovni renici) se vie ne uvaju kada se privremena kopija programa NVDA pokrene. (#7688)

segment.source: The Braillino, Bookworm and Modular (with old firmware) braille displays from Handy Tech are no longer supported out of the box. Install the Handy Tech Universal Driver and NVDA add-on to use these displays. (#7590)
segment.target: Braillino, Bookworm i Modular (sa starim firmverom) brajevi redovi kompanije Handy Tech vie nisu podrazumevano podrani. Instalirajte Handy Tech univerzalni drajver i NVDA dodatak kako biste koristili ove redove. (#7590)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravljene greke

segment.source: Links are now indicated in braille in applications such as Microsoft Word. (#6780)
segment.target: Linkovi se sada ispravno prepoznaju na brajevom redu u aplikacijama kao to je Microsoft Word. (#6780)

segment.source: NVDA no longer becomes noticeably slower when many tabs are open in either Firefox or Chrome web browsers. (#3138)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne postaje znatno sporiji kada imate puno otvorenih kartica u programima Firefox i Chrome. (#3138)

segment.source: Cursor routing for the MDV Lilli Braille display no longer incorrectly moves one braille cell ahead of where it should be. (#7469)
segment.target: Prebacivanje kursora za MDV Lilli brajev red vie ne pomera kursor za jednu eliju unapred od oekivane pozicije. (#7469)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML documents, the HTML5 required attribute is now supported to indicate the required state of a form field. (#7321)
segment.target: U programu Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML dokumentima, HTML5 potreban atribut je sada podran za izgovor stanja polja za ureivanje. (#7321)

segment.source: Braille displays are now updated when typing Arabic characters in a left-aligned WordPad document. (#511)
segment.target: Brajev red se sada ispravno aurira kada piete dokumente na Arapskom u programu word pad sa poravnanjem na levoj strani. (#511).

segment.source: Accessible labels for controls in Mozilla Firefox are now more readily reported in browse mode when the label does not appear as content itself. (#4773)
segment.target: Imena za kontrole u programu Mozilla firefox u reimu pretraivanja se sada bolje prijavljuju kada ime nije deo sadraja. (#4773)

segment.source: On windows 10 Creaters Update, NVDA can again access Firefox after a restart of NVDA. (#7269)
segment.target: Na Windows 10 creators auriranju, NVDA moe ponovo pristupiti programu Firefox ak i kada se NVDA ponovo pokrene. (#7269)

segment.source: When restarting NVDA with Mozilla Firefox in focus, browse mode will again be available, though you may need to alt+tab away and back again. (#5758)
segment.target: Kada ponovo pokrenete program NVDA dok je program Mozilla firefox fokusiran, reim pretraivanja e ponovo biti dostupan, ali moda ete morati da koristite komandu alt+tab da se prebacite na neki drugi prozor a nakon toga vratite u Firefox. (#5758)

segment.source: It is now possible to access math content in Google Chrome on a system with out Mozilla Firefox installed. (#7308)
segment.target: Sada je mogue pristupiti matematikom sadraju u programu Google Chrome ak i na sistemima gde program Mozilla Firefox nije instaliran. (#7308)

segment.source: The Operating System and other applications should be more stable directly after installing NVDA before rebooting, as compaired with installs of previous NVDA versions. (#7563)
segment.target: Druge aplikacije i sam operativni sistem bi trebalo da budu stabilniji nakon instalacije programa NVDA bez ponovnog pokretanja, u poreenju sa instalacijom prethodnih verzija. (#7563)

segment.source: When using a content recognition command (e.g. NVDA+r), NVDA now reports an error message instead of nothing if the navigator object has disappeared. (#7567)
segment.target: Kada se koristi komanda za prepoznavanje sadraja (na primer NVDA+r), NVDA sada prijavljuje greku umesto niega ako navigacioni objekat nestane. (#7567)

segment.source: Backward scrolling functionality has been fixed for Freedom Scientific braille displays containing a left bumper bar. (#7713)
segment.target: Pomeranje brajevih redova unazad je popravljeno za Freedom scientific brajeve redove koji poseduju levu liniju za pomeranje. (#7713)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promene za programere (engleski)

segment.source: "scons tests" now checks that translatable strings have translator comments. You can also run this alone with "scons checkPot". (#7492)
segment.target: "scons tests" now checks that translatable strings have translator comments. You can also run this alone with "scons checkPot". (#7492)

segment.source: There is now a new extensionPoints module which provides a generic framework to enable code extensibility at specific points in the code. This allows interested parties to register to be notified when some action occurs (extensionPoints.Action), to modify a specific kind of data (extensionPoints.Filter) or to participate in deciding whether something will be done (extensionPoints.Decider). (#3393)
segment.target: There is now a new extensionPoints module which provides a generic framework to enable code extensibility at specific points in the code. This allows interested parties to register to be notified when some action occurs (extensionPoints.Action), to modify a specific kind of data (extensionPoints.Filter) or to participate in deciding whether something will be done (extensionPoints.Decider). (#3393)

segment.source: You can now register to be notified about configuration profile switches via the config.configProfileSwitched Action. (#3393)
segment.target: You can now register to be notified about configuration profile switches via the config.configProfileSwitched Action. (#3393)

segment.source: Braille display gestures that emulate system keyboard key modifiers (such as control and alt) can now be combined with other emulated system keyboard keys without explicit definition. (#6213)
segment.target: Braille display gestures that emulate system keyboard key modifiers (such as control and alt) can now be combined with other emulated system keyboard keys without explicit definition. (#6213)

segment.source: For example, if you have a key on your display bound to the alt key and another display key to downArrow, combining these keys will result in the emulation of alt+downArrow.
segment.target: For example, if you have a key on your display bound to the alt key and another display key to downArrow, combining these keys will result in the emulation of alt+downArrow.

segment.source: The braille.BrailleDisplayGesture class now has an extra model property. If provided, pressing a key will generate an additional, model specific gesture identifier. This allows a user to bind gestures limited to a specific braille display model.
segment.target: The braille.BrailleDisplayGesture class now has an extra model property. If provided, pressing a key will generate an additional, model specific gesture identifier. This allows a user to bind gestures limited to a specific braille display model.

segment.source: See the baum driver as an example for this new functionality.
segment.target: See the baum driver as an example for this new functionality.

segment.source: NVDA is now compiled with Visual Studio 2017 and the Windows 10 SDK. (#7568)
segment.target: NVDA is now compiled with Visual Studio 2017 and the Windows 10 SDK. (#7568)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include input of contracted braille, support for new Windows OneCore voices available on Windows 10, in-built support for Windows 10 OCR, and many significant improvements regarding Braille and the web.
segment.target: Glavne karakteristike ove verzije ukljuuju unos skraenog brajevog pisma, podrka za nove Windows OneCore glasove dostupne na Windowsu 10, ugraena podrka za Windows 10 OCR, i puno znaajnih poboljanja za brajev red i Web.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove karakteristike

segment.source: A Braille setting has been added to "show messages indefinitely". (#6669)
segment.target: Podeavanje za brajev red je dodato na opciju"beskonani prikaz poruka". (#6669)

segment.source: In Microsoft Outlook message lists, NVDA now reports if a message is flagged. (#6374)
segment.target: U listi poruka programa Microsoft Outlook, NVDA izgovara oznaenu poruku. (#6374)

segment.source: In Microsoft PowerPoint, the exact type of a shape is now reported when editing a slide (such as triangle, circle, video or arrow), rather than just "shape". (#7111)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Powerpoint, precizna vrsta oblika se sada prijavljuje u toku ureivanja slajdova (primeri ukljuuju: Trougao, krug, video, strelica), umesto ranijeg izgovora " Oblik". (#7111)

segment.source: Mathematical content (provided as MathML) is now supported in Google Chrome. (#7184)
segment.target: Matematiki sadraj (ponuen kao MathML) je sada podran u programu Google Chrome. (#7184)

segment.source: NVDA can now speak using the new Windows OneCore voices (also known as Microsoft Mobile voices) included in Windows 10. You access these by selecting Windows OneCore voices in NVDA's Synthesizer dialog. (#6159)
segment.target: NVDA sada moe da govori koristei nove Windows OneCore glasove (takoe poznati kao mobilni glasovi) koji su ukljueni u Windows 10. Pristupate im izborom opcije Windows OneCore glasovi u NVDA dijalogu za izbor sintetizatora. (#6159)

segment.source: NVDA user configuration files can now be stored in the user's local application data folder. This is enabled via a setting in the registry. See "System Wide Parameters" in the User Guide for more details. (#6812)
segment.target: NVDA Datoteke sa korisnikim podeavanjima se sada mogu uvati u korisnikom local folderu foldera app data. Ovo se ukljuuje menjanjem podeavanja u registry bazi. Pogledajte "Sistemski parametri" u korisnikom uputstvu za vie detalja. (#6812)

segment.source: In web browsers, NVDA now reports placeholder values for fields (specifically, aria-placeholder is now supported). (#7004)
segment.target: U Web pretraivaima, NVDA sada prijavljuje vrednosti sadrivaa mesta za polja(konkretno, aria-placeholder je sada podran). (#7004)

segment.source: In Browse mode for Microsoft Word, it is now possible to navigate to spelling errors using quick navigation (w and shift+w). (#6942)
segment.target: U reimu pretraivanja programa Microsoft Word, mogua je brza navigacija izmeu pravopisnih greaka (w i ift+w) (#6942)

segment.source: Added support for the Date picker control found in Microsoft Outlook Appointment dialogs. (#7217)
segment.target: Dodata podrka za kontrole izbora datuma u dijalogu za dodavanje podsetnika u programu Microsoft Outlook . (#7217)

segment.source: The currently selected suggestion is now reported in Windows 10 Mail to/cc fields and the Windows 10 Settings search field. (#6241)
segment.target: Trenutno izabran predlog se sada prijavljuje u Windows 10 mail aplikaciji u poljima za izbor primaoca i u polju pretrage Windows 10 aplikacije za podeavanja. (#6241)

segment.source: A sound is now playd to indicate the appearance of suggestions in certain search fields in Windows 10 (E.g. start screen, settings search, Windows 10 mail to/cc fields). (#6241)
segment.target: Zvuk koji obavetava o dostupnim predlozima se sada reprodukuje u odreenim poljima pretrage Windows 10 sistema (Na primer Start ekran, polje pretrage aplikacije podeavanja, polja za unos primaoca u Windows 10 mail aplikaciji). (#6241)

segment.source: NVDA now automatically reports notifications in Skype for Business Desktop, such as when someone starts a conversation with you. (#7281)
segment.target: NVDA sada automatski prijavljuje Obavetenja u aplikaciji Skype za biznis korisnike, na primer kada neko zapone razgovor sa vama. (#7281)

segment.source: NVDA now automatically reports incoming chat messages while in a Skype for Business conversation. (#7286)
segment.target: NVDA sada automatski prijavljuje poruke dok ste u prozoru nekog razgovora aplikacije Skype za biznis korisnike. (#7286)

segment.source: NVDA now automatically reports notifications in Microsoft Edge, such as when a download starts. (#7281)
segment.target: Automatsko prijavljivanje obavetenja u programu Microsoft Edge, na primer kada preuzimanje pone. (#7281)

segment.source: You can now type in both contracted and uncontracted braille on a braille display with a braille keyboard. See the Braille Input section of the User Guide for details. (#2439)
segment.target: Sada moete pisati u skraenom unosu na brajevoj tastaturi brajevog reda. Pogledajte deo brajev unos korisnikog uputstva za vie detalja. (#2439)

segment.source: You can now enter Unicode braille characters from the braille keyboard on a braille display by selecting Unicode braille as the input table in Braille Settings. (#6449)
segment.target: Moete upisati unikodne brajeve znakove sa brajeve tastature izborom unikodne brajeve tabele. (#6449)

segment.source: Added support for the SuperBraille braille display used in Taiwan. (#7352)
segment.target: Dodata podrka za SuperBraille brajev red koji se koristi u Tajvanu. (#7352)

segment.source: New braille translation tables: Danish 8 dot computer braille, Lithuanian, Persian 8 dot computer braille, Persian grade 1, Slovenian 8 dot computer braille. (#6188, #6550, #6773, #7367)
segment.target: Nove brajeve tabele: Danski osmotakasti kompjuterski brajev kod, Litvanski, Persijski osmotakasti kompjuterski brajev kod, Persijski stepen 1, Slovenski osmotakasti kompjuterski brajev kod. (#6188, #6550, #6773, #7367)

segment.source: Improved English (U.S.) 8 dot computer braille table, including support for bullets, the euro sign and accented letters. (#6836)
segment.target: Poboljana Engleska(Sjedinjene amerike drave.) osmotakasta kompjuterska brajeva tabela, ukljuujui podrku za nabrajanja, znak za evro i akcentovana slova. (#6836)

segment.source: NVDA can now use the OCR functionality included in Windows 10 to recognize the text of images or inaccessible applications. (#7361)
segment.target: NVDA sada moe koristiti OCR funkciju koja je ukljuena u Windows 10 da prepozna tekst slika ili nepristupanih aplikacija. (#7361)

segment.source: The language can be set from the new Windows 10 OCR dialog in NVDA Preferences.
segment.target: The language can be set from the new Windows 10 OCR dialog in NVDA Preferences.

segment.source: To recognize the content of the current navigator object, press NVDA+r.
segment.target: To recognize the content of the current navigator object, press NVDA+r.

segment.source: See the Content Recognition section of the User Guide for further details.
segment.target: See the Content Recognition section of the User Guide for further details.

segment.source: You can now choose what context information is shown on a braille display when an object gets focus using the new "Focus context presentation" setting in the Braille Settings dialog. (#217)
segment.target: Sada moete izabrati informacije o sadraju fokusa koje e se prikazati na brajevom redu korienjem nove opcije "Predstavljanje sadraja fokusa" u dijalogu brajeva podeavanja. (#217)

segment.source: For example, the "Fill display for context changes" and "Only when scrolling back" options can make working with lists and menus more efficient, since the items won't continually change their position on the display.
segment.target: For example, the "Fill display for context changes" and "Only when scrolling back" options can make working with lists and menus more efficient, since the items won't continually change their position on the display.

segment.source: See the section on the "Focus context presentation" setting in the User Guide for further details and examples.
segment.target: See the section on the "Focus context presentation" setting in the User Guide for further details and examples.

segment.source: In Firefox and Chrome, NVDA now supports complex dynamic grids such as spreadsheets where only some of the content might be loaded or displayed (specifically, the aria-rowcount, aria-colcount, aria-rowindex and aria-colindex attributes introduced in ARIA 1.1). (#7410)
segment.target: U programima Firefox i Chrome, NVDA sada podrava dinamike prikaze mrea kao to su tabele u kojima se moe uitati ili prikazati samo deo sadraja (konkretno, aria-rowcount, aria-colcount, aria-rowindex i aria-colindex atributi koji su ubaeni u ARIA 1.1). (#7410)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promene

segment.source: An unbound command has been added to restart NVDA on demand. You can find it in the Miscelaneous category of the Input Gestures dialog. (#6396)
segment.target: Nedodeljena komanda je dodata za ponovno pokretanje programa NVDA. Moete je pronai u kategoriji razno dijaloga ulazne komande. (#6396)

segment.source: The keyboard layout can now be set from the NVDA Welcome dialog. (#6863)
segment.target: Raspored tastature se sada moe podesiti iz dijaloga dobrodolice. (#6863)

segment.source: Many more control types and states have been abbreviated for braille. Landmarks have also been abbreviated. Please see "Control Type, State and Landmark Abbreviations" under Braille in the User Guide for a complete list. (#7188, #3975)
segment.target: Puno novih vrsta kontrola je dobilo svoje skraenice za brajev red. Orjentiri su takoe dobili skraenice. Molimo proitajte "Skraenice za vrste, stanje kontrola i orjentire" u korisnikom uputstvu za potpunu listu. (#7188, #3975)

segment.source: Updated eSpeak NG to 1.49.1. (#7280)
segment.target: Espeak-ng je auriran na verziju 1.49.1 (#7280).

segment.source: The output and input table lists in the Braille Settings dialog are now sorted alphabetically. (#6113)
segment.target: Ulazne i izlazne tabele u dijalogu brajevih podeavanja su sada poreane po abecedi. (#6113)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to 3.2.0. (#6935)
segment.target: Auriran liblouis brajev prevodilac na verziju 3.2.0. (#6935)

segment.source: The default braille table is now Unified English Braille Code grade 1. (#6952)
segment.target: Podrazumevana brajeva tabela je sada Engleski brajev kod stepen 1. (#6952)

segment.source: By default, NVDA now only shows the parts of the context information that have changed on a braille display when an object gets focus. (#217)
segment.target: Po podrazumevanim podeavanjima, NVDA sada prikazuje samo deo sadraja na brajevom redu koji je promenjen kada neki objekat dobije fokus. (#217)

segment.source: Previously, it always showed as much context information as possible, regardless of whether you have seen the same context information before.
segment.target: Previously, it always showed as much context information as possible, regardless of whether you have seen the same context information before.

segment.source: You can revert to the old behaviour by changing the new "Focus context presentation" setting in the Braille Settings dialog to "Always fill display".
segment.target: You can revert to the old behaviour by changing the new "Focus context presentation" setting in the Braille Settings dialog to "Always fill display".

segment.source: When using Braille, the cursor can be configured to be a different shape when tethered to focus or review. (#7122)
segment.target: Kada koristite brajev red, kursor se moe podesiti za drugaiji oblik kada je brajev red vezan za fokus ili pregled. (#7122)

segment.source: The NVDA logo has been updated. The updated NVDA logo is a stylised blend of the letters NVDA in white, on a solid purple background. This ensures it will be visible on any colour background, and uses the purple from the NV Access logo. (#7446)
segment.target: NVDA logo je auriran. Auriran logo su slova NVDA u belom, na ljubiastoj pozadini. Ovo omoguava da bude vidljiv na bilo kojoj pozadini, i koristi ljubiastu boju iz NV Access logoa. (#7446)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravljene greke

segment.source: Editable div elements in Chrome no longer have their label reported as their value while in browse mode. (#7153)
segment.target: Ureivaki div elementi u programu Chrome vie ne prijavljuju svoju oznaku kao vrednost u reimu pretraivanja. (#7153)

segment.source: Pressing end while in browse mode for an empty Microsoft Word document no longer causes a runtime error. (#7009)
segment.target: Pritiskanje tastera end dok ste u reimu pretraivanja praznog Microsoft Word dokumenta vie ne izaziva greku. (#7009)

segment.source: Browse mode is now correctly supported in Microsoft Edge where a document has been given a specific ARIA role of document. (#6998)
segment.target: Reim pretraivanja je sada ispravno podran u dokumentima programa Microsoft Edge gde dokument ima posebnu ARIA vrednost document. (#6998)

segment.source: In browse mode, you can now select or unselect to the end of the line using shift+end even when the caret is on the last character of the line. (#7157)
segment.target: U reimu pretraivanja, moete birati ili ponitavati izbor znaka na kraju reda korienjem komande ift+end ak i kada je kursor na poslednjem znaku reda. (#7157)

segment.source: If a dialog contains a progress bar, the dialog text is now updated in braille when the progress bar changes. This means, for example, that the remaining time can now be read in NVDA's "Downloading Update" dialog. (#6862)
segment.target: Ako dijalog sadri traku napredovanja, tekst dijaloga se aurira kada se traka napredovanja promeni. Ovo znai, na primer, da sada moete itati preostalo vreme u NVDA-ovom dijalogu"preuzimanje auriranja". (#6862)

segment.source: NVDA will now announce selection changes for certain Windows 10 combo boxes such as AutoPlay in Settings. (#6337).
segment.target: NVDA e sada izgovarati promene izbora u odreenim izbornim okvirima sistema Windows 10 na primer automatska reprodukcija u podeavanjima. (#6337).

segment.source: Pointless information is no longer announced when entering Meeting / Appointment creation dialogs in Microsoft Outlook. (#7216)
segment.target: Bespotrebne informacije sada se nee izgovarati kada ulazite u dijalog za dodavanje sastanka/podsetnika programa Microsoft Outlook. (#7216)

segment.source: Beeps for indeterminate progress bar dialogs such as the update checker only when progress bar output is configured to include beeps. (#6759)
segment.target: Pitanja za trake napredovanja koje su beskonane kao to je provera auriranja programa NVDA se sada reprodukuju samo kada su omoguena. (#6759)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel 2003 and 2007, cells are again reported when arrowing around a worksheet. (#7243)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Excel 2007 i 2003, elije se ponovo prijavljuju kada se kreete kroz radni list. (#7243)

segment.source: In Windows 10 Creators Update and later, browse mode is again automatically enabled when reading emails in Windows 10 Mail. (#7289)
segment.target: U Windows 10 Creators auriranju i novijim auriranjima, reim pretraivanja e ponovo automatski biti omoguen tokom itanja poruka u Windows 10 Mail aplikaciji. (#7289)

segment.source: On most braille displays with a braille keyboard, dot 7 now erases the last entered braille cell or character, and dot 8 presses the enter key. (#6054)
segment.target: Na veini brajevih redova sa brajevom tastaturom, taka 7 sada brie poslednju dodatu brajevu eliju ili znak, a taka 8 pritiska taster enter. (#6054)

segment.source: In editable text, when moving the caret (e.g. with the cursor keys or backspace), NVDA's spoken feedback is now more accurate in many cases, particularly in Chrome and terminal applications. (#6424)
segment.target: Kada se ureuje tekst, dok pomerate kursor(npr. sa kursorskim tasterima ili tasterom backspace), NVDAovo itanje je preciznije u puno sluajeva, posebno u Chromeu i terminal aplikacijama. (#6424)

segment.source: The content of the Signature Editor in Microsoft Outlook 2016 can now be read. (#7253)
segment.target: Sadraj ureivaa opisa programa Microsoft Outlook 2016 sada moe da se ita. (#7253)

segment.source: In Java Swing applications, NVDA no longer sometimes causes the application to crash when navigating tables. (#6992)
segment.target: U Java Swing aplikacijama, NVDA vie ne zaustavlja aplikaciju u odreenim situacijama navigacije kroz tabele. (#6992)

segment.source: In Windows 10 Creators Update, NVDA will no longer announce toast notifications multiple times. (#7128)
segment.target: U Windows 10 Creators auriranju, NVDA vie nee izgovarati obavetenja vie puta. (#7128)

segment.source: In The start menu in Windows 10, pressing Enter to close the start menu after a search no longer causes NVDA to announce search text. (#7370)
segment.target: U start meniju Windowsa 10, pritiskanje tastera enter nakon pretrage vie ne izaziva NVDA da ponovi upisan tekst. (#7370)

segment.source: Performing quick navigation to headings in Microsoft Edge is now significantly faster. (#7343)
segment.target: Brza navigacija kroz naslove u programu Microsoft Edge je sada znatno ubrzana. (#7343)

segment.source: In Microsoft Edge, navigating in browse mode no longer skips large parts of certain web pages such as the Wordpress 2015 theme. (#7143)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Edge, navigacija u reimu pretraivanja vie ne preskae delove stranica kao to su Wordpress 2015 tema. (#7143)

segment.source: In Microsoft Edge, landmarks are correctly localized in languages other than English. (#7328)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Edge, obeleivai se ispravno prijavljuju na drugim jezicima. (#7328)

segment.source: Braille now correctly follows the selection when selecting text beyond the width of the display. For example, if you select multiple lines with shift+downArrow, braille now shows the last line you selected. (#5770)
segment.target: Brajev red sada ispravno prati izbor teksta ak i kada birate tekst koji je vei od brajevog reda. Na primer, Ako birate vie redova teksta komandom ift+ strelica dole, brajev red sada prikazuje poslednji red izabranog teksta. (#5770)

segment.source: In Firefox, NVDA no longer spuriously reports "section" several times when opening details for a tweet on twitter.com. (#5741)
segment.target: U Firefoxu, NVDA vie ne izgovara "Sekcija" vie puta kada otvarate detalje za tweet na sajtu twitter.com. (#5741)

segment.source: Table navigation commands are no longer available for layout tables in Browse Mode unless reporting of layout tables is enabled. (#7382)
segment.target: Komande za navigaciju kroz tabele vie nisu dostupne za table koje slue samo za izgled osim ako prijavljivanje takvih tabela nije omogueno. (#7382)

segment.source: In Firefox and Chrome, Browse Mode table navigation commands now skip over hidden table cells. (#6652, #5655)
segment.target: U programima Firefox i Chrome, komande za navigaciju kroz tabele sada preskau skrivene elije u tabelama. (#6652, #5655)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promene za programere (engleski)

segment.source: Timestamps in the log now include milliseconds. (#7163)
segment.target: Timestamps in the log now include milliseconds. (#7163)

segment.source: NVDA must now be built with Visual Studio Community 2015. Visual Studio Express is no longer supported. (#7110)
segment.target: NVDA must now be built with Visual Studio Community 2015. Visual Studio Express is no longer supported. (#7110)

segment.source: The Windows 10 Tools and SDK are now also required, which can be enabled when installing Visual Studio.
segment.target: The Windows 10 Tools and SDK are now also required, which can be enabled when installing Visual Studio.

segment.source: See the Installed Dependencies section of the readme for additional details.
segment.target: See the Installed Dependencies section of the readme for additional details.

segment.source: Support for content recognizers such as OCR and image description tools can be easily implemented using the new contentRecog package. (#7361)
segment.target: Support for content recognizers such as OCR and image description tools can be easily implemented using the new contentRecog package. (#7361)

segment.source: The Python json package is now included in NVDA binary builds. (#3050)
segment.target: The Python json package is now included in NVDA binary builds. (#3050)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include full support for audio ducking in the Windows 10 Creators Update; fixes for several selection issues in browse mode, including problems with select all; significant improvements in Microsoft Edge support; and improvements on the web such as indication of elements marked as current (using aria-current).
segment.target: Glavne karakteristike ove verzije ukljuuju podrku za stiavanje pozadinskih zvukova u Windows 10 creators auriranju; ispravljeni problemi sa izborom teksta u reimu pretraivanja, ukljuujui probleme sa komandom izaberi sve; velika poboljanja za Microsoft Edge podrku; i poboljanja Web podrke to ukljuuje izgovor elemenata koji su oznaeni kao trenutni(koristei aria-current).

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove karakteristike

segment.source: Cell border information can now be reported in Microsoft Excel by using NVDA+f. (#3044)
segment.target: Informacije o granicama elija sada mogu biti izgovorene u programu Microsoft Excel koristei komandu NVDA+f. (#3044)

segment.source: In web browsers, NVDA now indicates when an element has been marked as current (specifically, using the aria-current attribute). (#6358)
segment.target: U Web pretraivaima, NVDA sada izgovara kada se element oznai kao trenutni(konkretno, koristei aria-current svojstvo). (#6358)

segment.source: Automatic language switching is now supported in Microsoft Edge. (#6852)
segment.target: Podrka za automatsku promenu jezika u programu Microsoft Edge. (#6852)

segment.source: Added support for Windows Calculator on Windows 10 Enterprise LTSB (Long-Term Servicing Branch) and Server. (#6914)
segment.target: Podrka za Windows kalkulator na Windows 10 Enterprise LTSB (Long-Term Servicing Branch) i Server verzijama. (#6914)

segment.source: Performing the read current line command three times quickly spells the line with character descriptions. (#6893)
segment.target: Kada se koristi komanda za itanje trenutnog reda tri puta trenutni red se srie koristei fonetsko sricanje. (#6893)

segment.source: New language: Burmese.
segment.target: Novi jezik: Bermudski.

segment.source: Unicode up and down arrows and fraction symbols are now spoken appropriately. (#3805)
segment.target: Simboli za strelice gore i dole i ostali unikod simboli se sada ispravno itaju. (#3805)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promene

segment.source: When navigating with simple review in applications using UI Automation, more extraneous objects are now ignored, making navigation easier. (#6948, #6950)
segment.target: Kada se koristi jednostavan pregled u aplikacijama koje koriste UI automaciju, vie stavki koje nemaju sadraj se ignoriu kako bi navigacija bila olakana. (#6948, #6950)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravljene greke

segment.source: Web page menu items can now be activated while in browse mode. (#6735)
segment.target: Stavke menija na web stranicama(stavka menija za potvrdu i radio dugme) se sada mogu aktivirati u reimu pretraivanja. (#6735)

segment.source: Pressing escape while the configuration profile "Confirm Deletion" dialog is active now dismisses the dialog. (#6851)
segment.target: Ako se pritisne ESC dok je dijalog u konfiguracionim profilima"potvrdi brisanje" aktivan dialog se zatvara. (#6851)

segment.source: Fixed some crashes in Mozilla Firefox and other Gecko applications where the multi-process feature is enabled. (#6885)
segment.target: Popravljene odreene nestabilnosti u programu Mozilla Firefox i drugim Gecko aplikacijama gde je multi-process stavka omoguena. (#6885)

segment.source: Reporting of background color in screen review is now more accurate when text was drawn with a transparent background. (#6467)
segment.target: Prijavljivanje boja u reimu pregleda ekrana je sada preciznije kada je tekst preslikan transparentnom pozadinom(#6467)

segment.source: Improved support for control descriptions provided on web pages in Internet Explorer 11 (specifically, support for aria-describedby within iframes and when multiple IDs are provided). (#5784)
segment.target: Poboljana podrka za aria-describedby u programu Internet Explorer 11, ukljuujui podrku u okvirima i kada je vie imena ponueno. (#5784)

segment.source: In the Windows 10 Creators Update, NVDA's audio ducking again works as in previous Windows releases; i.e. Duck with speech and sounds, always duck and no ducking are all available. (#6933)
segment.target: U Windows Creators auriranju, NVDA stiavanje pozadinskih zvukova ponovo radi kao i u prethodnim verzijama(to jest stiavaj u toku izgovaranja, uvek stiavaj, i bez stiavanja su dostupni). (#6933)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer fail to navigate to or report certain (UIA) controls where a keyboard shortcut is not defined. (#6779)
segment.target: NVDA nee vie greiti u prijavljivanju ili navigaciji do odreenih (UIA) kontrola gde ne postoji tastaturna preica. (#6779)

segment.source: Two empty spaces are no longer added in keyboard shortcut information for certain (UIA) controls. (#6790)
segment.target: Dva razmaka nee vie biti dodata za odreene (UIA) kontrole. (#6790)

segment.source: Certain combinations of keys on HIMS displays (e.g. space+dot4) no longer fail intermittently. (#3157)
segment.target: Odreene kombinacije tastera na HIMS brajevim redovima(na primer razmak+taka 4) vie nee biti neuspene. (#3157)

segment.source: Fixed an issue when opening a serial port on systems using certain languages other than English which caused connecting to braille displays to fail in some cases. (#6845)
segment.target: Popravljena greka gde otvaranje serijskog porta na jezicima koji nisu engleski dovodi do neuspene veze sa brajevim redom u odreenim sluajevima. (#6845)

segment.source: Reduced the chance of the configuration file being corrupted when Windows shuts down. Configuration files are now written to a temporary file before replacing the actual configuration file. (#3165)
segment.target: Smanjena ansa oteenja datoteke sa podeavanjima kada se Windows iskljui. Datoteka sa podeavanjima se sada prvo uva u privremenoj datoteci pre promene trenutne datoteke. (#3165)

segment.source: When performing the read current line command twice quickly to spell the line, the appropriate language is now used for the spelled characters. (#6726)
segment.target: Kada se koristi komanda za itanje trenutnog reda dva puta za sricanje, ispravan jezik se koristi za slova. (#6726)

segment.source: Navigating by line in Microsoft Edge is now up to three times faster in the Windows 10 Creators Update. (#6994)
segment.target: Kretanje po redovima u programu Microsoft Edge je do 3 puta bre u Windows 10 Creators auriranju. (#6994)

segment.source: NVDA no longer announces "Web Runtime grouping" when focusing Microsoft Edge documents in the Windows 10 Creators Update. (#6948)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne izgovara"Web Runtime grouping" kada je fokus na Microsoft Edge dokumentima u Windows 10 Creators auriranju (#6948)

segment.source: All existing versions of SecureCRT are now supported. (#6302)
segment.target: Sve postojee verzije SecureCRT su sada podrane. (#6302)

segment.source: Adobe Acrobat Reader no longer crashes in certain PDF documents (specifically, those containing empty ActualText attributes). (#7021, #7034)
segment.target: Adobe Acrobat Reader ne prestaje da radi u odreenim dokumentima(specifino, u onim koji sadre prazne atribute teksta). (#7021, #7034)

segment.source: In browse mode in Microsoft Edge, interactive tables (ARIA grids) are no longer skipped when navigating to tables with t and shift+t. (#6977)
segment.target: U reimu pretraivanja programa Microsoft Edge, interaktivne tabele(ARIA mree) se vie ne preskau u toku navigacije kroz tabele tasterima t i ift+t. (#6977)

segment.source: In browse mode, pressing shift+home after selecting forward now unselects to the beginning of the line as expected. (#5746)
segment.target: U reimu pretraivanja, komanda ift+home nakon biranja teksta napred ispravno ponitava izbor do poetka reda. (#5746)

segment.source: In browse mode, select all (control+a) no longer fails to select all text if the caret is not at the start of the text. (#6909)
segment.target: U reimu pretraivanja, izaberi sve(kontrol+a) vie nee neispravno birati tekst ako kursor nije na poetku teksta. (#6909)

segment.source: Fixed some other rare selection problems in browse mode. (#7131)
segment.target: Popravljeni ostali retki problemi sa izborom teksta u reimu pretraivanja. (#7131)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promene za programere (engleski)

segment.source: Commandline arguments are now processed with Python's argparse module, rather than optparse. This allows certain options such as -r and -q to be handled exclusively. (#6865)
segment.target: Commandline arguments are now processed with Python's argparse module, rather than optparse. This allows certain options such as -r and -q to be handled exclusively. (#6865)

segment.source: core.callLater now queues the callback to NVDA's main queue after the given delay, rather than waking the core and executing it directly. This stops possible freezes due to the core accidentally going to sleep after processing a callback, in the midle of a modal call such as the desplaying of a message box. (#6797)
segment.target: core.callLater now queues the callback to NVDA's main queue after the given delay, rather than waking the core and executing it directly. This stops possible freezes due to the core accidentally going to sleep after processing a callback, in the midle of a modal call such as the desplaying of a message box. (#6797)

segment.source: The InputGesture.identifiers property has been changed so that it is no longer normalized. (#6945)
segment.target: The InputGesture.identifiers property has been changed so that it is no longer normalized. (#6945)

segment.source: Subclasses no longer need to normalize identifiers before returning them from this property.
segment.target: Subclasses no longer need to normalize identifiers before returning them from this property.

segment.source: If you want normalized identifiers, there is now an InputGesture.normalizedIdentifiers property which normalizes the identifiers returned by the identifiers property .
segment.target: If you want normalized identifiers, there is now an InputGesture.normalizedIdentifiers property which normalizes the identifiers returned by the identifiers property .

segment.source: The InputGesture.logIdentifier property is now deprecated. Callers should use InputGesture.identifiers[0] instead. (#6945)
segment.target: The InputGesture.logIdentifier property is now deprecated. Callers should use InputGesture.identifiers[0] instead. (#6945)

segment.source: Removed some deprecated code:
segment.target: Removed some deprecated code:

segment.source: `speech.REASON_*` constants: `controlTypes.REASON_*` should be used instead. (#6846)
segment.target: `speech.REASON_*` constants: `controlTypes.REASON_*` should be used instead. (#6846)

segment.source: `i18nName` for synth settings: `displayName` and `displayNameWithAccelerator` should be used instead. (#6846, #5185)
segment.target: `i18nName` for synth settings: `displayName` and `displayNameWithAccelerator` should be used instead. (#6846, #5185)

segment.source: `config.validateConfig`. (#6846, #667)
segment.target: `config.validateConfig`. (#6846, #667)

segment.source: `config.save`: `config.conf.save` should be used instead. (#6846, #667)
segment.target: `config.save`: `config.conf.save` should be used instead. (#6846, #667)

segment.source: The list of completions in the autocomplete context menu of the Python Console no longer shows any object path leading up to the final symbol being completed. (#7023)
segment.target: The list of completions in the autocomplete context menu of the Python Console no longer shows any object path leading up to the final symbol being completed. (#7023)

segment.source: There is now a unit testing framework for NVDA. (#7026)
segment.target: There is now a unit testing framework for NVDA. (#7026)

segment.source: Unit tests and infrastructure are located in the tests/unit directory. See the docstring in the tests\unit\init.py file for details.
segment.target: Unit tests and infrastructure are located in the tests/unit directory. See the docstring in the tests\unit\init.py file for details.

segment.source: You can run tests using "scons tests". See the "Running Tests" section of readme.md for details.
segment.target: You can run tests using "scons tests". See the "Running Tests" section of readme.md for details.

segment.source: If you are submitting a pull request for NVDA, you should first run the tests and ensure they pass.
segment.target: If you are submitting a pull request for NVDA, you should first run the tests and ensure they pass.
2017.1 (promene za starije verzije su na engleskom)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include reporting of sections and text columns in Microsoft Word; Support for reading, navigating and annotating books in Kindle for PC; and improved support for Microsoft Edge.
segment.target: Highlights of this release include reporting of sections and text columns in Microsoft Word; Support for reading, navigating and annotating books in Kindle for PC; and improved support for Microsoft Edge.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: New Features

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, the types of section breaks and section numbers can now be reported. This is enabled with the "Report page numbers" option in the Document Formatting dialog. (#5946)
segment.target: In Microsoft Word, the types of section breaks and section numbers can now be reported. This is enabled with the "Report page numbers" option in the Document Formatting dialog. (#5946)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, text columns can now be reported. This is enabled with the "Report page numbers" option in the document formatting dialog. (#5946)
segment.target: In Microsoft Word, text columns can now be reported. This is enabled with the "Report page numbers" option in the document formatting dialog. (#5946)

segment.source: Automatic language switching is now supported in WordPad. (#6555)
segment.target: Automatic language switching is now supported in WordPad. (#6555)

segment.source: The NVDA find command (NVDA+control+f) is now supported in browse mode in Microsoft Edge. (#6580)
segment.target: The NVDA find command (NVDA+control+f) is now supported in browse mode in Microsoft Edge. (#6580)

segment.source: Quick navigation for buttons in browse mode (b and shift+b) is now supported in Microsoft Edge. (#6577)
segment.target: Quick navigation for buttons in browse mode (b and shift+b) is now supported in Microsoft Edge. (#6577)

segment.source: When copying a sheet in Microsoft Excel, column and row headers are remembered. (#6628)
segment.target: When copying a sheet in Microsoft Excel, column and row headers are remembered. (#6628)

segment.source: Support for reading and navigating books in Kindle for PC version 1.19, including access to links, footnotes, graphics, highlighted text and user notes. Please see the Kindle for PC section of the NVDA User Guide for further information. (#6247, #6638)
segment.target: Support for reading and navigating books in Kindle for PC version 1.19, including access to links, footnotes, graphics, highlighted text and user notes. Please see the Kindle for PC section of the NVDA User Guide for further information. (#6247, #6638)

segment.source: Browse mode table navigation is now supported in Microsoft Edge. (#6594)
segment.target: Browse mode table navigation is now supported in Microsoft Edge. (#6594)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, the report review cursor location command (desktop: NVDA+numpadDelete, laptop: NVDA+delete) now reports the name of the worksheet and the cell location. (#6613)
segment.target: In Microsoft Excel, the report review cursor location command (desktop: NVDA+numpadDelete, laptop: NVDA+delete) now reports the name of the worksheet and the cell location. (#6613)

segment.source: Added an option to the exit dialog to restart with debug level logging. (#6689)
segment.target: Added an option to the exit dialog to restart with debug level logging. (#6689)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Changes

segment.source: The minimum braille cursor blink rate is now 200 ms. If this was previously set lower, it will be increased to 200 ms. (#6470)
segment.target: The minimum braille cursor blink rate is now 200 ms. If this was previously set lower, it will be increased to 200 ms. (#6470)

segment.source: A check box has been added to the braille settings dialog to allow enabling/disabling braille cursor blinking. Previously a value of zero was used to achieve this. (#6470)
segment.target: A check box has been added to the braille settings dialog to allow enabling/disabling braille cursor blinking. Previously a value of zero was used to achieve this. (#6470)

segment.source: Updated eSpeak NG (commit e095f008, 10 January 2017). (#6717)
segment.target: Updated eSpeak NG (commit e095f008, 10 January 2017). (#6717)

segment.source: Due to changes In the Windows 10 Creators Update, the "Always duck" mode is no longer available in NVDA's Audio ducking settings. It is still available on older windows 10 releases. (#6684)
segment.target: Due to changes In the Windows 10 Creators Update, the "Always duck" mode is no longer available in NVDA's Audio ducking settings. It is still available on older windows 10 releases. (#6684)

segment.source: Due to changes in the Windows 10 Creators Update, the "Duck when outputting speech and sounds" mode can no longer ensure audio has ducked fully before starting to speak, nor will it keep audio ducked long enough after speaking to stop rappid bouncing in volume. These changes do not affect older windows 10 releases. (#6684)
segment.target: Due to changes in the Windows 10 Creators Update, the "Duck when outputting speech and sounds" mode can no longer ensure audio has ducked fully before starting to speak, nor will it keep audio ducked long enough after speaking to stop rappid bouncing in volume. These changes do not affect older windows 10 releases. (#6684)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Bug Fixes

segment.source: Fixed freeze in Microsoft Word when moving by paragraph through a large document while in browse mode. (#6368)
segment.target: Fixed freeze in Microsoft Word when moving by paragraph through a large document while in browse mode. (#6368)

segment.source: Tables in Microsoft Word that have been copied from Microsoft Excel are no longer treeted as layout tables and therefore are no longer ignored. (#5927)
segment.target: Tables in Microsoft Word that have been copied from Microsoft Excel are no longer treeted as layout tables and therefore are no longer ignored. (#5927)

segment.source: When trying to type in Microsoft Excel while in protected view, NVDA now makes a sound rather than speaking characters that were not actually typed. (#6570)
segment.target: When trying to type in Microsoft Excel while in protected view, NVDA now makes a sound rather than speaking characters that were not actually typed. (#6570)

segment.source: Pressing escape in Microsoft Excel no longer incorrectly switches to browse mode, unless the user has previously switched to browse mode explicitly with NVDA+space and then entered focus mode by pressing enter on a form field. (#6569)
segment.target: Pressing escape in Microsoft Excel no longer incorrectly switches to browse mode, unless the user has previously switched to browse mode explicitly with NVDA+space and then entered focus mode by pressing enter on a form field. (#6569)

segment.source: NVDA no longer freezes in Microsoft Excel spreadsheets where an entire row or column is merged. (#6216)
segment.target: NVDA no longer freezes in Microsoft Excel spreadsheets where an entire row or column is merged. (#6216)

segment.source: Reporting of cropped/overflowed text in Microsoft Excel cells should now be more accurate. (#6472)
segment.target: Reporting of cropped/overflowed text in Microsoft Excel cells should now be more accurate. (#6472)

segment.source: NVDA now reports when a check box is read-only. (#6563)
segment.target: NVDA now reports when a check box is read-only. (#6563)

segment.source: The NVDA launcher will no longer show a warning dialog when it can't play the logo sound due to no audio device being available. (#6289)
segment.target: The NVDA launcher will no longer show a warning dialog when it can't play the logo sound due to no audio device being available. (#6289)

segment.source: Controls in the Microsoft Excel Ribbon that are unavailable are now reported as such. (#6430)
segment.target: Controls in the Microsoft Excel Ribbon that are unavailable are now reported as such. (#6430)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer announce "pane" when minimizing windows. (#6671)
segment.target: NVDA will no longer announce "pane" when minimizing windows. (#6671)

segment.source: Typed characters are now spoken in Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps (including Microsoft Edge) in the Windows 10 Creators Update. (#6017)
segment.target: Typed characters are now spoken in Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps (including Microsoft Edge) in the Windows 10 Creators Update. (#6017)

segment.source: Mouse tracking now works across all screens on computers with multiple monitors. (#6598)
segment.target: Mouse tracking now works across all screens on computers with multiple monitors. (#6598)

segment.source: NVDA no longer becomes unusable after exiting Windows Media Player while focused on a slider control. (#5467)
segment.target: NVDA no longer becomes unusable after exiting Windows Media Player while focused on a slider control. (#5467)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promene za programere (engleski)

segment.source: Profiles and configuration files are now automatically upgraded to meet the requirements of schema modifications. If there is an error during upgrade, a notification is shown, the configuration is reset and the old configuration file is available in the NVDA log at 'Info' level. (#6470)
segment.target: Profiles and configuration files are now automatically upgraded to meet the requirements of schema modifications. If there is an error during upgrade, a notification is shown, the configuration is reset and the old configuration file is available in the NVDA log at 'Info' level. (#6470)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include improved support for Microsoft Edge; browse mode in the Windows 10 Mail app; and significant improvements to NVDA's dialogs.
segment.target: Highlights of this release include improved support for Microsoft Edge; browse mode in the Windows 10 Mail app; and significant improvements to NVDA's dialogs.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: New Features

segment.source: NVDA can now indicate line indentation using tones. This can be configured using the "Line indentation reporting" combo box in NVDA's Document Formatting preferences dialog. (#5906)
segment.target: NVDA can now indicate line indentation using tones. This can be configured using the "Line indentation reporting" combo box in NVDA's Document Formatting preferences dialog. (#5906)

segment.source: Support for the Orbit Reader 20 braille display. (#6007)
segment.target: Support for the Orbit Reader 20 braille display. (#6007)

segment.source: An option to open the speech viewer window on startup has been added. This can be enabled via a check box in the speech viewer window. (#5050)
segment.target: An option to open the speech viewer window on startup has been added. This can be enabled via a check box in the speech viewer window. (#5050)

segment.source: When re-opening the speech viewer window, the location and dimensions will now be restored. (#5050)
segment.target: When re-opening the speech viewer window, the location and dimensions will now be restored. (#5050)

segment.source: Cross-reference fields in Microsoft Word are now treated like hyperlinks. They are reported as links and can be activated. (#6102)
segment.target: Cross-reference fields in Microsoft Word are now treated like hyperlinks. They are reported as links and can be activated. (#6102)

segment.source: Support for the Baum SuperVario2, Baum Vario 340 and HumanWare Brailliant2 braille displays. (#6116)
segment.target: Support for the Baum SuperVario2, Baum Vario 340 and HumanWare Brailliant2 braille displays. (#6116)

segment.source: Initial support for the Anniversary update of Microsoft Edge. (#6271)
segment.target: Initial support for the Anniversary update of Microsoft Edge. (#6271)

segment.source: Browse mode is now used when reading emails in the Windows 10 mail app. (#6271)
segment.target: Browse mode is now used when reading emails in the Windows 10 mail app. (#6271)

segment.source: New language: Lithuanian.
segment.target: New language: Lithuanian.

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Changes

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to 3.0.0. This includes significant enhancements to Unified English Braille. (#6109, #4194, #6220, #6140)
segment.target: Updated liblouis braille translator to 3.0.0. This includes significant enhancements to Unified English Braille. (#6109, #4194, #6220, #6140)

segment.source: In the Add-ons Manager, the Disable add-on and Enable add-on buttons now have keyboard shortcuts (alt+d and alt+e, respectively). (#6388)
segment.target: In the Add-ons Manager, the Disable add-on and Enable add-on buttons now have keyboard shortcuts (alt+d and alt+e, respectively). (#6388)

segment.source: Various padding and alignment issues in NVDA's dialogs have been resolved. (#6317, #5548, #6342, #6343, #6349)
segment.target: Various padding and alignment issues in NVDA's dialogs have been resolved. (#6317, #5548, #6342, #6343, #6349)

segment.source: The document formatting dialog has been adjusted so that the contents scrolls. (#6348)
segment.target: The document formatting dialog has been adjusted so that the contents scrolls. (#6348)

segment.source: Adjusted the layout of the Symbol Pronunciation dialog so the full width of the dialog is used for the symbols list. (#6101)
segment.target: Adjusted the layout of the Symbol Pronunciation dialog so the full width of the dialog is used for the symbols list. (#6101)

segment.source: In browse mode in web browsers, the edit field (e and shift+e) and form field (f and shift+f) single letter navigation commands can now be used to move to read-only edit fields. (#4164)
segment.target: In browse mode in web browsers, the edit field (e and shift+e) and form field (f and shift+f) single letter navigation commands can now be used to move to read-only edit fields. (#4164)

segment.source: In NVDA's Document Formatting settings, "Announce formatting changes after the cursor" has been renamed to "Report formatting changes after the cursor", as it affects braille as well as speech. (#6336)
segment.target: In NVDA's Document Formatting settings, "Announce formatting changes after the cursor" has been renamed to "Report formatting changes after the cursor", as it affects braille as well as speech. (#6336)

segment.source: Adjusted the appearance of the NVDA "Welcome dialog". (#6350)
segment.target: Adjusted the appearance of the NVDA "Welcome dialog". (#6350)

segment.source: NVDA dialog boxes now have their "ok" and "cancel" buttons aligned to the right of the dialog. (#6333)
segment.target: NVDA dialog boxes now have their "ok" and "cancel" buttons aligned to the right of the dialog. (#6333)

segment.source: Spin Controls are now used for numeric input fields such as the "Capital pitch change percentage" setting in the Voice Settings dialog. You can enter the desired value or use the up and down arrow keys to adjust the value. (#6099)
segment.target: Spin Controls are now used for numeric input fields such as the "Capital pitch change percentage" setting in the Voice Settings dialog. You can enter the desired value or use the up and down arrow keys to adjust the value. (#6099)

segment.source: The way IFrames (documents embedded within documents) are reported has been made more consistent across web browsers. IFrames are now reported as "frame" in Firefox. (#6047)
segment.target: The way IFrames (documents embedded within documents) are reported has been made more consistent across web browsers. IFrames are now reported as "frame" in Firefox. (#6047)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Bug Fixes

segment.source: Fixed a rare error when exiting NVDA while the speech viewer is open. (#5050)
segment.target: Fixed a rare error when exiting NVDA while the speech viewer is open. (#5050)

segment.source: Image maps now render as expected in browse mode in Mozilla Firefox. (#6051)
segment.target: Image maps now render as expected in browse mode in Mozilla Firefox. (#6051)

segment.source: While in the dictionary dialog, pressing the enter key now saves any changes you have made and closes the dialog. Previously, pressing enter did nothing. (#6206)
segment.target: While in the dictionary dialog, pressing the enter key now saves any changes you have made and closes the dialog. Previously, pressing enter did nothing. (#6206)

segment.source: Messages are now displayed in braille when changing input modes for an input method (native input/alphanumeric, full shaped/half shaped, etc.). (#5892, #5893)
segment.target: Messages are now displayed in braille when changing input modes for an input method (native input/alphanumeric, full shaped/half shaped, etc.). (#5892, #5893)

segment.source: When disabling and then immediately re-enabling an add-on or vice versa, the add-on status now correctly reverts to what it was previously. (#6299)
segment.target: When disabling and then immediately re-enabling an add-on or vice versa, the add-on status now correctly reverts to what it was previously. (#6299)

segment.source: When using Microsoft Word, page number fields in headers can now be read. (#6004)
segment.target: When using Microsoft Word, page number fields in headers can now be read. (#6004)

segment.source: The mouse can now be used to move focus between the symbol list and the edit fields in the symbol pronunciation dialog. (#6312)
segment.target: The mouse can now be used to move focus between the symbol list and the edit fields in the symbol pronunciation dialog. (#6312)

segment.source: In browse mode in Microsoft Word, Fixed an issue that stops the elements list from appearing when a document contains an invalid hyperlink. (#5886)
segment.target: In browse mode in Microsoft Word, Fixed an issue that stops the elements list from appearing when a document contains an invalid hyperlink. (#5886)

segment.source: After being closed via the task bar or the alt+F4 shortcut, the speech viewer check box in the NVDA menu will now reflect the actual visibility of the window. (#6340)
segment.target: After being closed via the task bar or the alt+F4 shortcut, the speech viewer check box in the NVDA menu will now reflect the actual visibility of the window. (#6340)

segment.source: The reload plugins command no longer causes problems for triggered configuration profiles, new documents in web browsers and screen review. (#2892, #5380)
segment.target: The reload plugins command no longer causes problems for triggered configuration profiles, new documents in web browsers and screen review. (#2892, #5380)

segment.source: In the list of languages in NVDA's General Settings dialog, languages such as Aragonese are now displayed correctly on Windows 10. (#6259)
segment.target: In the list of languages in NVDA's General Settings dialog, languages such as Aragonese are now displayed correctly on Windows 10. (#6259)

segment.source: Emulated system keyboard keys (e.g. a button on a braille display which emulates pressing the tab key) are now presented in the configured NVDA language in input help and the Input Gestures dialog. Previously, they were always presented in English. (#6212)
segment.target: Emulated system keyboard keys (e.g. a button on a braille display which emulates pressing the tab key) are now presented in the configured NVDA language in input help and the Input Gestures dialog. Previously, they were always presented in English. (#6212)

segment.source: Changing the NVDA language (from the General Settings dialog) now has no effect until NVDA is restarted. (#4561)
